This story is based off the Characters created by Derpatron with his permission. it is five years after the events of his story based off one of the story threads i took a liking to the most.

You are 14 year-old Jack Harper. You were born with a squishy, putty-like body. While this makes you practically immortal, it also means you're extremely weak, constantly getting squashed and flattened by almost everything. Things really started getting bad when you started school, after which your mother pulled you out the first chance she got. You seem to be able to take an awful lot of punishment. Getting smooshed doesn't really hurt you. In fact, you could be melted into a puddle and still be fine. You still hate it nonetheless. You're kind of a geek, often studying on the internet and playing video games. You're almost exactly three feet tall, black hair, and tan skin. You like wearing funny or "awesome" shirts, even though no one usually sees them. Being sheltered most of your life, you don't really know how normal people are supposed to act and often get yourself in trouble. You seem to have stopped growing and you seem to age slower

You have had a lot of misadventures throughout the years. you have been sat on for hours, you have been trodden on and walked about like gum, you have even been mistakenly rubbed into your mothers skin like tanning lotion, somehow you have always survived. you even managed to meet Mary through your misfortunes, and now shes your wonderful but playful girlfriend.

you go to school with her once a week, the rest of the time you stay home for homeschooling, just to limit the dangers of being around hundreds of kids who could stomp you flat.

where does this new chapter of your life begin...

It was a rather peaceful Saturday morning. You were sitting in your family room watching TV. Specifically, you were watching Adventure Time, which was your new favorite show. With a big yawn, you stretched out on the recliner you were relaxing on. The chair was so huge, you hardly took up any space at all. Sometimes being small was a blessing. And other times it was a curse. Like today for example. Your day was about to become not so great.

You had been watching TV peacefully for about two hours now, until you realized it was 10 o'clock. Your mother always got up at 10 on the weekends, although she was rather groggy and dizzy for a few minutes immediately afterward. In fact, you heard her footsteps approaching almost exactly after you thought that last thought. You weren't worried though. She knew you always like to watch TV in the mornings. What worried you was when she entered the family room carrying a gigantic box, almost twice your size. A box that covered your mothers face. And she was heading towards the chair.

You were practically paralyzed and unable to talk. Instead, you fidgeted in your chair, unsure of how to dodge the box. You were so undecided on a plan of action, that you had no plan at all. Your unknowing mother placed the box directly on top of you, completely crushing you flat against the chair. Then she lifted the box and dropped it to the floor, but the damage was done. You were crushed flat, and helpless to do anything as your tired mother sighed and sat down in the chair.

Her massive ass descended like an elephant onto your tiny, papery body, pressuring you tightly between her butt and the chair. She grinded her ass in the chair a little to get comfortable, mushing your face deeper into her butt. Then she relaxed, and let all her weight fall onto you as she leaned back in the chair. The pressure was heavy, and the heat intense. This day had just taken a bad turn.

Thankfully, your mother felt you immediately upon standing up. Unfortunately, she didn't stand up again for four hours. You were trapped, sweating and crushed, under her titanic ass for four hours. She apologized profusely, but it hadn't been THAT bad. Anyways, you ate breakfast, and were about to go play video games, when you heard your mother's voice.

"Sweety!" She called. "I need you to help me with some chores. Please?" You reluctantly agreed. What does she have you do first?

Sure enough, there was a box sitting right there for you. It did look really big and heavy though, and you weren't very strong, but you didn't want to let your mom down. You picked it up, and heaved it above your head with all your might.

The box must have weighed a ton, or at least it certainly felt like that. You could barely walk while holding it. You bit your lip in concentration, and wobbled your way down the steps. Kat was 18 years old, and she was nearly twice your height. She was tomboyish girl, and her feminine features were much more subdued than other girls. She could keep the truth secret, but she would be forced to give you to Tina, and she didn’t have any solvent at home. It would be very difficult to free you once her oblivious mother had you. What does Mary finally do?
11111212.title: Avoiding Embarrassment

choices: You make the journey safely, but do you find mary before trouble finds you?
You get flattened on your way to school and end up elsewhere.
111112121.content:
Mary was indeed terrified that Trish would push her out of your life if she told the truth, but knowing that once you were in her mothers underwear drawer, the chances of her getting you back to normal were almost non existant, she had no choice. She bit her bottom lip and whimpered "The thing is Miss Harper...the gummy stain...was Jackie" She said, waiting for the angry outburst from your mother. Trish however simply blinked and gasped "Oh goodness, well he can't go to your mother then" She exclaimed before stroking your cups 2im sorry sweetheart, Mommy didn't know" before she put you in a glass bowl and poured solvent in ontop of you, as you had been crushed and molded so well you wouldnt be popping back quickly. Trish took Mary by the shoulder and led her out of the room to calm her nerves, seeing how strangely terrified the girl looked.

It took the better part of an hour for your body to reform finally to its normal shape. However, the gummy dye wasnt effected by the solvent and had instead soaked into your skin. It would take weeks to get back to your normal colour of tanned flesh. You didn't care however, as you were free. Drying yourself off you quickly sped to your bedroom and got dressed before heading down to see Mary and your mother. Both were very apologetic to you and hugged you tight enough to reverse your reforming a bit. You told your mother about Kat's cruel prank that had gotten you stuck and your Mother said she would give your cousin a piece of her mind next time they saw her.

You and Mary watched a movie together on the couch, cuddling up to your lovely girlfriend as your mother molded a new blue bra for Tina. When the movie was over, Mary kissed you goodbye and took the bra, promising to meet up soon. You waved her off at the door and smiled before closing it. Surprisingly you had a squish free evening with your mother. she noticed you easier with your blue skintone and didn't sit or step on you once. You thought about maybe keeping your skin blue if it meant you wouldn't get squished so much.

The next morning, Trish had to go to work for an important meeting so she kissed you goodbye and told you to behave before leaving you alone. Wandering the house was boring, but Mary was at school today. Thinking hard, you decided you would go to school and meet up with her, even though it wasn't a day anyone expected you there. Being blue meant you shouldn't get squished on the way. However, without really noticing you had put on a matching blue tshirt that went well with your blue gummy jeans. Grabbing your bag, you headed off to go to school and see your girlfriend. Surely she would be happy to see you.
111112121.title: She confesses the truth, and Trish dunks you in...

choices: She pulls the spoon out and looks down at you and the blueberries in confusion.
She shrugs, disregards the thought, and eats you and the blueberries.
1111121211.content:
You sprinted down the sidewalk as fast as you could, not wanting to waste any time getting to school. You weren’t feeling particularly worried at the moment, but you knew that fate had a tendency to throw you into a horrible situation without any warning. As such, you ran and ran, until you turned to last corner before the school, and you could see the building in the distance.

Just then, something unexpected stuck out in the middle of the sidewalk. It was the shoe of someone who had jumped in front of you. You tripped on their shoe, and sprawled out onto the sidewalk. You skidded across the rough pavement, red slashes appearing on your scuffed legs. You flipped onto your back and stared up at the perpetrator, a mean look on your face. Your mean look quickly dissolved into panic.

“What’s up squishy?” Mary’s cruel twin brother Gary snickered. “You should watch where you’re going.” He quickly pressed down on you, his strength more than enough to overwhelm you. He squashed your mouth first so you couldn’t scream, and then proceeded to grind you up into a tiny ball. He clenched you tightly in his fist.

“I almost didn’t recognize you with this new blue look you’re sporting.” Gary laughed. He grabbed your small backpack and stuffed it inside his own. “Thankfully though, I recognized it was you before you could get away. Now my whole day is improved, because I get to watch you suffer!” Gary began walking to school, making sure to keep you hidden in his fist.

“Man, fate was just perfectly in line today. Mary was worried about this big project, so she rushed off to school early. Your one savior ended up leaving you in the dust squishy. Now it’s up to me to figure out what to do with you, and I think I’ve just been struck with a brilliant idea!”

Gary pushed open the main doors to the school, and veered off towards the cafeteria. He entered the cafeteria, which was almost completely abandoned at this point. Checking to make sure he hadn’t been spotted, Gary stealthily crept into the kitchen, which was pitch black. He flicked on his phone’s light, and used it to guide himself to the walk-in freezer. He opened the door to the freezer and walked inside.

“You know that healthy eating program our school started? Well, they just shipped in a heck ton of fresh fruits and vegetables. Truthfully, I can’t help but realize how much your pathetically crushed form looks like a blueberry right now. Do you catch my drift?” Gary sneered down at you, and finally located a huge box holding about twenty containers of blueberries.

He grabbed one of the containers near the bottom of the box, and popped off the lid. He then slipped your tiny orb-like body into the bottom of the container, making sure you were completely buried under the other blue berries.

“See you around squishy. Or actually…I guess not. In fact, I doubt I’ll ever see you again!” Gary closed the lid on the container, and dropped the container into the bottom of the box. He then exited the walk-in freezer, closing the door behind him. He snuck back out into the cafeteria, and strolled off to class, a satisfied smile on his face.

You hadn’t wasted a single second trying to wiggle and squirm to freedom, but it was absolutely useless. Blueberries pressed in against you tightly from all sides, and you couldn’t reform no matter how hard you tried. There was nothing you could do to free yourself at this point. Gary had sealed you away in a place that no one would ever find you again. You sank into depression, and began to mentally sob.

Days passed, and those days soon turned into weeks. For the first two months, you could not perceive anything in the hellish, freezing prison you had been trapped in. During the third month, you could finally start to hear voices as people gathered supplies in the walk-in freezer. Finally, after five long months, the container of blue berries you were in was the only one left.

Early in the morning, a young lunch lady grabbed the container and carried it out into the kitchen. She popped the lid, and poured the contents of the container into a large bowl. Your body landed near the top of the bowl, and you stared weakly up at the ceiling of the kitchen. Your body had frozen solid months ago, but your temperature melted back to normal as the hours passed.

When lunchtime drew near, the lunch lady carried the bowl of blueberries, as well as several other bowls of fruits and vegetables out into the cafeteria, setting them out on a table. The lunch lady placed a large spoon in each bowl, and then walked back into the kitchen. Students arrived soon after, and a long line of hungry teens headed straight for the fruits and veggies table.

You stared up in numb horror at the faces of countless high school students, oblivious to the squishy teen suffering right below their noses. Each time a student scooped some blueberries onto their plate, your body rolled off of the spoon. After ten minutes, a familiar face stopped by, and scooped you up onto her plate. It was, of course, none other than Mary.

Mary was hardly paying attention to her food, as she was locked in an intense debate about pop singers with Stacy and Emma. The three girls finished gathering their food, and then plopped down at an empty table. Mary grabbed her spoon and scooped a few blue berries, including you, up onto the plastic eating utensil.

“I don’t understand why everyone hates her.” Mary said, raising her spoon to her lips. “I like her music.”

“It’s because she’s so mainstream.” Emma pointed out. Mary stopped her spoon right against her mouth. Her plush lips slightly touched your body. You tried your hardest to wiggle and squirm, but it was futile.

“Hmm…I guess.” Mary sighed, and she breathed in deeply. The scent of blueberries wafted up into her nose, along with a tiny scent of strawberry-cheesecake. Mary then parted her lips and moved the spoon into her mouth before suddenly pausing. A strange sensation had just occurred to her. Why had she just smelled strawberry-cheesecake alongside the scent of blueberries? What does Mary do next?
1111121211.title: Tiny Little Blueberry

choices: it takes a few days but you slowly begin to reform.
your body is stuck, Mary toys with you for a long time
11111212111.content:
Slowly, Mary pulled the spoon out and looked down at its fruity contents with confusion. Stacy glanced over at her as you looked up at her titanic face. "Whats up Mary?" Stacy asked as she munched on her own fruit selection. "I got a smell of strawberry cheesecake just now" She said taking another sniff and catching your scent again. Stacy laughed "oh maybe Jack became a blueberry as a change of pace" She joked. You saw Mary roll her eyes "oh sure, i havent seen him in months but he suddenly appears as a blueberry on my plate of all places...come on Stacy you know i miss him but im not that silly" She said, prodding each of the blueberries until she got to you and you squished slightly.

Mary blinked "Oh, this one is a little glob of blue gummy, thats why it smelt like that!" She said, drawing the wrong conclusion to your dismay. She plucked you from her spoon between her finger and her thumb. "Wonder how that got mixed in with the fruit. weird." She saw Stacy smirking and quickly smirked back "Its not Jack, its blue and its a tiny tiny ball Stacy!" She said with a chuckle. She flattened you out between her fingers and began stretching you out before giggling. "It makes a cute gummy ribbon though" She said, gathering up her hair and used you to tie it up into a pony tail, knotting you off into a cute bow behind her head.

With that, she went back to her lunch, having discarded the idea of you being more than a simple bit of gummy. You assume she must have been teased by Stacy for mistaking normal gummy for you over the months you were trapped in the freezer. Now you were stuck in your girlfriends hair looking very girly. After lunch you joined her for her afternoon classes, she didn't see any need to take you out of her hair. You stared at her hair and the ceiling all afternoon, going from class to class, unable to reform in this knotted shape, you couldn't even wriggle.

Finally the school day was over and you felt the breeze flutter you as Mary walked home chatting with Stacy, Emma and a girl called Isabella. Isabella seemed very friendly with your girlfriend, but all you could do was listen and assume you were imagining things. When Mary got home and up to her room, she tugged on you and let you slide free of her hair, dropping you in a loose pile on her dresser. You were grateful for a chance to reform now, however something unexpected happened. You reverted back from the shape of a ribbon into your little blueberry sized ball shape. It took you a few minutes to realise, but spending so long frozen in that shape under all that pressure had clearly done a number on your bodies ability to reform to normal. You began to panic, finding that you couldn't even wriggle or roll, you were totally immobile, compressed so tight in this shape. If you didn't manage to reform to normal, Mary would never realise you were you!

You kept trying with all your might to reform back to normal, to wriggle, to twitch, to do anything....
11111212111.title: She pulls the spoon out and looks down at you a...

choices: In a box of gummy orbs in the prize booth.
Inside the ball pit.
1111122.content:
“Well, I don’t believe you!” Mary huffed, running after Kat. “As soon as we get inside this park, I’m heading right to the bathroom to free him.” Mary punched Kat in the shoulder as hard as she could. Kat didn’t even flinch, and simply grinned down at Mary, her eyes glinting like an actually cat, ready to pounce.

“Oh? Do you want to get violent little girl?” Kat teased, and cracked her knuckles. Mary shivered and took a step back.

“No…no. I’m sorry Kat.” Mary apologized. “You still should’ve told me I sat on Jack earlier.”

“It slipped my mind. Honest.” Kat lied. The two girls purchased their tickets and entered the park. As stated, Mary headed right into the first bathroom she found, while Kat strolled off towards the giant roller coaster towering in the distance.

Mary pushed into an empty stall, and locked the door behind her. She stripped out of her panties, and then emptied the water bottle she had brought with her into the toilet. She then gripped her panties tightly, held them above the water bottle, and began to squeeze and twist as hard as she could.

Thankfully, your body had not fully had the chance to solidify inside of her panties, thanks to Mary’s quick realization of your predicament. As such, it only took her about thirty minutes, to drain your body out of her panties. Your liquidy body filled the water bottle, and Mary smiled brightly at seeing you safe and sound.

Your loving girlfriend waited for you to cool, and then yanked you out of the water bottle. She gently molded you into a ball shape, and tucked you down her cleavage. She rested you delicately between her squishy and soft breasts, making sure that you were out of sight.

“We can’t let you be seen in the girls’ bathroom Jack.” Mary whispered to you, explaining her actions. She then strolled out of the bathroom, but was disappointed to find that the park was quite crowded. There would be no easy way for her to pull a gummy orb out from between her boobs, and have that same orb reform into a three-foot tall naked kid in the middle of this huge crowd.

Mary glanced around for a while, before finding a sign that pointed towards an arcade. Deciding that an arcade would probably be fairly deserted, Mary began to head in that direction. Her breasts bounced slightly as she walked, yet the sensation was somehow soothing. It was probably because Mary was your girlfriend, and you knew that you would always be safe with her.

Mary walked into the arcade, and a blast of cool AC practically hit her in the face. She scanned for the most empty part of the arcade, which happened to be beside the motorcycle racing game. She took a seat on the motorcycle, and idly checked her phone until the coast was finally clear. She pulled you out from between her boobs with two fingers, but then disaster struck.

“BOO!” A female voice cried out, and two strong hands clamped down on Mary’s shoulders. Mary screamed, and reflexively tossed her hands into the air. Your sweaty body slipped out of her weak grip, and your ball-shaped body flew through the air. Everything around you was spinning, and you would have thrown up if you could. Finally, you fell out of the air, and smacked down amidst a sea of other similarly sized balls.

“WHAT THE HELL?” Mary glanced upwards, and saw Kat smiling down at her.

“Hey there Mary. I’ve been looking for you.” Kat declared.

“You made me throw Jack!” Mary exclaimed, furious. She stood up and shoved Kat. Kat had a look of honest confusion on her face.

“What? I did? I didn’t see him.” Kat said. The irony of the entire situation was not lost on you or Mary. Even on accident, Kat found creative ways to ruin your life. “Where did he land?”

“Over there!” Mary pointed in the direction she saw you go, and Kat and her walked over there. Where is it that you landed?
1111122.title: Arcade Accident

choices: She grabs you, and walks right out of the arcade with her new "prize".
She grabs another orb, and Mary walks right up after her to claim you.
11111221.content:
Mary’s finger was pointing in the direction that you had fallen, which of course had ended up being one of the worst possible locations for you to land. Your gummy orb-shaped body was lying in a box of about twenty other gummy orbs, and that box was sitting on a counter in the back of the prize booth. Really, it had been one heck of a miraculous (or ridiculous) throw.

“There he is!” Mary gestured to you, as you were the only tan gummy orb in the box. Kat groaned and lifted her leg up, preparing to vault over the prize booth desk and grab you from the back counter.

“WOAH!” A feminine voice exclaimed. At the back of the prize booth, a young woman dressed in a black blouse and tight black pants was just opening a small closet door and stepping out. “What do you think you’re doing?”

“Uh…I was just…” Kat tried to explain, climbing back down from the desk.

“If you want a prize, you’ll have to earn the tickets. Not steal it.” The employee huffed. She traced Mary’s gaze to the box of gummy orbs on the counter. “Those gummy things are one thousand tickets. High-quality stuff has a high ticket price. Better start playing those games!”

“No! You don’t under…” Mary tried to interject, but the arcade worker cut her off.

“Listen girls. Truthfully, you two are really getting on my nerves, and I’m about ready to toss you out of the arcade. Count yourself lucky I’m not reporting you for trying to steal merchandise, okay?” The young woman frowned deeply, and Kat and Mary backed off. Once they were a short distance away, they turned to face each other.

“What do we do Kat?” Mary wondered, her anxiety rising so high that she was visibly shaking.

“We have no choice but to play, I guess.” Kat sighed. “I have a dollar or two I think.”

“I have about ten dollars in change. Will it be enough?” Mary’s eyes were beginning to water. Kat felt a twinge of pity. She was certainly not above tormenting you herself, but she didn’t like seeing other people this upset.

“Cheer up girl.” Kat flashed a confident grin. “I’m a pretty great arcade gamer. We’ll get those one thousand tickets, no sweat!” With renewed determination, Kat and Mary located the easiest and quickest games in the arcade, and began racking up their ticket count.

Meanwhile, you had not stopped quivering and squirming as much as you possibly could. You rocked your small orb-shaped body back and forth, over and over. Eventually, you rolled across the top of the box, and actually managed to tip yourself over the edge. You toppled free from the box, and crashed down onto the floor with a small “splat” noise.

Unfortunately, the arcade employee had turned around just in time to see you fall, and so she strolled over and picked you up. She placed you back into the box with more force than necessary, as she was still a little upset at Kat and your girlfriend. As such, she accidentally wedged a bit of your body between two other gummy orbs.

As she walked away, you tried to move or escape once again, but found that your body was now pinned between the gummy orbs. You were stuck, and unable to reform. Finally admitting defeat, you stared up at the neon ceiling of the arcade, and listened to the cacophony of sounds. Hopefully, Mary would be back to rescue you before too long.

After about twenty minutes, a teenaged girl walked up to the prize booth, an absurd amount of tickets in her hands. She scanned all of the prizes, until an old-fashioned arcade joystick caught her attention. Right as she was about to signal the attendant, she spotted the box of gummy orbs on the counter, and her eyes lit up with joy.

“Excuse me miss? I’d like to get a prize!” The girl waved her arm excitedly. The arcade employee put her phone back in her pocket and walked over.

“Yeah? Which one?” She asked.

“Well, that joystick caught my eye, but I think I’d actually like a gummy orb!” The girl grinned from ear-to-ear. “I’ve always wanted one, but never had the chance. They just have so many uses! I’d love to have one!”

“It’s your lucky day I guess.” The employee walked over and picked up the box of gummy orbs. You were shaken back and forth as she carried the box from the counter to the desk, but still couldn’t get free. As the box was plopped down on the counter in front of the girl, you stared up at this new, titanic threat.

She had bright red hair that flowed around her and down past her shoulders. Her skin appeared to be smooth, and was slightly tan. Her bright blue eyes sparkled with childlike wonder, framed by stylish and cute glasses. The rest of her face was obscured by her rather impressive breasts, that jutted out from her chest. They seemed to stretch against the fabric of her tight t-shirt, which was emblazoned with the logo of the N64.

“Hm…” The girl stroked her chin thoughtfully, looking over each gummy orb in the box. You spotted a wristband on her arm with the name "Bailey". You began to worry that she would pick you, and glanced around nervously. You could see Mary and Kat, standing about ten feet away. They were completely engrossed in their game, as they were only ten tickets away from their goal. They had no idea what was going on right behind them.

What gummy orb does Bailey eventually deicide to take?
11111221.title: Prize Booth

choices: A little girl sees you while Mary is on the ride.
Nothing happens, you have a pleasant day with Mary and Kat.
111112212.content:
You waited, staring up at Bailey, certain that she would be your newest tormentor with your usual luck. However, as luck would have it, her favorite colour was red, so she plucked away at the ball next to you. Of course, it didn't stop you flinching as her hand reached down towards the box. As she lifted your neighbouring ball away you mentally breathed a sigh of relief. She thanked the arcade worker and walked off with her prize. A few moments later, Mary and Kat came up to the counter. "Hi" Said Kat "We have enough tickets for a gummy orb!" Shhe told the girl, who smiled "Not gonna try to steal them this time huh" She teased but pushed the box towards them to pick. You saw Mary look at you and then whisper at Kat "there are four tan gummy orbs...which one is Jack?" you overheard her say worried.

Kat looked at each of the tan orbs closely and smirked as she saw your faint twitches as you remained pinned between the orbs. The movements so small, anyone else would have missed you, but Kat had the eyes of a hawk when it came to spotting you. Confidently, she scooped you out of the box and held you up, taking a quick sniff "Yep, this is him!" She declared. The arcade worker looked at them with a confused look and a raised eyebrow, but this time Mary was prepared. She showed the girl her phone, with pictures of you and a few of you squished in various shapes. "Seriously? thats a person?" She said pointing to you, to which Mary and Kat both nodded. "Girls why didn't you just say so?" She said, Mary bit back a response but just thanked her for keeping you safe and they both left with you.

"ok...now what do i do with Jackie though, he is still naked" Mary asked, Kat looked around "They have a little gummy doll store" She said pointing, Mary looked and pulled a face "Kat those are princess dresses to dress up gummy dolls like the theme park princesses" She complained. Kat shrugged "Its that or nudity" She countered casually. You wanted a say in this, but the girls just argued before Mary conceded that it was better than nothing.

By the time you had reformed Mary had bought you and dressed you up in a poofy sky blue and white princess ball gown and gloves, though Kat was the one who put a tiara in your hair with a smirk "What? it completes the look" She said, the girls having agreed that it was best to pass you off as a gummy doll for the day. You fussed and squirmed as Mary put make up on your face, but when she began pouting and telling you that she was worried about losing you again, you couldn't refuse her. Before long you looked just like a little gummy princess. Being carried in Mary's arms was nice though.

When they got to the rides, you had to stay with the bags. You tried to stick to a motionless pose as you watched Mary and Kat get on the rides. Having to pretend you were a doll meant she couldn't take you on the rides and it made you worried that something would happen while she was away. You lay there, leaning on Mary's bag near a load of other bags as the ride started up and Mary and Kat both shot out of sight. You hoped you were just being paranoid...
111112212.title: She grabs another orb, and Mary walks right up ...

Kat takes you with her, leaving you as a squished blob.
11113.content:
Kat had a full opportunity to put you through some more “strength training” and she knew it. She contemplated turning you into a seat cushion for Mary or herself, or perhaps doing something even more fun. However, she wasn’t a totally cruel person. She decided to let you have your fun, at least for a while. She turned back around, and you breathed a deep sigh of relief as Mary climbed back into the car.

Kat fired up the car, and began driving off to the amusement park that you were going to. It was known as Adventure Land, and you had never been there before. You had heard about it though. You knew it was huge, and it had countless roller coasters and other fun rides. There was a large food court, offering many different kinds of restaurants. Adventure Land even had a small waterpark, complete with slides and a wave pool.

The ride to the amusement park was calm and relaxing, and you chatted with Mary and Kat about various things. You discussed how life was treating each of you, spending more time on your various misadventures than you would have liked. Kat found every embarrassing story you told to be comedy gold, especially if it involved Mary.

One story Kat found so funny that she had to stop the car and laugh for nearly five minutes. Mary had told her about a time when you had fallen into her shoe without her knowing. Mary described how she had worn the shoe for a full month, every single day putting you through intense pain and torture. It wasn’t until she stopped wearing the shoe for a week that you were finally able to crawl your way out and reform. You and Mary didn’t find the story funny at all, each of you blushing uncontrollably, but Kat thought it was a riot.

Finally, you could see Adventure Land through the car windows. Your jaw dropped at the sheer size of the park, and you suddenly felt a sense of unease. If you got separated from Mary and Kat inside that park, you didn’t know if you would ever find them again. You shoved down your fears, and resided to just trying to enjoy the trip as a fun little experience.

Kat paid for parking, and then parked the car in an empty corner of the parking lot. Before you could even climb out of the car, Kat grabbed your arm and pulled you onto her lap. She punched and squashed you, quickly crushing you up into a tiny tan blob before you could do so much as to say a single word in protest. Mary gasped audibly as Kat shoved you into her bra, keeping you pressed against her breast.

“What on earth are you doing?” Mary exclaimed, but Kat put a hand on her shoulder.

“Relax. Your squishy boyfriend is safe. I’m just saving myself fifty dollars.” Kat explained, and then she slid out of the car. Mary shook her head in disbelief, but she still followed along, trusting Kat.

As the girls walked to the park entrance, you were bounced all around Kat’s bra, repeatedly slapping against her squishy breast. It may not have been that big to a normal person, but it was still a massive mountain to you, and you were unable to fight it as her flesh squished you flatter and flatter. Kat smiled, feeling you trapped inside of her bra.

The girls paid for their admittance, and then they walked to an empty bench and sat down. Kat plucked you out of her bra, and dropped you into her hand.

“So…who’s taking the little guy?” Kat asked, rubbing your squished body in between her fingers.

“I should take him with me!” Mary declared. “I am his girlfriend.”

“True, but I’m his cousin after all. I might keep him…safer.” Kat stifled a laugh, which went unnoticed by Mary. You just hoped that Mary would hurry up and take you, so you could get away from your “protective” cousin. What do the girls eventually decide?
11113.title: Adventure Land

choices: You become plastered to the girl's leggings, and go with her after the ride.
You remain stuck to the seat, where Mary may find you.
111131.content:
Mary grabbed you from Kat, who tried to protest. You mentally breathed a deep sigh of relief, knowing that Kat had nothing but “pain endurance” in store for you for the rest of the day. She could swear she had only the best intentions in mind for you, but you knew that she just loved to use and abuse you. Your girlfriend would be a much safer, if more absentminded, person to be around.

Mary waved goodbye to Kat, and then walked away with you, taking you behind one of the various stores. When no one was in sight, she set you down on the ground, and waited patiently for you to reform. After ten minutes, you found yourself back to normal, and ready to enjoy your day. Even your clothes were thankfully intact, despite the torment you had suffered over the past few hours.

“What would you like to do first Jackie?” Mary asked, smiling and helping you to your feet. You looked up at her, smiling back.

“Why don’t we try one of the roller coasters?” You suggested. “Those should be fun!”

“Are you sure Jackie? That could be dangerous.” Mary frowned slightly. Your safety was always her main concern, and you couldn’t stop yourself from blushing.

“It’ll be fine Mary. I promise.” You nodded, and Mary relented after a moment. She took your hand gently, and the two of you began walking through the park towards the nearest roller coaster. Mary kept perfect pace with you, never once dragging you along behind her. Her hand was warm and soft, and you loved how it felt. You kept looking up at her, just to admire how beautiful she was. You really were the luckiest guy in the world.

After a few minutes, you reached the roller coaster. Since the park had just recently opened, the line was not too long. It only took another few minutes for you and Mary to get through the line that had gathered. You and Mary stepped up to the park employee, who was manning the gate before the coaster.

“Two, I presume?” The female employee asked, looking at Mary for an answer. Mary nodded. “I have one seat in the front row, and two open in the back.”

“Uh…” Mary’s face contorted into a look of confusion, apprehension, and sadness. You recognized the look on her face. It was a look she had often at amusement parks. Mary loved riding in the front seat, more than anything else, and absolutely hated riding in the back. You knew she would be crushed if she had to sit in the back, especially since she had been looking forward to riding this particular roller coaster for a while.

“She can ride in the front. I’ll take the back.” You spoke up, surprising the employee. You could tell that the employee thought you were much younger than you actually were. Mary looked at you in surprise as well, but you winked at her to let her know that it was okay.

“Alright then.” The employee turned to Mary, and waved you and her through. “I hope you and your brother enjoy the ride!” She called, causing both you and Mary to blush profusely. You and Mary spilt up, as Mary headed to her spot in the front row, and you headed towards the back.

You slipped into the left side of the back row, and tried to see if you could spot Mary. As you suspected, she was totally unviewable from the back row through the sea of heads. You settled into your seat, sinking much further down than you had thought. As you were adjusting yourself, you banged your head against the handrail. You cried out in pain, and ducked further down, clutching your head in your hands.

You spotted your cousin Kat about twenty yards away. She was waiting outside a public bathroom, leaning up against the wall. No doubt she was waiting for Mary to head on out. The little princess wants to stay a princess?” Kat pretended to hear your cries. “Well, that’s fine by me.” She laughed hysterically, but you weren’t about to stay here and let Kat ruin your life yet again. You tried to push past her and enter the girl’s bathroom to find Mary, etiquette be damned.

Kat was too fast for you. She grabbed your wrist, pulled you back, and slammed you onto the ground. She then straddled you, holding you in place with her body, which was easily much bigger than yours. She pulled a red bottle out of her purse, and dangled it threatingly over your face.

“Oh yeah. You recognize this, don’t you?” Kat sneered. “During my internship at the gummy factory, I couldn’t help but grab a few bottles of the stuff. Now I get to see what this Beta4 does to you in person!” Kat giggled like a schoolgirl, while you thrashed around in her grip. It was no use. She had you pinned, and nothing was going to stop her from her twisted desires.

Kat popped the lid of the Beta4 bottle, and drained the entire contents of the bottle onto your body. She expertly guided the bottle so that the accursed liquid chemical soaked onto every inch of your body. In seconds, your gummy skin hardened into that all-too-familiar state, and you knew the dirty deed had been done. You were frozen now, and only the allusive solvent could save you.

Kat lifted you off of the ground and set you up, utterly delighted at how much you looked like a gorgeous princess doll, albeit a rather large one. She knew Mary though, and knew that she had inherited her mother’s fascination and obsession with dolls. Kat was hinging on Mary being too overcome with joy to recognize that the doll was actually her precious little boyfriend.

Deep inside, Kat wasn’t trying to ruin her life. Unlike Gary, she did everything she did to you with the intent of having a laugh. At the same time, Kat never followed through with her pranks, and she never saved you. This led to a simple joke turning into a week of you being stuck to Mary’s sole, or a month in your mother’s armpit, or several months as a dildo for Tina’s pleasure.

Kat had changed over the years, and she now felt a certain thrill at seeing you put through horrible and humiliating circumstances. She still loved you from the bottom of her heart, but her desires most often won out in the end. As such, her jokes and pranks on you increased, while her family love decreased. She was no longer trying to toughen you up. She was doing this all for herself.

Finally, Mary walked out of the bathroom, and Kat put her plan into motion. Before Mary could even apologize for taking so long, Kat gestured enthusiastically to you.
“Look Mary! While you were in the bathroom I won you this awesome princess doll at that skeeball game over there!” Kat smiled from ear-to-ear, while also stifling a laugh. Mary’s face lit up with excitement, and she rushed over to you. She scooped you up into her arms, and hugged you tightly against her body.

“Oh my gosh! This is amazing! I love it!” Mary laughed and smiled warmly at Kat. “Thank you so much Kat!” Mary continued to squeeze you tight, and you mentally cried. The ruse had worked, and your darling girlfriend saw you as nothing more than a simple doll.

Truthfully, Mary had had her suspicions from the start, but she disregarded them all after picking you up. You felt nothing like your normal self, due to the Beta4, and your distinct strawberry cheesecake smell was also masked. Your skin also had a plastic sheen and feel, and your masculine facial features were hidden under all of the makeup. Your frozen smile was convincing, and your extra-long hair and dress only added to the illusion. To top it all off, you didn’t even have a dick anymore.

The original sticker had been stolen by an avid fan, but the employees of the park would never know you weren’t the original. The girl firmly rubbed your body until you were held in place.

Still, the girl was not finished with you yet. She wanted to make sure that the only way you would come free was if you were dunked in solvent, something the no ordinary person had in large supply. To do this, the girl simply pulled out a bottle of Beta4 and painted it all across your body and the poster behind you, because the poster itself was actually one large sheet of gummy. When the Beta4 dried, you were fused to the poster itself.

The girl walked away with a pleased grin on her face, and you knew that your life was well and truly over. You would be a poster for the rest of your entire life. People would walk into the park, marvel at the pretty princess, and then move on. For the entire night, you mentally cried, moaning about how you would never see your loved ones again.

11113112.content:
The girl and her friend descended the stairs and pushed through the exit of the roller coaster, entering back out into the main amusement park area. As the girl walked, her sizable ass swayed from side to side, your body being forced to bounce and jiggle along with it. All sounds of the outside world were nothing but indistinguishable murmurs and garbles, and your world was pitch black.

You mentally cried, wondering why these terrible things always had to happen to you. All you had wanted to do was enjoy a fun day at the amusement park with your girlfriend, and now you were absorbed into the leggings of this oblivious stranger, tormented by her slightest movements. And before that, Kat had tortured you in her own special way. Everyone in your life either made it their mission to sadistically abuse you, or unknowingly ruin you.

These terrible thoughts persisted for the rest of the day, as the girl continued on, blissfully unaware of the pain and misery she was inflicting upon you. She toured all around the park, seemingly visiting every single ride she laid her eyes on. Most of the day was spent standing around, which gave you a few moments to relax, or walking, which constantly shook and jostled your body.

However, whenever the girl did reach a ride, she would plop down beside her friend to enjoy the experience. This meant her giant ass would slam down onto the seat of whatever ride she was at, and you would be painfully crushed flat between her butt and the seat. All of her weight would press down on you, squeezing the life out of you. Since you had been absorbed into the fabric of her leggings, it hurt less than normal, but this was little consolation.

Eventually, the day was drawing to a close, so the girl and her friend stopped by one of the park’s many food stalls for dinner. As the friend ordered their meal, the girl looked for a place to sit. Most of the tables were packed, so she chose a metallic bench parked out in the sun. With a bit of a grimace, she sat down on the bench, and immediately felt the surge of heat against her butt. She squirmed a bit, but knew she would get used to it in a minute or two.

You, on the other hand, were faced with an entirely different sensation. The heat felt like a million degrees burning through your very soul, and you mentally screamed in agony. The hot metal began to…to…melt your gummy body. Suddenly, you realized that the bench was heating up your body, which would turn you back into a liquid! Your liquidy form would then drip out of the girl’s leggings, or get her attention at the very least.

Your body began to break apart and melt down, and you mentally jumped and shouted for joy. This horrible day was soon going to come to an end, and you would be free once more. Of course, life was never quite so nice to you, and there was a bit of a catch.

“Hey Freesia! You’re crazy to sit there.” A feminine voice called, and it was the girl’s friend. She was carrying a tray of food, and gesturing with her chin to a spot at the table that had just opened up. “Let’s sit here.”

“Sure thing Aika.” The girl, named Freesia, said with a smile. She stood up, grateful to be off of the hot metal bench. She sat down at the considerable cooler and more comfortable table, and began eating her meal with her friend. You cursed and swore, your one chance at freedom gone. You sank back into depression, resigning yourself to this fate. Freesia would wear you home, and you would be trapped as a part of her wardrobe for the rest of your life.

However, you were unaware of two little things that happened because of what had just transpired. First off, being a human, your body had been affected by the intense heat of the blistering metal bench. Your skin had changed into a light red color, courtesy of some mild burns. Because of this, your body made up a distinctly noticeable red blotch on the back of Freesia’s leggings.

Secondly, your girlfriend Mary and Kat were sitting only a few feet away, eating their own dinner. Mary had turned to look at the commotion, and almost had a heart attack when she saw the red blob on Freesia’s ass and thighs. There was no doubt in her mind that it was her lost boyfriend, and so she scrambled over to the two girls in a flash. She was coming to save you.

“Excuse me.” Mary politely spoke up, causing Freesia and Aika to set their food down and glance at her. “I believe you may have sat on something.” She pointed to Freesia.

“Did I?” Freesia pondered, standing up to check. She craned her neck to look behind her, but her impressively sized rear made it impossible for her to see. “I can’t see. A little help Aika.”

“Sure thing.” Aika jumped up and examined her best friend’s ass. All she could see was the light red outline of your body, though it didn’t look like a normal human body the way it was now. Aika looked at Mary. “Are you talking about this light red outline.”

“Yes.” Mary stammered. “It’s…uh…uh…gummy…gummy material. Red gummy material. I dropped it onto the roller coaster seat when I stood up. She must’ve sat in it.”

“Oh my gosh! I’m so sorry!” Freesia cried. “I would never have done something like that on purpose!”

“Yeah, we should’ve noticed sooner.” Aika admitted. “Okay, here’s what we’ll do.” She reached into her big purse and fumbled around for something. Mary fidgeted, on the edge of having a panic attack. She had no idea what Aika was about to do next. What does Aika pull out of her purse?

Ill just get these dyed tonight and no one will see the stain" She said, thinking she was assuring Mary, but in reality all she did was make her heart pound as a panic attack overtook her. With no where to go, you just soaked further through the fibers of her leggings until you covered her entire ass and part of the thigh area. The girls drove for what felt like hours, every bump in the road slamming her down on you. She dropped Aika off home before heading home herself. When she got there, she peeled off her leggings and looked at the "stain" that was on them. "Huh, gummy must have melted more on the ride home" She muttered to herself, seeing the faint red smear across the back of her leggings. She shrugged and poured a bowl of water out, before adding red dye to the mix, stirring it and and then stuffed her leggings in there. The dye quickly soaked through the fabric, leaving a foul taste in your mouth as you sank under the surface into the silent red gloom of the bowl.

A couple of hours later, you were fished out, the leggings now a uniform red, as well as your body. Freesia wrung the leggings out over the bowl before tossing you in the dryer to bake in the dye. As you tumbled about in the burning heat, you wondered if you would be in these leggings forever, never found, never rescued and always trapped under the ass of this girl?

Once you were dry she put you through the wash, just to get rid of the excess dye. You passed out during the spin cycle and awoke to find yourself fluttering on the washing line in her garden. Without her ass in the way, you could see a blurry view from the inside of her leggings, your face invisible but still there, pressed through the fibers. You saw a girls shadow moving towards you in the garden. Suddenly they came into your view, it was...

1111312.content:
The roller coaster slowly began to move out of the station, and the two girls that had put you into your current mess squealed with glee. The girl on top of you clenched herself tighter against the seat, further squashing your body underneath her. You felt your body sticking to the fabric of her leggings, and you hoped and prayed that this would not be your fate.

The car cranked up the first hill, and the girl’s weight was distributed backwards and downwards, increasing the intensity of the pressure she was putting on you. You wished to squirm and wiggle for her attention, but it was useless in your flattened form. This girl was oblivious to the torment she was putting you through, and it was going to stay that way for the foreseeable future.

The roller coaster reached the peak of the hill, and then it raced downwards at blinding speeds. The girl let out a scream of terror mixed with delight, and her scream pierced your ears. You winced in pain from the extreme scream she had just produced, but the girl was far from done. The girl screamed and squealed on every single dip and turn the roller coaster went through, and it made your ears mentally bleed.

The weirdest part was how it barely felt like you were on a roller coaster at all. The girl was pressing down on you so hard that all you felt was the occasional bump or turn. All sounds were muffled beneath the girl’s flesh, or else inaudible over her screams. The girl would also slightly grind you against the seat during a turn, but otherwise you felt oddly stationary. You hadn’t quite put together what this meant yet.

Finally, the ride came to an end. The roller coaster pulled into the station, and the two giddy teens jumped out. Thankfully, you were not stuck to the girl’s leggings, and you were in fact left in the car. However, you instead found yourself plastered to the seat, which was an equally bad position to be in.

Mary had also gotten up, and she was horrified to find two teenage girls leave from where you had been seated. She rushed to the back of the car, and gasped when she saw your flattened body stuck to the hard seat. You were ecstatic to see your girlfriend had come to rescue you, but everything was not okay yet.

Mary tried to peel you off of the seat, but the girl’s weight had done a number on you. She couldn’t even get her fingernails between you and the seat in order to peel you off. After a few minutes of trying, Mary sighed and backed away in defeat as the next group of people walked forward. Mary knew there was nothing she could do to stop the ride, as no one would believe her. Instead, she just had to wait for her chance.

Another stranger walked into view, and plopped down on top of you. You found yourself once more crushed underneath some girl’s body. The ride started up, and you were forced to endure the exact same torture all over again. This time the pain was even worse, as the new girl was significantly heavier. Eventually, the ride did come to an end again, but you were even more stuck than before.

Mary returned to try to rescue you again, but the results were the same. She had even more of a hard time trying to rescue you. You were sticking more and more to the seat, and she could tell. Mary swore under her breath trying to free you, which was a rare occurrence. You could tell how frustrated and upset she was at not being able to free you.

Unfortunately, Mary was not able to free you in time. The next group walked in, and yet another teen girl sat right on top of you, crushing you under her ass. Mary felt tears welling up as she watched the girl sit on you. This was beyond infuriating to her, that she was so helpless to save her own beloved boyfriend. She had no idea what to do.

What neither of you know is you have been crushed so very very flat, your body has become translucent, with the bright colour of the seat showing through your body and making it harder to spot you. 111131221.content:
“OH MY GOD!” Mary screamed, causing the woman to jump back in surprise. “THERE HE IS!!!” Tears of joy flowed from Mary’s face, and she rubbed your poor, flat, beaten body affectionately. The woman stood behind her and peered at the seat, and saw the faintest outline of a face.

“Huh. I guess I didn’t look close enough.” The supervisor sighed. She still thought that Mary was crazy, but there clearly was something stuck to the seat, and she didn’t want Mary to sue the park for damages.

“We’ve got to free him!” Mary exclaimed, and picked away at your body with her fingernails, but wasn’t able to find purchase on your micro-thin body.

“Hold on miss.” The supervisor pulled Mary to her feet. “It’s going to take a long time to free this thing from the seat. Perhaps hours.”

“He’s not a thing!” Mary stomped her foot angrily. “He’s my precious boyfriend.”

“Right. I’m sorry. The point is, you can’t just sit here for hours and free…uh…him. I’ll get one of my employees to do the job. Meanwhile, you can get a good night’s rest in the spare bed we keep in the employee lounge.”

“But…”

“I’m serious about this miss. A trained park employee will be along any minute now to free your…boyfriend…and they will take good care of him.” The supervisor seemed confident enough, and Mary finally calmed down and relented.

“Okay.” She mumbled, tinges of sleepiness finally hitting her. The supervisor led her to the employee lounge, and directed her to the bed. After that was taken care of, she brought out her radio.

“Hey Francesca. Did you leave the park yet.” She asked. A staticy voice responded.

“I was about to. Why?” The girl on the other end sounded fairly annoyed.

“Would you like a huge bonus?”

“What’s the catch?”

“Some girl got what I think is gummy material stuck on one of the roller coaster seats. It’s on there tight. For some reason, it’s precious to her, and she wants it back. I’m trying to avoid a law suit there. Can you work all night on getting that gummy stuff free?”

“ALL NIGHT?” Francesca cried. “This better be a damn big bonus. I’m on my way.”

“You’re a life saver. Have a good night!” The supervisor hung up and headed towards her office. Hopefully this would all turn out okay.

***

Fran arrived at the roller coaster storage room, carrying a big bucket of hot water and a wash cloth. She had a fair bit of knowledge about gummy material, and knew that gummy melted when subjected to intense heat. Her plan was simply to scrub at the gummy with the hot wash cloth until it finally all came off.

Once she spotted your faint outline, she sat down on a stool and got to work. The coarse wash cloth scrapped and scratched at your body, causing you to mentally wince in pain, but it was a far better fate than being a part of this seat for the rest of your life. You focused yourself, trying to take your mind off of the pain, because you knew you were in for a long night.

Fran had gotten to work at midnight, and it wasn’t until six in the morning that she had finally broken the invisible seal that had been holding your body. She had taken only two breaks, and had worked like a machine to try and free you. Almost instantly, your gummy body reflated an inch, and was quickly and efficiently dissolved by the hot water and sucked up into the wash cloth.

Francesca, who was struggling to keep her eyes open, smiled dully at seeing your body be sucked up into the wash cloth, as her job was now finally done. Unfortunately, the exhausted girl didn’t remember why she had freed you in the first place, and she simply dropped the wash cloth into the bucket of water and passed out. The wash cloth hung over the edge of the bucket, and you could see Fran’s peaceful, sleepy smile. You began to panic, as you were unable to reform while still contained in this heated wash cloth.

A few minutes later, a girl wearing long tan pants and a green shirt came walking up the stairs, and she rushed over to Fran’s side when she saw her. She coaxed Fran awake and then led the sleep-deprived girl down to the employee lounge. When the strange new girl arrived, she picked up the bucket and placed you onto a cart that was surrounded by two brooms, a giant mop, three spray bottles, and a few trash bags. The terrible truth hit you like a ton of bricks.

“Time to start the day!” The girl said with a happy smile, and she pulled a few levers on a nearby console. The roller coaster rolled back out onto the track, ready for the park customers to arrive in another hour. The girl, who was one of Adventure Land’s many janitors, pushed her cleaning cart into an elevator and down onto ground level, where she wheeled it into a nearby women’s bathroom.

You wiggled and squirmed with all your might, but your miniscule movements were not enough to get the girl’s attention. You looked up at her in horror, her cute face and infectious smile masking the terrible fate she had unknowingly doomed you to. She sprayed the dirty, messy countertops with cleaning fluid, and then dunked the wash cloth containing you into the hot water. As she raised you back out, your blurry eyes were able to read her nametag, which said “Hailey”.

Hailey slammed you down onto the counter, and began to thoroughly use you to scrub the crusty countertop of the women’s bathroom. She applied so much pressure that bits of your body leaked out of the wash cloth, and spiraled down the drain. You mentally screamed and cried for someone to save you, but there was no one around to answer your call. Hailey tormented you for the next hour, rubbing and wiping every dirty and horrid surface in the bathroom.

When she was done, she dunked you back into the bucket and wheeled her cart out into the park. Guests had arrived, and a new day had truly begun. Hailey headed off to the next bathroom, taking you with her. You mentally cried, wondering how you would escape this mess. Would anyone ever find you? Would you be able to reform? How big would you be when you reformed, as a decent amount of your gummy body had been sucked down the drain? These questions and more plagued you as Hailey continued her shift, pushing her cart all around the park.

11113122112.content:
With everything considered, the two weeks to come actually went by fairly well. Mary kept you safe and protected at her house, and you spent your days cuddling with your loving girlfriend in her room. Because of how drastic a change you had undergone, Mary had kept your existence as a tiny girl a secret, so only she was aware. This didn’t bother you too much, though you hoped to return to normal and see your mom again soon.
