Suddenly, Mary’s phone slipped out of her hand, landing down on your face. She bent down to pick you up, and took notice of how the previously tan floor mat had turned pink. This was because all of the grindings your body had been put through had caused your skin to be irritated, and thus turn a bright reddish-pink.

Mary cocked her head to the side in confusion, until all of the pieces suddenly fell into place. She gasped loudly, and quickly scooped you up off of the floor and into her arms. She rushed you upstairs, and took you into the bathroom. She ran the water over you, soaking you thoroughly. Any dirt that had been caked onto your body was washed off, and your normal self was revealed. Mary took a deep whiff, and could clearly pick up on the strawberry cheesecake scent.

“Oh my god Jackie!” Mary exclaimed. “How did this happen?” She knew you couldn’t respond, but she also knew that it soothed you to hear her voice. Mary cuddled you close to her chest. “I have to get you off of the floor mat!” She carried you into her bedroom, and set you down on her bed. Mary tried peeling your flat body free from the floor mat, but you were stuck tight.

“This isn’t working Jackie.” Mary sighed. A few moments later, her eyes lit up. “You know what…I think I know what will do the trick. I have some odds and ends chemicals downstairs that are sure to get you free from that floor mat. I don’t remember where I put them, so I’ll be back in a few minutes!” Mary kissed your body, and then ran out of her room. You watched her shut the door behind her, and then you were alone again.

It was moments like this that made you eternally grateful for Mary and everything that she did for you. Even though she had put you through so much pain over the past twenty four hours, she was also doing so much to help you. She was eternally loving and kind, and you couldn’t possibly ask for a better girlfriend.

Five minutes later the door swings open, but who is it that walks inside?
1113221.title: A Short Stint

choices: she is certain that its you, she gets her mom to help.
she thinks she was mistaken, puts you back by the front door.
11132212.content:
Mary came back in, carrying a tray with bottles of random chemicals on it. She looked flustered but confident that one of these things would help rescue her boyfriend from the doormat. "ok jackie, lets get you free from that smelly doormat shall we" she said, pulling on a pair of rubber gloves and picked up the first bottle and a sponge. She poured the blue chemical onto your now tan surface. It burnt and stung your skin as it touched but of course Mary couldn't hear your silent screams of pain.

She began scrubbing the chemical down into every inch of you, unaware of the agony she was putting you through. You could feel it trying to do something to your body but it didn't feel like it was seperating you from the mat. Under the surface your body bubbled and twisted, unseen by your loving girlfriend as she scrubbed it into you, your gummy body sucking up the chemical like a sponge.

After a few minutes Mary let out an annoyed huff "i don't think that one worked Jack" she said before pouring on the next one, some red chemical. on contact it felt like ice, your body going numb where it touched. Unfortunatly you couldn't comunicate what these things were doing to you so Mary kept trying, chemical after chemical, scrubbing after scrubbing. you felt your body changing, twitching and seeming to fuse to your surrounding. Your surface bubbled, looking like a rubbery door mat, with the bobbles to catch dirt. Your tan flesh had been scalded to a bright red that was not fading, it was as if she had dyed you.

Eventually Mary had gone through all the chemicals and sighed, looking unsure what to try now when suddenly her mother peeked through the doorway "Mary..what are you doing with the floor mat?" she asked, making Mary jump "wha...oh, its Jackie, he is fused to it." she said explaining. Tina laughed and walked in "sweetie, we got that Mat from Trish, i doubt she would give us her son to step on" she said with a chuckle.

Mary frowned "no seriously mom, im sure he is stuck on it." Tina sighed and crouched down taking a sniff "all i can smell is chemicals sweetie" she said, Mary rolled her eyes "well of course, ive used every chemical i can on him trying to get him free" Tina still looked doubtful. she slapped her hand down hard on you and lifted her hand "if this was Jack, wouldnt there be a hand print?" she asked, that slap had hurt like hell, but amazingly, you hadnt shifted at all. No change of colour, no indent, nothing. you had acted like a rubber sheet. Seeing that, Mary looked shocked. She ran her hands over you, feeling not a gummy surface, but a rubbery, solid surface. "but..i could have sworn..." she muttered confused.

You were panicing now. Clearly the mix of chemicals had done something weird to your body, you wernt soft and gummy anymore, you were solid, unmoving and rubbery. This was bad, this was scary. The worst part however was the look of uncertainty on Mary's face. Seeing no change to your surface and feeling the rubbery material under her fingertips. "i could have sworn it went pink...i thought...." it looked like she was beginning to doubt that you really were her boyfriend and not a mat she mistook for him. You could do nothing but stare up at her, mentally pleading that she stay strong and keep believing in you until they fixed what happened to you...
11132212.title: Mary returns with the chemicals, but they only ...

choices: Miraculously, the combined mud and sweat reverse the chemicals' effects!
The mud and sweat do nothing but make you even more dirty and disgusting.
111322122.content:
Mary looked at you as hard as she could, trying to discern any clue from your rubbery and beaten body that would prove to her that you were in fact her precious, squishy boyfriend. Mary leaned so close that you could taste her warm breath washing over you. After a minute, Tina groaned loudly.

“Oh for heavens sake Mary!” Tina exclaimed. She grabbed you with her toes and then yanked you away from Mary, pulling you across the ground. Once you were a few feet away, Tina stomped on you over and over again, her giant feet battering you senseless. You mentally screamed and screamed from the pain, but of course your silent cries were useless.

“Mom!” Mary cried, horrified. She scurried towards you, but Tina yanked you back again. She continued to grind you mercilessly under her feet.

“It's just a stupid floor mat Mary.” Tina declared. “You can't live your entire life thinking every squishy or tan object in existence is your boyfriend. He hasn't even been gone a day for god's sake! For all we know he just went on a walk!” Mary was surprised at her mother's suddenly angry outburst, and she moved back a few feet. Tina noticed her daughter's discomfort.

“Look Mary, I know how much you love Jackie.” Tina began, plopping down onto the floor in front of her daughter. Of course, that meant her giant, jiggly ass was firmly planted onto your body, crushing you flat under all of her weight. Her ass completely covered up your entire body, and the intense pressure was painfully squashing you.

“I do love him.” Mary nearly whispered, tears beginning to well up in her eyes. “I love him so much.”

“I know Mary. I know. But the thing is, you can't devote your entire life to his safety. He has to learn how to take care of himself, and you need to learn how to let loose and relax without him around. You know that Jackie always turns up in the end. So just look on the bright side, and wait for the moment where Jackie shows up at our front door a few days from now. At the most. He could be back in just a few hours.” Tina smiled at her daughter, and the inspirational speech she had delivered made a noticeable impact.

“Thanks a lot mom!” The two girls hugged, and then Tina stood up. She began to walk out of the room.

“Make sure you take that floor mat back downstairs where it belongs.” Tina reminded. “Also, I'm going on a run with Trish. I should be back in an hour or two. Muddy and sweaty, and ready to use that floor mat.” Tina giggled as she walked downstairs, while your blood ran cold at her remarks. To your horror, you heard Mary laugh along as well. Your girlfriend, the only person who could free you had disregarded you as a normal floor mat thanks to Tina!

Mary picked you up and carried you downstairs. You tried anything you could to get her attention, but it was worthless. Those stupid chemicals had really done a number on you. If only there was some kind of solvent to the chemicals. Mary set you down in front of the front door, and then looked down at you with a smirk.

“Hah. Stupid floor mat.” Mary grinned. “My darling Jackie is fine, I know he is. From this moment onward, I vow to live my life with myself as priority one, and Jackie second.” With that, Mary turned and walked upstairs. You watched her cute butt sway back and forth until she disappeared from view, leaving you helpless and alone.

You were consistently amazed at how terrible situations could become so much worse in such small amounts of time. First you looked like a floor mat, and now you had practically become one thanks to the chemicals Mary had used. And thanks to Tina, Mary had now vowed to stop caring about your troubles as much, severely limiting her ability to help you from this day forward. You felt like crying, as there was nothing else you could do.

Two hours later, the front door swung open and you looked up in fear at the towering form of Tina. She was absolutely drenched in sweat, and she was caked in wet, gooey mud from the calves down. She started to step into the house, and her massive, sneakered feet rose above you. You braced yourself for the worst.
111322122.title: The Cursed Chemicals

choices: The chemical just cleans you even more. Long live the floor mat.
The chemical undoes the effects and your finally scrubbed free.
1113221222.content:
Of course, Mud and Sweat did nothing to help you. All it did was make you muddy and dirty like a real floor mat, your body did a great job. With the rubbery bobbles you picked off every single bit of mud from her shoes, leaving the carpet totally clean as she stepped off you. You really wanted to cry, your body wasn't reforming, it had become solid and rubbery and it was a floor mat. How were you going to get out of this one?

The days passed with everyone walking over you, Mud and dirt and twigs caking your surface. Whenever you got too filthy, they simply scrubbed you clean in the back garden and put you back infront of the door. No one, not even Mary took a second glance at you now. You saw your mother come to visit, you saw Stacy and Emma frequently, but no one ever recognised the boy turned floor mat.

Days turned into weeks, which in turn turned into months. You had listened to christmas come and go, being able to do nothing but stare up at peoples legs as they rubbed their feet in your face and mentally shivered from the snow. You began to feel that this would be your life now, helplessly trapped as a floor mat with no one knowing you were alive. The worst part was Stacy and Emma had begun mentioning to Mary about moving on and finding a new boyfriend as you had been gone so long. All you could do was listen as Marys refusals became less and less convincing to their ideas.

During the middle of the next summer, Tina had gotten a new rubber cleaner spray with some funky new chemicals. As you were currently caked in mud, she took you out to the garden to get cleaned but first, she sprayed the chemical all over you. It tingled and stung before she began scrubbing with the brush at you...
1113221222.title: The mud and sweat do nothing but make you even ...

choices: Try to get Tina's attention while she's making dinner.
Try to get Mary's attention while she's relaxing in her room.
11132212222.content:
Tina shook the spray can a few times before letting the chemical mist spread across your entire body. The droplets of chemical fluid landed on your body, causing you to mentally cry out in pain. The fluid burned your eyes, stung your flesh, and felt like you had been burned alive in lava. It was pain unlike anything you had ever experienced in your life.

At the same time, the chemical mist had a strange effect on your body, which caused your gummy self to deteriorate and break apart. You began to dissolve, becoming less and less like a solid. It was a strange experience, as it felt like your body was being torn apart, but you could definitely feel the floor mat’s grip on you loosening.

Tina reached for a rag to wipe the mat with, and your freedom was finally granted. As your girlfriend’s mother scrubbed, your body was peeled away in globs, landing in the grass and dirt at Tina’s feet in clumps. Tina rubbed and scratched for five minutes, until every last bit of you was buried in the dirt and free from the floor mat.

She wiped the sweat off of her forehead, a satisfied smile on her face. She slapped the mat a few times for good measure, and then headed back inside the house, without a second thought. Your gummy body laid out on the ground, not yet used to not being a floor mat, which you had been for the past year. In fact, it took you most of the day to reform your body from it’s melted down state, and even then, everything was not as it should be.

A large portion of your gummy body had dripped into the soil, and no doubt been absorbed by the multitude of flowers and plants in the garden. You found yourself at a measly one foot tall, though it was better than being converted to nutrients for a cabbage. You climbed out of the garden, pausing only to wash off your dirty body in a small puddle of water.

You headed back in the direction of the house, and soon found yourself staring up at the large back door towering above you. You had no idea how you were supposed to get in, only that you should. It would be far too dangerous to head back to your house at this height. You needed to get Mary’s attention, and hope she could keep you safe while you reformed back to your natural, three feet height.

Just then, the back door swung open, causing you to fly backwards. You glanced up and saw that it was Mary, your gorgeous girlfriend, tossing a bag of trash out onto the patio. You rolled out of the way to dodge the trash bag and yelled up to Mary. However, you failed to notice the headphones in her ears, and your cries were drowned out. Mary simply turned around, letting the door being to close behind her.

You dashed forward and jumped, landing inside Mary’s house right before the door slammed shut. You were in the kitchen, and Tina was busy rushing around, grabbing different items to prepare for the family’s dinner. Loud music was playing on a small stereo, which pretty much ruled out yelling for her attention. Gary was at Andrew’s house, so it was just the two Evans females at home for the night. You barely got a glimpse of Mary strolling out of the kitchen. She was presumably heading up to her bedroom for a while.

You were at a loss for how to proceed at this point. Tina presented a much more convenient way of getting yourself noticed, though she tended to be fairly oblivious. This point was accentuated as Tina approached you, and you dove aside to avoid getting crushed under her feet. The titanic woman had her full attention on preparing a delicious meal, and was lost in the groove of her music. There was also something about her big ass and large chest, constrained in tight leggings and a sports bra, that terrified you.

Mary was your other option, and would probably be safer. Of course, she was listening to music too, so you would have to get close to her to get her attention. She could also be fairly oblivious, and ending up crushed in your girlfriend’s room was a place you had been too many times. There would be hundreds of ways for things to go wrong. Of course, getting baked into a meal in the kitchen was also a fairly traumatizing alternative.

In the end, which course of action do you choose to pursue?
11132212222.title: One Step Forward, One Step Back

choices: ...in the squishy dough, ready to be tossed in the oven.
...in the bowl of strawberries, ready to be dropped into the blender.
111322122221.content:
Eventually, you decided that trying to get Tina’s attention would save a lot of time, and was therefore the better alternative. Gulping down your fear, and letting out your anxiety with a shake, you began walking closer to the towering, curvaceous beauty. The sooner you got her attention, the better.

Glancing to the side while approaching Tina, you noticed that she appeared to be gathering together a mound of dough, and was in the process of shaping it. The oven was on preheat, so it was clear the she would be putting the dough in the oven to make a loaf of homemade bread as soon as she was ready.

Your moment of zoning out almost cost you, as Tina whirled around without warning to check the timer on the oven. Her left foot smacked into you, causing you to stumble and fall. Tina’s foot rested on top of you, squashing your lower half flat and keeping you pinned. To your utter astonishment, the titanic woman didn’t even feel you. She was super focused on her cooking.

You had to wait until Tina herself moved off of you before you could begin reforming again. As soon as she did, you began to pop back to normal, making sure to pay more attention this time. However, nothing could have prepared you for Tina tripping over her own two feet. Your surprised scream was drowned out by Tina’s own cry as the giantess toppled to the floor.

Her gigantic, sports bra clad breasts crashed down onto your body, crushing you painfully. Her breasts were several times your size, and they easily pulverized you under their weight. As Tina groaned and stood back up, you found yourself partially stuck to the front of her left bra cup. Oblivious, Tina went back to working, leaning over the counter as she molded the dough with her hands. In this state, the dough was still soft and squishy.

Without Tina knowing, you drifted free of the sports bra, landing in a crumpled heap on the counter. To your right, Tina worked dutifully on the dough. As your body started to slowly, slowly reform, you tried to shimmy closer to Tina so she would notice you. Unfortunately, she was much too focused to even spot your tiny, tan, squishy form.

As you wiggled uselessly, you realized that right behind you was the kitchen sink. In the sink was a large bowl partially filled with strawberries. A new wave of fear washed over you upon seeing this. Right beside the dough Tina was molding was a blender, which already had two cups prepared beside it. Tina was probably planning on making a strawberry smoothie for herself and Mary.

At that moment, the oven dinged, and Tina whirled around. As she did so, her sizable rear smacked against the counter, her jiggly flesh tightly constrained by her leggings dragging along. Her big bubble butt bumped into you, and tossed your small squishy form. You let out a mental scream of terror as you sailed through the air and landed…
111322122221.title: Tina the Clumsy Chef

choices: It works, Mary sees the bag twitch a little while later.
No one spots the wriggling, you are donated with the clothing.
111322122222.content:
In the end, your girlfriend was the better choice. Carefully, you ran out the kitchen before Tina could accidentally mix you into the meal or crush you underfoot. You sprinted up the stairs, heading right into Mary's room. Her door was ajar but you quickly saw that her headphones were still in her ears, stopping any hope of an easy reunion. You sighed walking over to her as she tidied her Closet. You could see a load of clothing piled up on either side of her, clearly she was going through her outfits and getting rid of those she didn't need.

You carefully walked up behind her, unsure if you should wait for her to turn and see you or if you should poke her in the back of the leg to get her attention. After a few moments, shivering in your nudity, you decided to poke her. Walking up to her, you suddenly were engulfed in shadow. You cried out as a skirt was tossed ontop of you. You had gotten too close to one of the piles. A casual kick from her leg to shove the skirt onto the pile properly had you propelled into the mass of fabric. Your stomach slightly squashed from the impact.

You pulled the skirt off your head, only to be met with the petticoats of one of Mary's old dresses from when she was smaller. Mary was quick at what she was doing and you found yourself being buried in fabric faster than you could pull it off, eventually ending up hidden in the middle of the pile. Clearly it was the clothing Mary was getting rid of, which meant it was not a place to be hidden in. You struggled and squirmed to get loose, but the fabric kept shifting around you, making traction hard.

You suddenly felt the clothes around you compact as Mary crouched down and scooped them all up in her arms, unknowingly flattening you out against them. She stuffed them into a bag, having to shove a few times to make it fit. By the end of it, you could feel yourself sticking to something from the pressure and desperatly tried to call out to Mary, though your mouth was flattened and what little squeak you could made was muffled to silence by the clothes, even if Mary didn't have her headphones in.

She tied the bag shut and left it by her bedroom door. Tina had asked her to sort through her old clothes to donate them to a local charity shop, now she was accidentally donating her long lost boyfriend. Inside the bag you desperatly tried to wriggle, to squirm, to do anything to get someones attention!
111322122222.title: Try to get Mary's attention while she's...

choices: It's a complete stranger!
It's someone you know!
1113221222222.content:
Inside the darkness of the bag, you tried with all of your might to wiggle and squirm to freedom. You focused all of your efforts on reforming and leaving this prison your girlfriend had unknowingly tossed you into. It was all for nothing however, as you were much to squished in your current position to be able to do anything at all.

You wallowed in misery for the next twenty minutes, mentally sobbing. You could hear the muffled sounds of Mary laughing as she scrolled through social media posts, reclining on her bed just a few feet away from you. Fate was always so cruel to you. After all this time, happiness had been within reach, only to be forcibly yanked away.

Finally, Tina knocked on the door, and grabbed the bag of clothes. You were jostled back and forth as your girlfriend’s mother dragged the bag downstairs, outside, and tossed it into the trunk of her car. You heard the sound of the engine being turned on, and the rumble of the car as it pulled out of the driveway and down the road. Your fate had been sealed, and you mentally screamed.

Tina reached the Salvation Army, which was just a few blocks down the road, and dumped the bag of clothes into the slot outside the door. The bag tumbled down into a processing room, where a volunteer worker ripped it open. The volunteer sorted through the various clothes, finally picking up the item that you had found yourself attached to.

“Oh. That’s a cute skirt!” The girl smiled, and you cried out in agony. Your flat body was engrained into the inside back of the skirt. Not only did this hide you from view, but it meant you would be painfully crushed under the ass of whoever decided to purchase you. What you didn’t know however, was that everything was about to become a thousand times worse.

“I think this is a gummy skirt.” The girl mused, rubbing her fingers along the skirt. She had yet to spot your body. Unfortunately, your tan blob of a body blended in quite well with the tan skirt. Of course you had been crushed to a tan skirt! “Better spray it, just to be safe.”

Hearing these words, you experienced a wave of terror and shock so intense that you actually passed out. While unconscious, the girl picked up a tiny bottle of Beta4, and did a quick coat around the skirt. The chemical mist settled on your body, and your gummy self bonded to the gummy fabric of the skirt in seconds. Now your cruel predicament had transcended to the level of a living nightmare.

Completely sealed into this skirt prison, you were helpless as the volunteer worker delicately placed you into a cart filled to the brim with other donated clothes. Another worker pushed the cart out into the main store, where yet another worker picked up the skirt you were attached and three other skirts and headed off.

This third worker pinned a five-dollar price tag to the skirt, and slid it up onto a hanger. You regained consciousness just in time to see the worker’s legs turn and walk out of sight. You struggled for a moment, before remembering that the Beta4 spray had now made you a permanent addition to the skirt, at least until some solvent came along and saved your life.

Your daily experience for the next week was to hang on the rack and contemplate how horrible your life was. You could only see out from the bottom of the skirt, and even then you could only see women’s legs as they milled about, looking for cheap clothing. It was a mind-numbingly boring week, and one you wished desperately to escape from.

The next day, you finally got your wish. However, it was because someone arrived and slipped the skirt off of the rack, bringing it up to the cash register. Mind racing, you tried desperately to figure out who had just purchased you. Who in the world was about to add a skirt which held a living person captive to their collection?
1113221222222.title: Donated

choices: she hasnt got a change of clothes, risks it, might spill solvent.
She changes into something else, no risk of solvent on her skirt.
11132212222221.content:
Your lifelong stream of luck continued as usual. The person who was purchasing your skirt prison was not anyone you had ever met, nor did they know of the existance of squishy boys. Clarissa was smiling to herself as she paid for the cute skirt she had just found. She smiled happily to the cashier as the skirt and a few other new garments were folded up and slipped into a bag. She slipped the handles of the back over her arm all the way to her elbow and walked out the store. Pulling out her phone she texted her friends about her cute new clothes and about meeting up later.

She headed to the opposite side of town from where you, Mary and everyone you knew lived, tossing the bag holding her unaware captive on her bed as she kicked off her shoes. Clarissa slid her skinny jeans down her legs and kicked them off, leaving them in a pile near her full length mirror, then she did the same with her top. Grabbing the clothing out of the shopping bag she dropped the skirt close to the floor and stepped in. You watched from the shadowy gloom as her feet shot past you and then felt yourself rising up as she pulled the skirt up, you stared directly at the heart design on her panties right over her crotch. The skirt was loose and fluttery as she slipped her new top on and made poses infront of the mirror to see how it looked.

You swished, you twirled and you fluttered with her movements, wishing with all your heart that she would discover and free you. As she twirled a bit with a giggle, your skirt flipped and she caught a flash of something on the inside. Curious of what she saw, she grabbed the hem and lifted, looking at you in the reflection. She looked confused for a few moments before her shocked look slowly broke into a smirk "oh wow, it almost looks like a boys face" she said to herself, thinking you were some funny design. She giggled as your hopes of rescue plummeted. "Hello little skirt boy, god, stop staring at my crotch" She laughed at her own joke and let go, letting her skirt flutter back down. As far as she was concerned, you were just a funny pattern, not a living person, so she quickly went back to her posing, deciding if she should wear the outfit tonight or not.

You wanted to cry, she had seen you but because she didnt know about you, she thought you were just a design of her skirt. You were doomed to remain in her clothing collection unless she had solvent spill on you, which didnt seem likely. You remained in a depressed state the rest of the day, ignoring her movements as she walked about the house, had dinner with her parents, went to the cinema with her friends and eventually kicked you off to go to bed.

The next day you went through the wash with the rest of her dirty clothes, her mother also giggling at your design as she pegged you up on the line to dry. After that, you were hung up in Clarissa's closet with the rest of her things and spent the next few days just hanging around. Finally Clarissa wore you again, but it was to go to school. It turned out that she went to your rival school, so again there was no hope of being recognised and rescued. In a detatched way you listened to gossip and her life go on from the perspective of a skirt, wondering if you would ever get free of this gummy garment.

Days turned to weeks, which turned to months before you heard her textiles teacher say to the class as she sat wearing you "Ok girls, we are going to be making gummy clothing today. If any of you are wearing something gummy, you might want to change into something else incase you spill solvent on it" a tiny spark of hope rose in your flattened chest, hoping against hope that she would spill solvent on you and end this nightmare.

what does Clarissa do?
11132212222221.title: a strangers wardrobe

choices: they eventually check the vacuum and find your compressed dusty form.
they don't think to check it and later empty the contents into the bin.
112.content:
"can you clean the house while i finish moving boxes out of storage please sweetie?" your Mom asks sweetly, giving you the look she knows you cant say no to. you groan but nod reluctantly. she gives you a happy hug before heading off to get some more boxes. with extreme reluctance you grab the vacuum cleaner and begin vacuuming the rooms.

for a normal sized person it would be a big chore. for someone as small as you who had to be careful not to get too close to the suction it was a long job. you didn't notice your girlfriend knocking on the door over the sound of the vacuum. though Mary had visited enough to eventually just let herself in. as she walked through the hall she tripped over the plug of the vacuum and pulled it out the wall. instantly losing power as you were using the nozzle attachment to get behind the couch. confused thinking something big might have gotten stuck in it you peer into the now silent machine.

at that moment, Mary being helpful out in the hall plugs the plug back into the socket and the vacuum roars back to life, within seconds the nozzle has sucked to your face and two seconds later you are compressed tight inside the tiny container inside the machine covered and blended in with a load of dust and dirt.

Mary peers in and sees the lonely vacuum. she shrugs and turns the machine off, once again trying to be helpful she puts it away in the closet. she was just about to call to you when your mother spotted her while holding too many boxes "oh Mary, thank goodness. can you help me with these boxes quickly" Mary smiled "of course" she rushed over to help your mother, unaware she had left you stuck inside the vacuum she just put away.

their movement of boxes took a good couple more hours as they chatted, your mother telling Mary how you were busy with chores so Mary didn't wonder about your whereabouts.

eventually as they finished and were sipping lemonade, they looked around to see where you were for a break. when they couldn't find you they began to look in places you might get stuck doing chores. though as the vacuum was already put away it might be a while before they checked in there...
112.title: Clean the house!

choices: Yes, and she finds you and recognizes you.
No, and you remain trapped in her butt crack for the rest of her bath.
Yes, but she only sees you as a sqiushy tan lump.
1121.content:
Mary and your mom searched all over your house for you, never once checking inside the closet for the vacuum. For some reason, it just never crossed their minds that you might be in there, and they eventually gave up. They continued to do chores around the house, walking past the closet several times. Trapped and crushed up inside the vacuum, you silently cried every time they passed you by.

Two hours later, your mom headed down into the basement to carry some more boxes. She was sweaty and tired, but she knew that the boxes were her last chore. Mary walked to the front entrance of your house to leave, when suddenly the vacuum cleaner popped into her head.

Feeling silly for forgetting to check the vacuum cleaner, Mary opened up the closet and pulled out the vacuum. She opened up the bag in the back, and immediately spotted your crumpled up and dirty form. She gasped in surprise, and yanked you out, returning the vacuum cleaner to the closet.

“Oh my god Jackie!” She exclaimed. “I’m such an idiot! I should have checked the vacuum first!” She rushed you upstairs, and entered the bathroom. She closed the drain on the sink, and filled it up with water. When the sink was full, she stopped the water, and was about to drop you in when she hesitated.

She realized that she could let you soak in the tub instead of the sink, as no one was using the tub. That way, you would have space to reform once all of the dirt and dust had washed off of you.

Knowing that this was a better idea, she filled up the tub with nice warm water, waiting until the tub was filled up all the way

You screamed and screamed as the blender grinded your hand to liquid, pulling the rest of your arm in next. Your body began to squish and compress, as you were sucked more and more into the blender. You fought against it as much as you could. Sadly, you were in too much of a panic to even consider just turning the stupid machine off.

The rest of your body was crumpled up into a tan blob, which slipped easily into the blender. The rest of your body was quickly and efficiency stirred and whirled into a liquidy form, until every inch of you had turned into the consistency of a milkshake. The blender, being of a special “smart” brand, recognized its job was done, and turned off on its own.

All you had wanted to do was make a simple milkshake. Now, because of your own stupidity and you penchant for freak accidents, you had become the milkshake you had tried to make. Because of your body’s special properties, you also smelled just like a strawberry milkshake, and probably tasted like one too. Worse still was the fact that no one knew of your plight.

Just then, you heard the sound of the front door being opened. You heard muffled sounds, which you could just barely make out as the tired voices of your mother and Barbara, back from their run. You hoped that they would save you, until you realized that they would probably be the ones to bring about your demise.

The two giantesses stomped into the kitchen, making their way into your view. Everything was fuzzy from within the blender, but you could still make out their towering frames.

“Oh wow! A milkshake!” The voice of your mother cried out. “Barbara! You didn’t have to.” Trish immediately assumed Barbara had made the milkshake for her before the run. Trish grabbed the blender, and you braced yourself for the worst.

“Uh…you’re welcome.” Barbara was confused, but not one to pass up praise. She looked at you suspiciously for several seconds, before everything clicked in her mind. She knew that it was really you in the blender. However, does she save you from being consumed by your unaware mother?
11212111.title: Kitchen Catastrophe

choices: You don't reform before a custom gummy order is placed
You reform and try to sneak out unseen, still naked.
112121111.content:
Your mother raised your glass container to her lips, you saw your immediate future flash before your eyes, your mother would savour your taste, slosh you around in her mouth before greedily gulping you down where you would then splash down into the boiling stomach acid and bubble gently along with anything else your mother ate that day. Eventually you would be digested, whatever nutrients you provided would be extracted and you would be compacted into waste. Deposited in a toilet bowl and flushed off for a long stay in the water sanitation plant while your body slowly recovered, buried in waste...

Just as you felt your mother tilt the glass upwards however, Barbara yelled out "Trish wait!" Your mother froze, your liquids form just touching her lip. "I didn't make you a milkshake... If it's strawberry I'm pretty sure jacks had an accident with the blender again!" You couldn't believe it, twice today Barbara had saved you, was she ill?

You saw your mothers eyes widen and she put the glass back down and frowned at your liquid form "Jack what have I told you about using the blender unsupervised? What if I had drank you? Your lucky Barbara was here to save you!" With that your mother stormed off angrily to get showered and Barbara chuckled looking down at you "wow Jack that's two you owe me now" she teased. "Well I'm going to go shower back home. I'll pop by later to see you and your mom." She waved and casually walked off leaving you in the glass container.

A short while later your mother returned, freshly dressed and washed. She fussed about the kitchen tidying up before glancing back over at you. By now you had congealed in your container. No longer liquid but a featureless blob. She sighed scooping you out like a big wad of dough. "What am I going to do with you Jack, you never listen to my warnings. I'm only trying to keep you safe."

She looked thoughtful, absent mindedly kneading your dough like form with the hand that held you. "Perhaps you need more punishment and less rescuing to make you think more" you heard her mutter. You began to worry, you remembered the few times your mother had decided to punish you. She designed toys and clothes for a living and could be quite imaginative when called upon.

She seemed to make up her mind and nodded to herself "yes, maybe not being rescued for a while will make you think before you act" she said and found a Tupperware pot. She stuffed you in tightly before sealing the lid. Watching through the plastic you saw her drop you in her handbag and zip it shut. The world began to move as clearly she had picked up her bag.

Trish sighed hoping she was doing the right thing as she walked to her car and dropped her bag on the back seat. She knew sooner or later you always came back safely, maybe an extended excursion on your own would teach you caution. She started the car and began to drive.

Driving into the city centre she parked and headed into a expensive wedding store, browsing all the gorgeous gowns casually and saw some girls getting fitted into their dresses for prom. She snuck towards the back and smiled seeing what she wanted. This store used the same gummy material to make some of its things that she used to make gummy doll dresses at work. Gummy had become quite a popular fabric.

Confident you would blend in here safely while you reformed while being unlikely to be used, she took out your pot and scooped you out, placing you by the gummy material pots and whispered "ok Jack sweetie, it's up to you to make it home. See you soon!" You watched in silent despair as she stood up straight and walked away. You had no idea where you were but you saw half made dresses on mannequins all over the place. You wriggled and squirmed trying to reform to chase after your mother...
112121111.title: Yes, she alerts Trish to your whereabouts.

choices: Someone that you know!
A complete stranger!
1121211111.content:
You struggled and squirmed for all it was worth, still reeling from what your mother had done. How could she ever think placing you in such a dangerous situation would be acceptable? Didn’t she know how terrible luck and the will of fate always had it out to ruin your life? Sure enough, something terrible was about to happen once again.

A store employee walked over to the table you were on, and you glanced up at her in fear. The girl checked a clipboard she had in her hand, and then looked down at the table. She grabbed a few globs of gummy material and tossed them into a small box. Just when you thought your luck had pulled through, the girl grabbed you as well. Not recognizing you as more than just simple gummy material, she tossed you into the box too.

The employee carried the box into a room at the back of the store, and handed it off to yet another girl. The second girl was the store’s most experience seamstress, and she had excessive training in using gummy material. She had constructed hundreds of gorgeous gummy wedding dresses, and this dress would be no different. She dumped you and the rest of the material onto her sewing desk, and got to work.

Before you could even attempt to renew your struggles and squirm, the girl slammed her fist down onto the table, squashing you as flat as paper. You winced from the pain, but not as much as you winced seeing the girl crack her knuckles and grip your head and feet with her hands. You were soon being stretched and pulled violently in every direction, and the pain was incredible.

Finished, the girl dropped you back to the table as an elongated tan blob. She repeated the process with the rest of the material she had been given, and then she reached under her table for something. You had no idea what it might be. Your eyes nearly bulged from the sockets as you saw the girl pull out an intricate and deadly sewing machine.

The seamstress wasted no time setting up the machine and her material, placing you in the specific area that she wanted. The sewing machine was aligned, and the needle began its work. The roar of the machine was ear shattering to you, but you could just barely hear the sounds of the girl humming a little ditty to herself as she worked. She was a nice girl at heart, and would have rescued you in a heartbeat if she had recognized you as more than simple gummy material.

The needle of the sewing machine drew closer and closer, until finally it was on top of you. The needle dug into your body, ripping holes right through your squishy flesh. You mentally screamed for about a second, before you passed out from shock. Your world went dark and your body limp as the employee continued with her task.

***

When your eyes fluttered open an hour later, your fate had been sealed. You had no idea what had happened to you, or even where you were. Everything was dark, and you couldn’t feel or smell anything. What the hell had that girl done to you?

The truth was nightmarish. You had been sewn together with the rest of the gummy material, and now comprised a beautiful wedding dress. Your body was located on the butt part of the dress, so hours of being squashed by asses was in your future.

It got worse however. The store you were in made special use of the new formula called Beta4. Thanks to the Beta4 spray, all gummy material became essentially frozen in its shape for all eternity. Your only hope was a rare solvent, but only your mother carried that. The dress had also been dyed pitch black by special request, so you were totally unrecognizable.

You heard the fain voices of women talking, and you knew that you had probably already been purchased and were at your new owners house. Your mother had unintentionally sealed you in this terrible fate, but maybe there was a silver lining. Who had purchased you?
1121211111.title: The Perfect Wedding Dress

choices: Your mums at the party, Barbara tells her about her custom order
Barbara goes to the party with Diane, no one finds you
11212111111.content:
You listened to the muffled voices feeling there was something familiar about one of them. You tried to move to hear better but thanks to the Beta4 you were as limp as any other piece of material. Suddenly you heard a door being opened and light flooded in showing you the shape of the dress, it had a poofy skirt and puffed up shoulders like some gothic Disney princess. You saw the shape from its shadow st the back of the wardrobe, allowing you to fully understand where on the dress you were.

The voices were now clear and your blood went cold as you heard Barbara say "isn't it adorable Diane?" She exclaimed, you felt slight movement and heard the brushing of fabric, most likely having just had her stroking the gummy material. You knew Diane, she was one of Barbara's friends from her sorority days and just as careless and cruel to you as Barbara herself.

You heard her voice next chuckling "your gonna look like a gothic Barbie doll. Was it really worth the money for a costume party? Wedding stores are expensive" you listened, unable to do much else. Barbara replied "looking the best is always worth the cost. Besides the gummy material will last a lifetime and I can imagine I'm crushing that little brat Jack" she added with sadistic laughter. You had always known she didn't like you, you never knew why but now you had proof of her feelings.

Little did either of them know that you were indeed part of her expensive costume. You didn't want to live forever in your cruel neighbours wardrobe, though unless your mother somehow found you, that was likely to be your future.

Barbara closed the door with a click returning you to darkness and muffling their voices again as they left the room leaving you alone until the party...

You walked out of the back to see that no one was in the store. You walked oveR to the door and pushed it to see if it would open. To your suprise, it did! Apparently it only locked on the outside so you could leave any time you wanted.

You shouted for joy before remembering once again your lack of clothes. You decide to look around the store in hopes that there would be something for you wear that wasn't a dress. You didn't find anything, but you did find a bunch of naked maniquins of all sizes in a crate in the back room. You realize that if you just wait around in the store that someone would find you in the morning. You also realize that with your luck you would most likely end up a dress some how. You think about getting in the crate to disguise yourself as one of the maniquins. You also relize that you could just run for it and hope you reach home and back into the safety of home. The downside is that you would have to run naked. You ponder your options before deciding to...
1121211112.title: You reform and try to sneak out unseen, still n...

choices: a few days later your mother comes back looking for you
a few months later Mary is coming in for her prom dress
11212111121.content:
Deciding that running through town naked has never worked well in the past, you decide to hide in the crate of Mannequins for the night, hoping that someone might come in tomorrow with a bag you can hide in or something to sneak out safely. You settle down with a bunch of Mannequins your size, with your grown out hair you look alot like them, obviously not adult mannequins so your flat boy chest isnt an obvious difference. Worried about being spotted though you reluctantly squish your junk flat and smooth like the sexless mannequins you are sharing a crate with and close your eyes to sleep.

You are woken up by the sound of the door being unlocked and the click of heels as the staff come in for a day of work, remembering where your hiding you quickly smile slightly like the other mannequins, check your junk is still squished and hold your pose. A woman glances down at the open crate of mannequins for a moment as she passed but your disguise worked and she doesn't spot a thing. Unfortunatly it seems she is designing today and stays within eyeline of you. You really want to blink but you dont want to give yourself away as you watch her begin to mold some gummy material out, making it into the bodice of a dress. Thanking your lucky stars she didn't have to do this design yesterday when you were reforming.

After what felt like an eternity she had made a rather pretty dress out of alot of gummy material, you saw her get out a spray can and spray a thick mist over it, you realised that must be Beta4 to lock its shape and make its fabric soft. With horror you realise the mist is drifting down onto your open crate, but you realise it too late to react. The chemical hits your skin and you feel your entire body tense up as if it becomes made of plastic. Now unable to make a sound or move a muscle you can only lie in the crate, your hopes of sneaking away dashed until someone sprays you with solvent.

You pray she will find she made a mistake and spray the dress with some solvent so you can reap the rewards of it, but of course that wasn't your luck. Another woman came in and smiled at the dress "ooh nice design. im just going to put our little flower girls and junior bridesmaid mannequins up on display. you dont need my help right?" the other woman, focused on her designing just shook her head and your crate was dragged away from her. You found youself dragged to a display of mannequins dressed like a wedding party, there was the blushing bride, the happy groom, the mother of the bride, some bridesmaids in matching purple dresses and now it seemed, you. The womans hands gripped you and lifted you out of the crate, clearly not feeling any difference between you and the real mannequins now you had been stiffened by the Beta4.

You could only mentally cry as your gentle smiling face gave away no emotion other than blank joy as she posed you, dressed you in a pretty white poofy flower girls dress that came to the knee, a pair of glittery tights and pure white shoes with a strap. your hair was styled with a girls white glittery headband and a flower clip and some cute makeup added to your smiling face. a flower basket was hooked into your hand and the woman stood back, admiring the finished display in the store before heading off to the next display with the other mannequins. You were panicing, trapped in a wedding store, out of sight of any passerby, dressed like a cute little flower girl. Unable to move, you wondered how long you would be trapped in this store mistaken for a mannequin...
11212111121.title: Hide in the crate of maniquins

choices: The meeting goes off without a hitch, but what happens to you afterwards?
During the meeting, Camila spills the bottle of solvent all over you.
112121111211.content:
Three days passed, while you could do nothing but stand motionless in the position that the store girl had placed you into. Your mouth ached from your wide smile, but there wasn’t a thing you could do about it. It seemed as if you were destined to remain an adorable flower girl for the rest of your life. Just when you were about to accept your fate, something surprising happened.

The door to the store swung open, and none other than your own mother walked in. She was wearing her business attire, which consisted of a tight black miniskirt and a tight black blouse. She was looking left and right, and you soon realized just what she was doing. Without a doubt, Trish was searching for you! She had finally come to rescue you! You were saved!

Your mom searched all over the store, examining any article of clothing that seemed out of place. Unfortunately, she never once glanced in your direction, other than to admire the display you were a part of. She expected you had been molded into clothing, not turned into a cute little flower girl.

Her searching went on for about ten minutes before she gave an exasperated sigh and started to head back to the front door. On her way out she paused, and looked at you once more. She walked closer to you, and admired every inch of you for a lengthy amount of time. Eventually, she smiled and waved over one of the store girls.

“Excuse me miss, but how much would this mannequin cost?” Trish asked the girl, and the girl gasped in surprise. Meanwhile, you mentally began to panic.

“The mannequin? I don’t think they’re for sale ma’am.” The girl stuttered a bit, obviously flustered about the unorthodox question.

“You see; I’m heading to an important business meeting. I’m showing off a lot of young girl dresses and outfits to some potential buyers and sponsors. All gummy clothing. I’ve just realized that having a mannequin to display the outfits on would be perfect!”

“Uh huh…”

“Money isn’t an issue. I really would like a mannequin, and I love how pretty this one is!” Trish gushed, causing you to internally blush deeply.

“I’ll…ask the manager.” The girl rushed off, and was soon back with the manager. The manager struck a deal with your mother, and the money was exchanged. A few minutes later, Trish was carrying you out of the store and to her car. She tossed you into the trunk, and drove off to the gummy factory.

Once there she headed inside, carrying you under her arm. She walked right to the meeting room, where several long tables and chairs were set up. At the front of the room was a projector and massive TV monitor. A chest full of girlish gummy clothing was lying by the wall as well. Trish’s assistant, Camila, was lounging by the window.

“Oh hey Miss Harper!” Camila giggled in the most “teenage girl” voice you had ever heard. “What’s, like, that, like, thing there?” She pointed to you.

“This is a cute little mannequin I just bought.” Your mom explained. She set down her briefcase and purse, and then stood you up in the front of the room. “Come help me with this will you?”

Your mom began to unzip and take of your dress, and Camila soon followed suit. The two busty babes were soon stripping you bare, and in seconds you were stark naked. They took your clothes and tossed them into the corner of the room.

“What is the…uh…like…manny-thing for?” Camila wondered aloud. She examined every inch of you. Even though you couldn’t move, you found it hard to take your eyes off of her massive breasts, which were almost popping out of her blouse.

“It’s a mannequin, and we’re using it for the display. While I talk to the sponsors, I want you to dress the mannequin in every outfit. It’s a gummy mannequin, so it should fit perfectly into anything you put on it.”

“Gotcha MH!” Camila saluted, and Trish sighed.

“Try to tone down your ditzyness, at least until after the meeting Camila.”

“What do we, like, do with the manny-thing, like, after the meeting?”

“I’ll probably pour some solvent on it and mold the remaining gummy material into something special. After all, I did buy it, so I technically own it. Maybe I’ll make it into a new skirt. Or perhaps something a little more…private.” While speaking, Trish placed a bottle of solvent onto her speaking podium, which was right beside you.

Before Trish could continue talking about her plans for you, the door swung open and eight important looking women strolled into the room. They took seats around the table, and your mom went around introducing herself to each one. From what you could see, each lady seemed to be quite eager for your mom’s demonstration. They also each appeared to be shockingly sexy.

Finally, the time came for the meeting to begin. Your mom closed the door and took her position beside you at the podium. Camila grabbed the first outfit from the chest, a frilly dress complete with pantyhose and gloves. Your mom cleared her throat, and addressed the sponsors.
112121111211.title: The Business Meeting

talks to you, she knew it was you all along. this was proof of the dangers.
1121211112111.content:
The meeting went wonderfully for your mother, with her assistant Camila dressing you in the cutest, girliest outfits you had ever seen, each time she posed your body and styled your hair to suit the outfit, poofy dresses, frilly skirts, all sorts of girly clothes that fit your hard but gummy body perfectly. The people in the meeting were impressed by the new lines of clothing and thought the mannequin was adorable and a nice touch. All you could do was smile helplessly as Camila giggled, muttering to herself about how fun it was to dress up dolls again.

Finally the meeting was over, contracts were signed, promises made and hands were shaken. You were modelling a bright pink poofy dress with puffy shoulders and a white ribbon around its waist that tied off into a big floppy bow at the back. One hand was on your hip and your hair was in pig tails with matching white ribbon bows. You saw your mother breath a sigh of relief "Well that went well" She said with a smile, glancing at you before turning to Camila, who was blowing a bubblegum bubble. "Like, the mannequin really made the cute little outfits totally look adorable. Like, are you really going to melt it down into clothing Miss H?" She asked in her airhead style of talking, looking at you. You could already see the look of desire to keep playing with you in her eyes.

Trish looked you over and looked thoughtful "Well it was quite useful...and i guess we may have use of a mannequin in the future for other meetings. Alright, lets keep it for now, but its staying in the closet in your office ok!" She said, Camila barely held in her squeal of excitement. "Sure thing Miss H" She said before walking over to you "Like, ill totally put this little cutie away right now" She said lifting you up by your waist and carrying you away from your mother.

This was slightly better than being molded into a skirt for your mother...kind of, but you still didn't want to stay as some girly little mannequin. Hidden away in your mothers factory you had no hope of anyone but her seeing you. She had already proven she didn't recognise you, so there was that hope gone. You had hoped you could have been soaked in solvent and moved before she tried to mold you, but now you would just be used for all sorts of girly dress up sessions with Camila.

Sure enough, whenever your mother was busy or out, Camila got you out of the closet you stayed in with some outfit designs and would be dressed up, posed and played with in general. Camila had decided to name you Daisy, because she thought flowers were good names for cute little dollies. You had to suffer with a smile through countless dress up sessions, being put in all sort of outfits that any girl over 5 would puke over how silly they looked.

The days turned into weeks and you got used to the routine, being played with by Camila or stored in a dark closet, it wasnt a nice life but it at least had interaction of sorts. About a month after originally being bought, your closet door was opened by your mother, she looks right at you and...
1121211112111.title: The meeting goes off without a hitch, but what ...

choices: She drops you onto the belt, leaving you at the mercy of the factory.
She stuffs you into her cleavage, wanting to keep you for herself.
11212111121112.content:
“Hello Jack.” Your mother said aloud, while still staring right at you. Your eyes mentally widened, as it almost seemed like your mother was talking to you. That couldn’t be right though, as she had treated you like nothing but a normal mannequin for the past month. Sure enough though, your mother reached out and caressed your face, her expression a weird mix of sadness and concern.

“I know it’s you Jack.” Trish continued. “I’ve known the entire time, ever since I found you and bought you in the wedding store. The reason I haven’t freed you is because I was teaching you a lesson. You’re a careless person Jack, and terrible things happen because of it. You’ve probably learned your lesson, and I do miss you, so I’ve decided it’s time to free you from this situation. You’re welcome.”

Your head was spinning, and you practically felt the steam rising up from your head. How on earth could your mother willingly let something so terrible happen to you? For the past month you’ve been nothing but a plaything for her ditzy assistant, and she just stood there and watched. You were furiously agitated, wanting to jump up and punch your mother in her stupid face. You had never felt this angry before.

Trish lifted you out of the closet and carried you over to her desk. Waiting there was a small container and a bottle of precious solvent. She poured the solvent all over your body and waited for you to soften. Before you even had a chance to pry your gummy lips apart and yell at her, she expertly mashed and squashed your now soft body, crushing you into a tan lump of gummy. She placed you in the container and sealed the lid tight.

“Sorry Jack, but it would be weird for my naked son to be walking around the factory. Also, I don’t want anything bad to happen to you. It’s for your own safety.” Trish blew you a kiss and then set the container down on the edge of her desk.

For about an hour you watched through the semi-transparent sides of the container, the blurry form of your mom typing away on her computer. Suddenly, she received a call that there were several important investors requesting a surprise meeting. Trish stood up in a hurry, and her protruding ass knocked your container off of her desk. You plummeted down, coming to a hard landing inside a large box filled with fifty other gummy containers. Uh oh.

In her rush to leave the room, Trish didn’t notice the tremendous blunder she had made, and left the room unaware of the fate she had sentenced her son to. You wiggled like crazy in an attempt to bust out of your container and escape, but the lid was fastened far too tightly. You could only sit and wait for the next tragic event to unfold. No matter what occurred, it wasn’t going to be good.

Ten minutes later Camila walked into the room, humming a happy tune to herself and skipping along. Despite being eighteen years old, Camila acted much more like a little girl. Camila approached the box and lifted it up, causing a mini-avalanched that made your container sink to the bottom of the box. Blissfully unaware of what she was doing, Camila carried the box out of your mom’s office and down to the factory floor.

She stood by an empty portion of the main conveyor belt, and began popping open gummy containers and dumping the contents onto the conveyor belt. She poured out one after the another, and you knew it would only be a matter of time before she reached your container. Your mom was stuck in an important meeting, and was oblivious to your plight besides. No one was going to come to your rescue.

Finally, it was just your container left in the box. Camila pulled the container out and popped open the lid. She gripped your squishy form in her warm and soft hands. Right before she dropped you onto the conveyor belt, a sly smile crossed her face. She had had an idea, and she pondered this new thought for a few moments. Finally, she reached an internal decision, and unknowingly decided your fate.
11212111121112.title: Time and Punishment

choices: Amazingly, your mother manages to track you down in time.
After a few days you are bought by someone and taken home with them.
112121111211121.content:
You see Camila shrug briefly before she just dropped your gummy, featureless body onto the conveyor. You saw her check the box, see it was now empty and walk away with all the containers as the conveyor moved you along towards the terrifying series of machines ahead of you. You could barely twitch as you entered the dark internal parts of the machinery.

You felt a set of mechanical arms pinch at you, lifting you up and twisting you around. Dozens more arms were passing you along as they tugged and pulled, teased and twisted your body in various shapes. It was happening with robotic speed and almost too fast for you to process as you began to take on a new shape that they sculpted you into. You felt the tingle as you were injected in places with gummy dye, clearly trying to give you colours in various spots.

It was too dark to see inside the machine, the arms didn't need light to do their job. You never even saw the spray mist of Beta4 coming until you felt the telltale tingle of it tightening your form to lock its shape. After being dried with a quick blast of air, you were laid down facing up and the arms released you. All of that took maybe thirty seconds. You moved back into the light as you exited that part of the machine, but of course, you couldn't see yourself as you stared up at the factory lights before being taken into the packaging machine.

You felt the machine quickly and expertly lift you up, fold you neatly and slip you into a plastic bag. The bag was then vaccum packed, sucking the air out and tightening it around your already helpless body. You were placed down on a pile of already packed clothes before more were placed ontop of you. You listened to the now full box being taped and stapled shut before it was moved to a delivery truck. Your mind was numb with fear, you were most likely identical in every way to all the other things in this box, you were about to be delivered somewhere in the world and there was no real way your mother would find you.

You listened in defeat as the sound of the truck started up reached you, the vibrations shaking your tightly packed box as it took you away from the factory and your mother. You actually heard the sounds of the sea for a while, not realising your cargo load had been loaded onto a boat and shipped away. When you finally reached the end of your journey, you found yourself looking up at a cute shop girl chewing gum, she had red hair, green eyes and a nice body under her uniform. She was opening up the bags, placing hangers inside the garments and hanging them on a rack.

You realised from listening, that the staff were talking english, but with a british accent, you were in the UK! Now how would you ever get home? All you could do was wait your turn to be hung up. By looking at the other clothes she was hanging up, you quickly discovered you were some sort of lolita style sky blue dress similar to alice in wonderland in shape, but with more frills. You remembered modelling something identical to yourself while trapped as a mannequin.

You were slipped onto a hanger and placed on the rack, the girl paying no more attention to you than any of the other dresses she was putting out before she brushed her hand over all of you and walked off. All you could see from your angle (you figured your eyes were somewhere on the front of the skirt) was the identical dresses pressed up against you. Mentally you were sobbing, knowing that this was your life now, unless for some reason the shop girls sprayed you with solvent, someone would buy you and you would spend your life in a closet like any normal dress would...
112121111211121.title: She drops you onto the belt, leaving you at the...

When you opened the door, the first thing you saw was a woman's stomach, contained within the confines of a tight red t-shirt. Looking down you saw wide hips, a large ass, and jiggly thighs wrapped up in skintight black leggings. Glancing up your vision was obscured by the woman's breasts, which jutted out from her body like a shelf. Of course, you didn't need to see the woman's face to know it was your mother.

“Jackie?” Your mom said, a confused tone to her voice. Much to your surprise, your ditzy mom actually walked into the room, instead of looking down. She bowled right over you, knocking you to the floor. It wasn't until her feet slammed down and crushed your chest flat that she felt you. She looked down sheepishly, and couldn't help but grin as she saw you.

"What's...so...funny mom?” You panted, hard to speak through partially crushed lungs.

“These things always happen to you, don't they? I find it amusing how unlucky you can be.” Trish giggled, and you pouted. Your mom was finding joy out of your suffering. Your mom noticed your sour mood. “Oh, but I am sorry Jackie dear. I'll try and be more careful.” She stepped off of you, knelt down, and lifted you to your feet.

“Was there something you wanted?” You asked, still slightly miffed. Trish ruffled your hair.

“Yes, silly boy. I want to take you out somewhere special, just the two of us. We need to get in some mother and son bonding. Mary's been taking up all of your time lately, sometimes even unknowingly.” Trish smiled, knowing that half the time you spent with your girlfriend you were crushed to your body. Of course, you could say the same about your mom, but you decided to keep your mouth shut. Trish had quite the fiery temper.

“Where...did you want to go?” You were unsure of this idea. You loved your mom, and loved hanging out with her, but your little adventures never seemed to finish without you being crushed or mashed at least once.

“Oh, I don't know.” Trish rubbed her chin thoughtfully. “You go to the mall so often. How about we go out to eat somewhere! That could be fun!” She looked at you with a sparkled in her eyes. Despite the inherent danger of going out to a restaurant, you couldn't resist your mother's almost puppy dog stare.

“Sure.” Trish squealed with delight, and scooped you up into her arms. Not wasting another second, she rushed out of the house still carrying you, nearly through you into the passenger's seat, and drove off to her favorite restaurant, a place called “Maggie's”.

Maggie's was a relatively recent chain restaurant, with a twist on the normal standards. Maggie's was staffed solely by attractive women dressed up in revealing maid outfits. The interior of the restaurant was decorated in posh furniture and mansion-esque accessories. It was like being a millionaire for the day, what with the being served food by maids and what not. You had no idea why your mom liked it so much, but you weren't going to complain. The food was fancy and great, and the girls were admittedly hot.

It was a twenty minute drive, which you and your mom spent planning your meal so you could order right as you got to the restaurant. Your mom had decided on some nice bread rolls with lasagna and meatballs on the side. You had settled for a more normal pick of chicken fingers and french fries. Even the most uppity of restaurant's still served chicken fingers and fries to picky eaters such as yourself.

It wasn't even a minute after you got into the restaurant the one of the sexy maids walked right up to you and your mom. You had to hold your mouth shut, or else your jaw would have dropped straight to the floor. There were two reasons. One, the maid walking towards you was a drop dead gorgeous girl. Her cute ass swung tantalizingly behind her, and her smaller sized breasts were perfectly round and perky in her tight uniform.

The second reason you were surprised was far more sinister. The maid was none other than Elise, a girl you knew from school. Elise was an absolute bitch, and she did everything in her power to make your life hell. She hated all of the attention that your special condition gave you, so she made it her mission to get you as much attention as possible, whether people truly knew or not. She had molded you into clothing, turned you into sexual pleasure objects, handed you out like gum, and once she even tied you into a bow and used you to hold her twin pigtails in place for two whole months.

Elise paused for a second when she locked eyes with you, and you saw an unmistakable smirk cross her face. In a split second she was back to her innocent and naive expression, which you knew was just an act. Elise was perfect at hiding her bitchy nature.

“Why hello there you two!” Elise waved, her infectious smile stretching from ear to ear. “Here for a pleasant lunch time meal?” Trish smiled back at her.

“Yes, we are.” Your mother replied.

“Right this way.” Elise gestured to an empty table, and your mom walked off. As you followed her, Elise bent down and whispered in your ear, her breasts pressing against you.

“Long time no see Jackie!” She whispered deviously. Chills ran up and down your spine. You took your seat beside your mom and the two of you ordered drinks and food. As Elise walked off to tells the chefs your order, you felt the undeniable urge of nature calling. Glancing frantically to make sure Elise was nowhere to be found, you made a mad dash for the bathroom, telling your mom you would be back in a few minutes.

You push the door to the bathroom open, and start to take a few steps inside. Do you make it safely into the bathroom, or does disaster strike?

Elise didn't waste anymore time, as she didn't want any of the kitchen staff to become suspicious of her. When the nearest chef wasn't paying attention, Elise slipped your tan lump off a body onto the cutting board beside the rest of the dough. She then skipped out of the kitchen, but not before blowing you a kiss. You didn't waste any time squirming for the attention of the chef.

Unfortunately for you, fate was determined to see this through to the end. The chef, with her back turned to you, rested her hand on the cutting board, squashing you flat. When she turned back around, you were unable to move or do anything. Because of your gummy condition, and the fact that Elise had shredded your clothes much earlier, your tan coloring blended right in with the dough.

The chef pushed the dough pile and you together, molding you into one big mass. She then expertly crushed and molded you into the proper shape, using the rolling pin for good measure. When the chef had finished, she scooped all of the dough circles onto a pan and slid it into the oven. 11322121111.content:
You felt your gummy body slowly patch itself up, different segments of your body joining together and reforming into the complete form you were supposed to be. You pushed as hard as your body would allow, and you flopped down the compost heap onto the soft ground. After a few more minutes your body was back to one hundred percent…or at least you thought it was.

As you stood up, you immediately knew that something was horribly wrong. Every part of your body felt too small, too tiny. You moved your arms and legs around, and gasped loudly upon seeing how tiny they looked. Glancing up at your surroundings, everything looked many times bigger than what it should have. It was like, for some reason, your body was much smaller.

To test this sudden theory, you walked a few feet towards a discarded cereal box standing upright on the ground. By the time you had approached the cereal box, you knew that your deepest fears had come true. Your eyes widened, and you let out a scream of agony. Not all of your body mass had survived the trip through your mother, and so you weren’t able to fully reform. Now you had been reduced to a horrific six inches in height.

You sank to your knees, crushed and broken. Never had something so horrible ever occurred in your entire life. Tears streamed unhindered down your face, and you soon collapsed into the fetal position, softly sobbing. The wet ground was slimy and uncomfortable, and mud washed over your body, but you didn’t care. You didn’t even care when you heard footsteps thundering toward your location, getting closer and closer.

A worker at the trash facility had heard your cry and had come to investigate. The female worker glanced left and right for the source of the sound, eventually deciding that it must have just been an animal. Before she walked away she saw your tiny and muddy form lying in a heap on the ground.

“My goodness!” The woman exclaimed. “Who left this doll here?” She bent down and picked you up, and you didn’t even try to resist. The woman brushed some of the dirt off of you, and your tears soaked through her gloves. “Ew. It’s wet. But I suppose it is a rather pretty doll.” The woman shrugged to herself, deciding that you would make a perfect present for her young daughter.

The worker, who was just finishing her shift, took you into the employee building and washed you off in the bathroom. You were still naked, as all of your clothes had been burned off long ago thanks to Elise’s actions. This didn’t bother the worker, as you were just a simple doll after all. She figured her daughter would have plenty of cute dresses and skirts for you to wear instead.

The woman placed you into your purse and headed out to her car. You had stayed motionless this entire time except for the occasional sob or shiver. You were hardly processing the events happening around you, nor the fact that you were about to end up the plaything of some little girl. Normally you would have been freaking out, but not this time. Your spirit had been broken after all.

The reason for this shut down was because from this point on your life would never be the same. You would never be able to go to school again, which be extension meant you would never truly receive a formal education. Relationships with people would be nearly impossible now, and even venturing out into the world could be life-threatening in millions of different ways. You weren’t even sure if Mary would accept you this way now.

The woman picked up her daughter at daycare, and immediately handed you over to her. The cute little girl squealed with delight, grabbing you roughly in her arms. She didn’t waste a second pulling a frilly pink dress out of a bag she was carrying, and she slipped you into the dress. She then made your hair into a cute ponytail and rubbed some bright red lip gloss over your lips. The gloss hardened, creating a seal that prevented you from speaking.

The car was heating up, so the woman lowered the windows. At the moment they were driving through a peaceful suburban area on the way to their house. The little girl sat you on the open window edge, letting you get a view of the world. You were still zoned out, lamenting on how your life had been ruined.

Suddenly, you saw your house quickly approaching. You hadn’t even realized that you were in your own neighborhood. In the middle of your yard you saw your mother, dressed in a tight t-shirt and tan leggings pulling up weeds from your sidewalk. All of your despair and depression flew out the window, and with renewed strength you pushed yourself from the little girl’s grasp and fell to the ground outside of the car.

You bounced roughly several times along the road before finally coming to a stop. The woman’s car kept driving, and you could still hear the little girl’s surprised screams. To your delight, the woman was a tough mother, and was not about to turn around the get her daughter’s lost doll. At the very least you had been spared the life of a plaything.

You climbed up the curb and started sprinting towards where your mother was working in your yard. Your little feet pounded across the sidewalk, cuts and bruises quickly popping up from the rough pathway. Trish drew closer and closer though, and you weren’t about to miss this opportunity. You had been broken earlier, but your mother would surely know what to do. Sadly, in your haste your forgot to take off your frilly princess dress, or fix your hair out of its ponytail.

You ran up to your mom, mortified to find you didn’t even come up to her calves, let alone barely past her ankles. She had yet to notice you, and you couldn’t exactly talk at the moment either. Instead you punched and kicked at her leg until she finally seemed to notice you. Without looking she picked you up, grasping you tightly in her hand as she raised you up to her face.

Your mother’s giant face filled your entire vision, and the sheer scale of her terrified so much that your body froze up in fear. Trish frowned upon seeing you, and she cocked her head to the side in confusion. Suddenly her eyes widened, and she opened her mouth to speak.
