Finding that none of your boy clothes fit comfortably anymore, Trish went to her study and began making you some new gummy clothes, leaving you wearing one of her tshirts that you practically drowned in. She opened the door and saw you, in your pretty dress, with your pretty hairband, with some obvious little lumps on your chest and the terrified look on your face...

113221212.content:
You wiggled and squirmed like you never had before in your entire life. You shook and quivered, doing every single thing you possibly could to avoid the terrible fate that Elise had set you up for. Your orb shaped form wobbled back and forth, but the conveyor belt was too wide for you to roll off to freedom. Still, by the time your orb was next in line to be dumped into the machine, you were resting on the very edge of the platform.

Just then, the door swung open and a girl walked inside. She looked like she was about sixteen years old, or at least still in high school. She was dressed in a casual t-shirt and leggings. Her hair was shoulder length, and a nice, warm brown. Her eyes were just as brown, framing in her cute face and accentuating her tanned skin. The girl was also quite curvy, but the attractive quality of her chest and butt were lost on you as she strolled right up to you.

“Gotta make sure my new uniform is…just…right!” The girl exclaimed, punching a few buttons on the control console. Once she had tailored the uniform about to be made to her exact measurements, she almost strolled away when she spotted you.

“Woah there little guy!” She gently nudged you, knocking you back into the middle of the conveyor belt. “Can’t have you falling off.” The girl bent down and planted a kiss on you, right as the conveyor belt tilted you into the machine. She disappeared from your sight, and the least thing you heard her say was, “I hope you turn into an awesome uniform!”

The inside of the machine was pitch black, but it wasn’t hard to tell what was about to happen. Robotic arms from the depths of the machine grabbed you, molding and squashing you violently. In seconds, they had crushed and formed your body into a basic dress. Another set of arms added layer and layers of frills and bows, until you were the perfect French maid outfit. Lastly, a few quick mist sprays dyed various parts of your body black or white.

When you popped out of the other side of the machine, you were the picture of a perfect maid’s uniform. The girl practically skipped over to you, not wasting any time in throwing you into the big vat of Beta4 in the back of the room. It only took several minutes for your body to harden in its brand new state. No one in the world except for Elise knew what had happened to you, and she would never help you. Even still, Elise didn’t know that you had become this particular uniform. How would you ever get out of this mess? Could you?

The girl fished you out of the vat and efficiently dried you off with a blow-dryer. After you were completely dry, she carried you into the changing room installed for employees in the back of the building. She stripped down to a simple black bra and panties. With minimal effort, she yanked you down over her head and into place around her body.

As you had been tailored made, you fit her like a glove. Your arms were wrapped around her arms, and your legs fluttering about her waist. Your face was stretched thin across her rather large breasts, your left eye positioned right about where her left nipple was, and the same for your right eye. Somehow, your crotch had ended up clutching her butt tightly, which you knew would bring you immense pain whenever she sat down.

The girl admired her look in the mirror, spinning around with glee. She had absolutely no idea that her brand new uniform was really a squishy teenage body, who was currently afraid for his life. The girl pinned a nametag to her uniform, stabbing the pin directly into your flattened left eye. You mentally screamed in pain, silently crying out over and over, while the oblivious girl danced out of the changing room, eager to begin her first day.

By the time she had pranced out into the restaurant, your mother was gathering up her belongings and heading out the door. She had eaten her meal anxiously, and then after finishing had searched for you for over twenty minutes, and was finally giving up to go home, resigned to that fact that you “always turned up eventually”. The girl dashed over to the door, catching your mom right before she left.

“We hope you enjoyed your meal, and we hope we’ll see you again.” The girl bowed, forcing you to look down at the ground and then back up at your mom. Vision out of your left eye was entirely blocked, throwing your depth perception out the window. From your right eye vision, you could see your mom looked sad and tired.

“I…yeah. I’ll be back. Thanks…” Your mom replied, and then scanned the girl’s nametag. The name read “Vivian”, but your mom’s attention was directed to what looked like an extremely faint outline of an eyeball. She then got a whiff of a very faint, strawberry cheesecake scent. As your mom gave Vivian another look over, and Vivian just stood there with an innocent smile on her face, what happens?

Vivian waved her off and then smiled at the next people coming in "Hello Sir and Madam, how can we serve you today?" She asked sweetly, unaware she had a captive customer wrapped around her body.

The rest of the day went pretty much like that, Vivian served customers, she carried plates to and from the kitchen and divvied up the tips with the other maid waitresses at the end of the day. You saw Elise take her share, though she didn't pay you any notice, after all she had no idea where you were. After that Vivian stripped out of you and got changed back into her normal clothes, tossing you into her bag to take home. Her nametag still was stuck through your eye but that didn't seem a priority to her. She zipped the bag shut and flung it over her shoulder.

Only your mother came to this cafe out of people you knew so no one else could possibly spot you and she already had failed at that. This girl was probably going to throw you in the wash tonight and wear you to work tomorrow, then the next day and the next until she stopped working there.

Finally the girl got home and tossed her bag down by her bed. She hadn't sweat today and Gummy usually smelt nice so she saw no reason to toss you in the wash. You could hear her walking around and the faint beep of a microwave as she cooked something. The muffled sounds of the TV were your only distraction later on before finally you heard her soft breathing after she went to sleep. This girl had no idea she had a boy in her apartment or had worn him all day.

This was the routine day after day, Vivian would get up, get ready for work and slip you on when she got there. She kept you clean and was always sweet and kind to customers and her co workers. You got used to only seeing out of one eye as she went about her days, no one ever spotting your eye on her uniform, the dye hiding you well. You saw your mother dozens of times as she came back, a mixture of her love of this place and her attempts at finding you, though she always went away dissapointed in that reguard.

The days turned to weeks, which turned to months. You began to think you were going to spend the rest of your life as Vivian's maid outfit, though you knew she was studying to be a computer games programmer, so when she got that job you would likely just hang up in her closet forever. Of course you knew from seeing it happen to other outfits, if they got stained or torn by something they were treated with solvent before being re-orbed. If that happened you would have a small chance of reforming before someone remolded you into an outfit. It was that, or be a dress forever more...

11322121221.content:
Six long months had passed since the initial day where you had been transformed into Vivian’s uniform. Hardly a day had passed when you hadn’t spent several long hours wrapped tightly around the oblivious girl’s curvaceous figure. It had gotten to the point where you had practically become desensitized to the pain of it all, and were just beginning to accept that you were destined to live this nightmare for the rest of your life.

However, one day a freak accident occurred that spared you from this horrible fate. Vivian was in a hurry to brush through the kitchen and return to a group waiting for their drink order to be taken, and ended up bumping into one of the chefs. The chef cried out in surprise, and her left arm swung backwards in reflex.

The chef had been holding an extremely sharp butcher knife, which proceeded to slice upwards along Vivian’s leg as the girl’s arm went back. By an absurdly lucky break, the knife didn’t cut Vivian’s skin at all. It did slice a large gap right through your body though, causing you to cry out in pain.

The chef and Vivian took several deep breaths to calm themselves down, and laughed as a defense mechanism at the tragedy they had just barely avoided. Vivian got another maid to cover for her while she walked to the back of the restaurant. She stripped out of her uniform, and then dunked you in Beta4. She had memorized the procedure for repairing uniform’s, and was following the steps dutifully.

As she stood there in her underwear, she suddenly had the intense urge to go to the bathroom. She waited a few seconds until all of the Beta4 had been washed off of your body, and then crumpled you into a small orb. She placed you onto the same conveyor belt that had sealed your fate months ago, turned it on, and then dashed off to the employee restroom to relieve herself.

Even though you were exhausted, and still reeling from the knife wound, you managed to rock back and forth, and topple off of the conveyor belt right before you were sent tumbling into the uniform molding machine. You rested in the shadow of the machine, regaining your stamina and getting used to not being a woman’s dress for the first time in half a year.

Vivian came back and was perplexed to see no gummy orb on the conveyor belt, and no uniform waiting for her to pick up. She scanned for you for a minute, and didn’t find you much to your happiness. She shrugged and grabbed another orb, placing it into the machine and waiting patiently for her uniform to arrive.

With her attention stuck on the machine, you slowly rolled your tiny ball-shaped body out of the work room, and through the small space Vivian had left the door open. Your plan was to roll undisturbed all the way through the restaurant and out the front door, which was admittedly a stupid plan, but there really wasn’t another option.

You didn’t even make it another foot before your plan shattered to pieces. The women’s bathroom door, which was right outside the gummy work room, swung open, and a girl walked out. She was fully absorbed in her phone, and you quickly saw nothing but the underside of her dirty, black sneaker. The last thing you processed before she stepped on you was that this girl was unmistakable Stacy, one of your girlfriend’s best friends.

Stacy didn’t even hear the tiny squelch you made as she stepped down, or feel you under her shoe. She merely turned and walked back out into the restaurant, carrying you along with her. Each time she stepped down pain shot through your body, but you were firmly engrained into the treads of her sneaker, and were totally at her mercy for the moment.

“Oh sweet! Our food is here!” Stacy exclaimed, sitting down at the table and propping her feet up. Your face was looking outward, and you saw two other pairs of legs, from two other girls. One girl was wearing a cute miniskirt, while the other girl was wearing leggings.

“Yeah, it came while you were in the bathroom.” A female voice replied.

“I’m so glad Miss Harper told us about this place. I really like it.” Yet another female voice said happily. Your heart fluttered. It was Mary, your beautiful, loving girlfriend.

“It’s a little too ritzy for my taste, but it’s not terrible.” Stacy admitted, digging into her meal. The three girls ate their food, laughing and chatting away, having no idea that you were stuck to Stacy’s shoe the entire time. You kept trying to peel off of Stacy’s foot, but the dirt and grime that had accumulated onto her shoe was adhering to your body. You were making slight progress, but it wasn’t enough.

“Alright. That’s enough for me.” Stacy sighed, pushing her plate back. “I don’t want to get a stomachache.”

“Huh?” The second girl asked, who you had realized by this point was Emma.

“I’m running a marathon today. It starts in…” Stacy checked her phone. “Thirty minutes.”

“Wow. Really? We’ll go to cheer you on then!” Mary smiled warmly.

“You sure? Okay then. Thanks!” The three girls paid for their meal, and then stood up. The brief progress you had made on reforming was ruined immediately as Stacy stepped down and walked out of the restaurant, pressing all of her weight down onto you. Stacy climbed into the driver’s seat of her car, while Mary took the passenger seat and Emma sat in the back. The three girls drove off park where the marathon was going to begin and end, jamming out to pop songs on the radio.

Shoved face first into the gas pedal for the entire trip, you desperately continued your vain attempts to break away from Stacy’s shoe and reform. You could barely even image how much pain and long term suffering having to endure an entire marathon under Stacy’s foot would cause. You could end up permanently fused to her shoe! Unfortunately, your fate was out of your hands, and you could only hope for salvation.

You dashed blindly into the bathroom, not caring about anything except for getting away from Elise. She wouldn't dare chase you into the bathroom, as there would be far too many witnesses. It appeared that you had made it in safely, as no psychotic high school maids came charging in after you. You took a deep breath, letting yourself relax in the safety of the bathroom.

Looking around, you realized that there actually wasn't a single other person in the bathroom. It really was a good thing that Elise hadn't ran in after you, because no one would have been there to save you. You also noticed that there wasn't a single urinal, only stalls. That was odd, considering you were in the men's restroom, but you didn't let it bother you. You just entered the nearest stall and relieved yourself.

It only took a few minutes to finish relieving yourself, but while you were going you heard two people enter the restroom. Their voices were muffled, but it almost sounded like two women instead of two men. Unfortunately, your brain was still racing from the encounter with Elise, and you didn't put two and two together. You pushed out of the stall, and came face to face with the two people, who were indeed women. After all, you had stumbled into the female bathroom on accident.

“What the hell?” The first woman cried, taking several steps back from the stall you had exited from. She was wearing a long formal dress, that hugged her body nicely. She had curves in all of the right places, with a body not unlike that of your mothers. She appeared to be about thirty years old.

“It's a little kid!” The second woman growled. While the first woman was an average five feet (which was still huge to you), the second woman towered much higher, at an incredible six feet three inches. She was wearing a tight dress shirt and a rather revealing mini shirt that struggled to contain her incredibly hefty rear. She had one of the largest asses you had ever seen.

Without wasting a second, the second woman slapped you so hard across that face that you flew backwards and collapsed to the ground. You writhed around in agony, trying to shake off the pain. Your mouth had been crushed shut from the impact.

“Sandra!” The first woman whined. “He's just a little boy. Don't be so mean.”

“I was being nice, considering what he's done.” The second woman, Sandra huffed. “This little pervert was trying to look at innocent women naked! They start young now. Perverts I mean. You're far too nice Diana.”

“You probably hurt him, you big brute.” Diana pushed Sandra, but it was only meant as a friendly little shove. Sandra was caught off guard however, and she stumbled backwards. Her feet slipped out from under her, and she plummeted down. Her mini skirt flicked out, and you were helplessly crushed underneath her gigantic ass.

Your body couldn't offer any resistance, flatten almost instantly. Every inch of you was crushed flat like paper, hidden out of sight under Sandra's ass. All of Sandra's weight pressed down on you, keeping you trapped and unable to move or reform. What a terrible mess fate had thrown you into this time.

“OH MY GOD! SANDRA!” Diana practically screamed. “YOU KILL-” She was cut off by Sandra jumping to her feet and covering Diana's mouth with her hands.

“Shut up Diana. It was an accident, and you know it. How was I supposed to know he was going to just be...squashed...like that? Besides, I think he deserved it.” Sandra huffed. Meanwhile, you were still stuck to her butt, plastered like a sticker to her panties. Her mini skirt had fluttered back down, hiding you from sight.

“Wait...where is he?” Diana asked after calming down. The two women looked around for you, wondering where you had magically run off to. As Sandra bent down to check under the stalls, her mini skirt lifted up, and Diana spotted you. She peeled you off of Sandra's butt and held you in her hands.

“Don't grope my ass in public Diana!” Sandra exclaimed, but stopped upon seeing your crushed form in her friend's hands. She grabbed you from Diana and crumpled you up into a tiny ball, causing Diana to gasp in horror.

“What are you doing to him now Sandra?”

“I'm making him suffer.” Sandra grinned. “You see, his plan was to get sat on all along. You saw how he hugged at my ass. I mean, it is really nice, but that kind of perverted behavior is saved for the bedroom, not a public restroom. And it certainly isn't tolerated by some...toddler!”

“Can't we just let him go? Maybe he was in here by accident?” Diana said hopefully, but Sandra just scoffed.

“No Diana. This was no accident. This is a pervy kid here, and I have the perfect torture in mind for him. Since he likes women's asses so much, why doesn't he spend some quality time with one? Do you remember what color the seats were out in the restaurant Diana?”

“Uh...brown?”

“Close. They were tan, and just the right shade as this little guy here. I'm going to go out there and rub this guy onto a seat until he sticks. Once in place, he'll be helpless! All day he'll be crushed under beautiful women's butts, and maybe he'll even stick to a girl's ass. That'll be so funny!”

“I don't know Sandra.” Diana shook her head. “I think the poor guy deserves to be let go. But I suppose I can't stop you. Go ahead and do whatever you want, I need to pee. I'll be back out in a few minutes.” With that, Diana walked into a stall and locked the door behind her, sealing away your only chance of escape with it.

Sandra frowned at the stall her friend had entered. What was her deal? This pervert needed to be dealt with, and he deserved the worst punishment conceivable. If Diana liked him so much, maybe the little perv would be best suited on her seat. Diana would be tormenting the guy with her jiggly butt for hours, even more if he stuck to it. The best part was, Diana wouldn't even know.

Sandra couldn't fight back a smug smile. Maybe she would do that. She crushed you up into a ball and hid you in her palm. Unfortunately, your mother could do nothing to save you, having no idea you were in this stranger's hand.

Sandra walked back into the restaurant and observed all of the seat options that lay before her. It was almost too much to choose between. It actually took Sandra a full minute to reach a decision. Eventually, she walked up to a seat and rubbed you into the soft leather, making sure you were stuck tight. You blended right into the tan seat, barely noticeable. Isabelle looked at her favourite bra, the frayed edges, the faded pattern. It wasn't worth donating. With a sigh she dropped it into the bin and went back to packing for college. You felt distraught, your goddess, the warmth of your life had discarded you into the trash. You stared up helplessly to the bin opening far above.

As the days passed, your view of the opening faded away to nothing as the bin slowly filled up with bits of food and kitchen waste, other old bits of clothing and the like. You had heard your goddess say goodbye to her mother a few days ago and knew she wasn't coming back for you.

Eventually, the bin was full to bursting and so was tied shut and taken out to the kerb. You listened to the sound of birdsong and distant cars driving before hearing the beeping of the garbage truck. In your bag you knew you were going to be taken away to the dump, nothing you could do now your goddess didn't want you anymore.

The garbage men grabbed the bags, chucking them into the back and started the piston to compress the bags down. You felt the pressure build and build until all of a sudden, the rubber sacks holding your two halves burst and popped, squeezing you out like a tube of toothpaste as the seams of the bra tore and you squelched out in all directions.

You oozed into the garbage around you more and more with every compression and couldn't hear a thing through the large cube I'd garbage you were in the centre of. You weren't even aware that the truck had deposited your pile at the dump long ago.

Weeks slowly passed and you felt weird, you wriggled your...fingers? You had fingers. You slowly pushes your way upwards, breaking the surface of the pile of trash deep in the dump. You blinked your eyes, something else that felt alien to you as the light shone down on you.

You looked at yourself, you had a person body, not a bra body. A vague memory tried to surface, faintly remembering looking like this before, though a lot cleaner. You were caked in trash and gunk and stank like the garbage around you. Slowly you climbed down the pile and wandered to look for your goddess, maybe she would put you through the wash and take you back if you were good.

You had long since forgotten how to talk and you took the better part of the day to silently find your way out of the rubbish tip. Walking along the side of the road slowly, still unused to having legs, you looked up at the moon as the sun had set a while ago. It lit your way as you stumbled on, having seen a sign for college a while back and instantly assumed that was where your goddess was.

Suddenly a pair of headlights shone in the distance and got closer, a car racing past before suddenly screeching to a halt making you jump. The door opened and a girl who looked familiar got out, a girl who looked the age of your goddess. Her eyes were wide "oh my god, Jackie? Is that you?" She said coming towards you, making you nervous and stumbling back from her. She smiled happily "it's me, Mary. Where have you been. I've been looking for you for so long!" She said nearly crying dispite your smell.

Her name triggered faint memories and you paused tilting your head looking at her. You slowly opened your mouth "m...ry" you mumbled, not used to words. She instantly scooped you up, hugging you tight, ignoring how your filth stained her clothes. Her soft warmth and her smell felt nice, comforting, familiar.

She carefully carried you to her car and buckled you in, seeing how dazed and confused you looked. She drove to the college you had been heading towards and took you into a sorority house, sneaking you past a bunch of laughing girls and up to the bathroom. She filled the tub with warm bubbly water and placed you in. Scrubbing you clean lovingly, looking so worried at you as you kept mumbling about goddess and being worn.

It was slow progress but you slowly began to remember your name wasn't bra, it was Jack. Mary was your first goddess...girlfriend. You managed to explain in slow dumb words what Gary had done and she swore loudly to kill her brother. As it was late she cuddled you lovingly and protectively to her chest and curled up in bed with you. She had missed you so much. Your mind had a long way to go to stop thinking like a girls possession but it had a chance to heal with Mary. You drifted off to sleep.

After being unknowingly squashed by you for the last five months, I have developed a fear and trauma of it along with everything else everyone does to me. I'm not blaming you, I still love you greatly Mary, but I know how much you like squashing me, melting me, etc and I can't handle that. My psyche can't handle that. If I was stuck in your shoe any longer than I would have lost my mentality and became an actual insole. Please tell my family I love them to, but I can't go back home to them either as they are in the same boat as you.

Please don't blame yourself, I love you more than anything, but I can't stay here anymore. I'm leaving for good to find a place I can live where my body won't be taken advantage of by mean and evil people. Take care of yourself for me Mary, please

With lots of love, Jack

“Oh my.” Trish gasped upon seeing you. She ran her hand along your body, and you mentally shivered at her cold touch. Your mother's embrace was supposed to be warm and comforting. Instead, you only felt fear. “That certainly is a disgusting mark.”

“I know, right?” Tina admitted. Your small hopes were crushed. Sure enough, your mom hadn't recognized you at all. You couldn't fully blame her. Your body was in the form of a small blob, you were inside of Tina's yoga pants fabric, and your coloring was a dark tan. You basically didn't look or feel anything like yourself. Still, you had hoped your own blood family would be able to save you. Apparently not.

“What did you want me to do?” Trish inquired.

“You always seem so knowledgeable about fashion and stuff like that. Remember when you helped mend my broken sports bra?” Tina reminded. You certainly remembered that time. You finally broke out of shape, and were close to reforming, but Tina was heartbroken over her son's gift breaking, and didn't connect the dots to you at all.

123222112211121.content:
Several minutes passed by until finally the door to the art room swung open and the teacher walked in. You had never seen this teacher before, so she was probably new. She sauntered over to her desk, but on her way her purse smacked into you. You fell backwards and landed on your side. The teacher didn’t notice, and kept walking to her desk.

Lying on your side you saw something incredibly worrying. There had to be over a hundred different art projects scattered about the area. If fortune didn’t smile upon you, it would be entirely possible for you to be stuck here for a very long time. You hoped the teacher would chose you first, and you could be reformed and back in Mary’s loving arms by tomorrow.

This was not to be. The teacher stood up to grab a project to grab, and she knocked a small stack of posters and such down. The other art projects buried you underneath, and you were completely hidden from sight. Once again, the seemingly oblivious art teacher didn’t notice her blunder, and she walked back to her desk to begin grading.

For the entire duration of three long months you were trapped under art projects, waiting for your turn to be chosen. It had taken your full power to not go insane in the total darkness, the only noises being muffled sounds of students in class. You were almost ready to crack when the teacher finally discovered you hidden beneath the posters, and she retrieved you.

She brought you to her desk and graded you in an uncomfortably intimate session. Her big and warm hands rubbed and poked at every inch of your now tiny body. You were only a foot tall, with long blonde hair and a cute pink dress and tutu. Mary had even sculpted your new body boobs and a womanly crotch. Combined with the fact that your strawberry cheesecake scent had been overpowered by that of glue and paint, and there was no way anyone but Mary would know who you really were.

The teacher gave Mary an A-plus (understandably), and picked you up to return you to Mary. It was the end of the school day, but Mary had stayed a little late to wrap up a math test. The art teacher caught Mary on her way out the door and handed you over. Mary held you tightly against her chest.

“You project was wonderful Mary. Fantastic as always.” The teacher smiled.

“Thank you so much!” Mary replied, she practically skipped out the door. For some reason, she didn’t say a word to you, but you figured she was waiting to talk to you until she got home. She climbed into her mother’s car, and the two drove back home.

Once at home, Mary carried you inside the house, and straight up to her room. To your surprise, she tossed you rather roughly onto her bed and rummaged around in her drawer for something. She walked back to her bed with a frilly ribbon in hand, and she tied the ribbon around your waist. Smiling warmly, she picked you up and carried you downstairs where Tina was sitting watching TV.

“Mom. I have something special for you.” Mary said. Tina turn towards her daughter, and Mary thrust you forward with gusto. Tina cocked her head to the side, but smiled regardless.

“Oh my. What a gorgeous little doll!” Tina gushed.

“I made it myself. It was for an art project, but now I’m giving it to you!” Mary beamed, and you felt your heart skip a beat, and then shatter into a million pieces. All your hopes and dreams vanished in an instant, only to be replaced with fears and nightmares. During your three-month imprisonment in the teacher’s room, your darling girlfriend had forgotten all about you.

Tina jumped up off of the couch and embrace her daughter in a long and tight hug. You were caught between the two oblivious girls, your small body pulverized by their massive boobs. When they released, Tina clutched you excitedly, like a little girl on Christmas day.

“Thank you so much Mary! This cutie will make a perfect addition to my doll collection!” Tina stroked your hair and rubbed your dress. Mary blushed heavily and then ran back upstairs to her room. Not a single thought of her precious boyfriend entered her mind. Also, since Mary hadn’t told a soul in her house about what she had done to you, there was no one who could save you unless Mary remembered.

Tina, after playing and gushing over you for nearly an hour, placed you gently on the table in the middle of the living room. She positioned you so that you appeared to be twirling in circles. She had essentially made you into the perfect little table decoration.

It was on the table that you stayed for a full two weeks, unable to do anything but stand and look pretty. You watched your beloved girlfriend walk in and out of the room, living her life happily. Tina would often play with you when no one was around, or her usually disgusting feet would rest beside you when she propped up her feet. Even Gary didn’t know about your predicament, which was the only bright side to this entire situation.

At the end of the second week, Tina invited your mother Trish over for lunch and a movie. Your mom was a sight for sore eyes as she strolled into the living room and sat down in a recliner across from you. You saw her glance at you and smile, but it was clear to see that she didn’t recognize you.

“Do you like my newest doll?” Tina inquired, walking into the room. Your mom nodded.

“I do. It’s very cute. Where did you get it?” Trish asked.

“From Mary.” Tina explained. Depending on Tina’s next words, it was fully possible she would say something that would jog your mother’s memory. What does she say next?

12322211221112112.content:
You turned a corner heading in the direction of Mary’s first class, which you knew was going to be gym. She had gym with Stacy and Emma, and you hoped you could catch her before class started. Unfortunately, you were so lost in thoughts that you didn’t hear someone stealthily sneaking up behind you. In seconds you had been kicked in the back, and crushed under this person’s ass as they sat on you.

“Oh my goodness! Did I just sit on some insignificant nothing?” An all-too-familiar voice laughed. It was none other than Elise, the most terrifying and demonic person on the entire planet. She stood up and peeled you off of her ass, crumpling you into a ball and holding you in her hand. “It WAS an insignificant nothing. How are you doing today Squishy?”

Elise kneaded you between her fingers wall she walked, humming a little tune to herself. You had known Elise for a few years, and she had been a consistent threat to your safety ever since. She saw you (and pretty much everyone else on the planet) as nothing but an inferior plaything for her amusement. She was also devious and deceptive, fooling ever one in your life, including Mary, into thinking she was a perfect angel. She was unfortunately clever too, never running out of ways to ruin your life.

“Ya know, I have a brilliant plan for today. If this doesn’t ruin every single positive thing about your life, I don’t know what will. Just know I won’t be satisfied until I see you break down into tears, and grovel at my feet for the pain to end.” Elise looked down at you and smiled happily, and for a second she looked extremely attractive. You shook your head, reminding yourself that Elise was a sadistic bitch who would stop at nothing to achieve her dreams.

Elise walked closer and closer to the gym, eventually stepping into the locker room. Everyone but Mary had already headed out into the gym. Mary was almost finished getting dressed when Elise approached.

“Hey Elise. What’s up!” Mary smiled, considering Elise to be a good friend. Elise bit back a sadistic smile at what she was about to do.

“I have some terrible news Mary. Jack’s breaking up with you.” Elise said solemnly, in the most convincing lie she had ever said. Mary’s eye twitched, but she kept smiling.

“What do you mean? Have you seen Jack recently?”

“I have.” Elise held you out in front of her. “Jack and I are friends, so he came up to me this morning. He said, and I quote, ‘I’m so sick and tired of that bitch Mary. I’ve never met a more useless and forgetful woman in my life. Does she think I can forgive her every single time she sits on me, or eats me, and I lose months of my life? I don’t care if it was an accident. I’m breaking up with the idiotic loser, and I never want to see her, or her fat ass again.’ That’s what Jack said.”

Mary stood silently for a minute, before collapsing to her knees. Elise knelt down beside her and calmly rubber her shoulders. Tears began to form in Mary’s eyes.

“I know how you feel. I’ve been burned before, but never like this. I couldn’t let that misogynistic fucker get away with what he said, so I crushed him flat like a bug. Here he is.” Elise dropped you into Mary’s awaiting hand. Mary held you gently for a second, before her fingers slowly squeezed you tighter and more painfully than anyone ever had before.

“You…think…” Mary began, her voice shaking with rage. “That you…can just throw me away…like THIS!!!” Mary began to scream. “I! HATE! YOU! YOU! BASTARD!!!!” Mary threw you onto the ground and stomped on your harshly with each word. Your clothes were torn to shreds almost instantly. Elise drew blood from biting her lip so hard. She quickly wiped it away so Mary wouldn’t expect anything.

“Have fun giving the prick his just desserts.” Elise patted Mary on the shoulder. “You show him girl.” Elise strolled out of the locker room, and laughed for five straight minutes once she was out of earshot. Once and for all, she was confident that Jack’s life was thoroughly ruined.

Back in the locker room, Mary peeled you off of the floor and gave the most heart-wrenching and nightmarish face you had ever seen. Her pretty features were made ugly by a deep snarl, her beautiful mouth looking sharp and deadly. She dragged one pointy nail down your body, causing you intense pain as she ripped a line through your flesh. What made it worse was that Mary was actually smiling. She was ENJOYING tormenting the boy she loved with all her heart only moments ago.

You began to regret never telling Mary about how evil Elise was. You had wanted to, but Elise had threatened that if you so much as spoke a word to anyone about Elise’s true colors, she would stuff you up one of her maid’s asses, and then send that maid to the farthest corner of the earth. Her family was immensely powerful, and you knew she wasn’t exaggerating. As such, Mary, Stacy, Emma, Trish, Tina, Barbara, and your school teachers remained oblivious to her true intents.

Mary had thrown ever loving feeling for you out of her mind, save one. She had fallen for Elise’s ploy hook-line-and-sinker. A small part of her wanted to hear you out, but at the moment she was overcome with rage and violence. She wanted to make you pay, and she wanted to do it now. What does Mary do to you?

Let me get my purse" She said, carrying you inside and draping you over the back of a chair. You listened as your mother paid Mary for you and said goodbye, closing the door. Trish stripped down and slipped into her new dress, always enjoying the feel of gummy conforming to her skin as it was pulled up. She admired her new dress in the mirror, it made her look very sexy. 1232221122111211221.content:
The rest of that night, Trish had relaxed around the house, loving the feel of her comfortable new dress. It hugged her curves nicely, and showed off her already sexy body. She loved the way that the gummy fabric felt against her smooth skin. She should’ve paid Mary more for such an amazing dress. Trish smiled warmly as she curled up on the couch, rubbing her hands across her new favorite dress.

You were in hell, but there wasn’t a single thing you could do about it. Mary had been absolutely thorough on her work, and your entire body was a pattern of black, green and gold, with no tan visible. You felt like a dress, looked like a dress, and your body’s natural scent was masked by the Beta4 spray.

You were still reeling from Mary’s cruel torment, but you couldn’t hold her fully responsible. You knew Mary had a terrible temper whenever she reached her boiling point, and Elise knew that too. That bitch had just manipulated Mary’s temper to her favor, probably in an attempt to ruin your life for good. It was all Elise’s fault.

Still, there was a high chance that Mary had doomed you for a very long time, potentially even for forever. As the days turned into weeks, your mother wore you constantly. She put you on for parties, social events, and just everyday activities. You became accustomed to hugging her naked body, highlighting her feminine charms. You passed your time thinking about your normal life, and praying for a miracle.

Finally, that miracle came a month after Mary had first turned you into a dress for Trish. Mary had completely calmed down, and missed you sorely. Thinking that maybe she should hear your side of the story, she made an exact replicate of the dress with some spare gummy, and snuck into your house. She crept upstairs while Trish was in the bathroom.

She slipped the replacement dress into the closet and lifted you out, folding you and tucking you into her purse without a word. You were ecstatic to see her again, but slightly worried about what her intentions may have been. She carried you all the way over to her house, and up to her room, where she locked the door.

She dropped you onto the floor, and uncapped a small bottle of solvent. It only took a few drops for your body to fizzle and bubble, slowly loosening. After a few minutes, you had turned into a glob, and then you had reformed to normal a few minutes after that. You were your usually self, sitting naked on the floor and staring up at Mary.

“Uh…hey Mary.” You said, after a long moment of silence. She was looking down at you with a neutral expression.

“Start talking.” She said, her voice devoid of emotion. You were caught off guard by this response, but didn’t waste any time launching into an explanation of everything that had transpired. You mentioned how Elise had cornered you at school. How she had lied about everything. You also mentioned how sad you were from how Mary had treated you, and how your mom had worn you constantly for the past month.

When you finished your story, Mary had the same expression on her face. However, this quickly changed, as her eyes began to tear up. Her lips trembled, and she soon broke out into a long and painful sob. She fell to her knees, scooped you up into her arms, and hugged you tightly. Your face was buried against her large, warm breasts.

“I’M SO SORRY JACK!!!” Mary wailed, her high-pitched cries hurting your ears. “I’M SO SORRY!!!! PLEASE FORGIVE ME!!!”

“I…I do M…Mary…” You tried to talk, but it was hard with Mary’s squishy flesh shoved against your face.

“I…I shouldn’t have gotten so angry! I should’ve listened to you first! I’m such an IDIOT!!!” Mary bawled, her wet tears slapping against your face. “Please forgive me! I love you so much!!!”

“Mary!” You said, louder this time. You managed to push away from her chest. “I do forgive you. Elise is to blame. She lied, and anyone would believe a lie coming from her. She’s as cunning as they get. Anyone would’ve been hurt and angry in that sort of situation. I don’t blame you. I still love you, and I always will.” You smiled brightly.

“JACK!!!” Mary smiled, and she kissed you passionately. Her forceful kiss knocked you backwards onto the floor, and your loving embrace quickly became a bit more than just a simple kiss.

Five minutes later, Mary sat up and leaned against her bed, breathing heavily. She was blushing, and so were you. You took a moment to cool yourself down, and Mary grinned at you sheepishly. You stood up, straightened your hair, and gave Mary a quick kiss on the forehead.

What happens next?

As you drew nearer, you examined her a bit more closely. She was clearly in her twenties, and though the loose blouse and tan pants didn’t exactly make her stand out, she was clearly an attractive girl. Her brunette hair was short, and her matching brown eyes looked like chocolate. Her skin was tan and smooth. She was pretty, for sure. A small nametag read: “Joslyn”.

“Excuse me?” You spoke up, standing beside Joslyn. She didn’t even hear you, as her attention was completely engrossed in her phone. “Excuse me!” You said, louder this time.

“What’s up kiddo?” She asked, glancing to the side. Her smile was sweet, her expression cute.

“I have to talk to you. I’m not a little kid.” You crossed your arms for emphasis, only adding to your pouty-kid look. Joslyn stifled a laugh.

“Sure thing bud.” She patted your head affectionately. “Why don’t you play with the other kids until your big sister and her friends finish their exercise.”

“She’s not my big sister!” You complained, the pitch of your voice rising. “She’s my…”

“Uh huh. Look.” Joslyn grabbed a rubix cube from off the floor and handed it to you. “You’re a big boy, right? Can you solve this? I think you can do it bud!” She rubbed your head playfully, and gave you a gentle shove, sending you stumbling back a few feet. She turned her attention right back to her phone, and continued scrolling through social media.

You frowned and were about to walk right back over to her when you felt a weight latch onto your foot. Off balance, you fell to the floor, landing on your back. The one-year-old girl from before was crawling up your legs, squishing them as she went. She was giggling, and drool was falling from her mouth. No doubt she had caught your strawberry cheesecake scent.

You let out a cry of panic, but your plea for help drowned in with the rest of the cries and shrieks of the excited children. Unable to bring yourself to hurt a baby, you simply tried to squirm and wiggle free. This proved pointless as you knocked over a pillar of toy blocks, which proceeded to fall and crush your arms.

Helpless, you stared in horror as the girl made it to your stomach, and your lungs and chest flattened beneath her. With childlike glee, the little girl pressed down on your face, squashing it flat. Babbling, she grabbed at your squished body with tiny hands, rolling you into a little ball. Once finished, she opened her mouth and dropped you in.

Your body fell onto the little girl’s tongue, and you became soaked in her sticky saliva. She rolled you around her cavernous mouth, savoring your sweet taste. Like any baby, she was curious, so you couldn’t really fault her for her actions. You were still afraid for your life, but there was nothing you could do to save yourself.

“Hey! What are you doing?” Joslyn asked, standing up. She saw that the little girl was chewing on something, but Joslyn hadn’t started snack time yet. She walked over to the little girl. The little girl, who’s sharp teeth had just torn off your clothes, tasted your sweaty clothes instead of sweet strawberry, and she scrunched up her face.

With incredible force, she spat you out of her mouth, and you sailed through the air. You travelled a few feet, before landing with a wet splat on Joslyn’s now empty chair. Joslyn whirled around in surprise as the girl spit out her “food”, but she didn’t see where you landed. Instead, she just shrugged her shoulders, gave the girl a playfully pat, and returned to her seat.

Oblivious, she plopped down onto the chair, and you were painfully squashed flat under her sizable rear. All of her weight pressed down on you, squeezing the life out of you as your body flattened to a papery state. Thankfully, Joslyn felt you almost instantly thanks to the saliva coating you, and she stood up in a hurry, peeling you off of her butt. You had narrowly avoided disaster, as you would’ve blended in perfectly with Joslyn’s tan pants. However, you weren’t out of danger. Far from it.

“What is this thing?” Joslyn mused as she scrunched you up between her fingers. She molded you into a small blob, clenching her fist to try and determine what you were. You couldn’t talk, move, or reform in your current state, so your fate was entirely in her unaware hands.
12332112231.title: Joslyn and the Day Care

choices: She shapes you into a swimsuit for a beach trip.
She stretches you over her favorite chair cushion.
She shapes you into an elegant dress for her cousins wedding.
123321122311.content:
Joslyn tilted her head as she squished you between her fingers, she had no idea what you were but you were warm, soft and squishy. She sniffed the air and caught the sweet smell of strawberry cheesecake, making her smile. "whatever this is, its kinda cool...i'll figure it out later" She said casually, squishing you around absentmindedly as she headed to where she kept her purse. She unzipped her bag and squished you down into it, it was quite full of stuff so there wasnt a lot of room but she forced the zipper shut again as the contents compressed tightly around you. As your world went totally black, you couldnt help but mentally whimper. This girl was going to take you home with her when her shift ended and you had no way of communicating that you were alive. These kinds of misunderstandings never ended well, but at least usually it was around people you knew so rescue was possible. You had no idea where this girl lived or if she would go anywhere near the places your friends went, other than the gym obviously.

You listened in silent fear at the muffled sounds of the kids playing for a few hours before the zipper was undone, a heavy phone dropped painfully down ontop of you and the zipper closed again. A sudden lurch told you that Joslyn had picked up the bag, the swaying motion signalling her walking, probably with her purse slung over her shoulder. You had hoped Stacy would somehow find and rescue you, but she had totally forgotten you were there and had left over an hour ago, you were on your own.

Joslyn tossed her purse on the backseat of her car and climbed in, starting up the engine. She had no idea that she was kidnapping someone in her purse as she pulled out of the parking lot. Singing along with the music on her radio she kept her focus on the road, not even giving the squishy gunk she found earlier a thought. It was a good forty minute drive to her house before she grabbed her purse and headed inside. Only once she was home and had unzipped her bag did she remember you, pulling you out with a wet "slorp" sound, where you had stuck to her phonecase. "oh yeah, this thing" She muttered, squishing you more between her fingers. With a thoughtful look she pinched you with both hands and stretched her arms wide, her eyes going wide as you stretched effortlessly. "whoa. whatever this is, its amazing." She twisted you into a knot, which was amazingly painful but you couldn't make a sound before squishing you into a tight little ball with her hands. Your body was really getting mixed up as it was forced to compress into itself from a knot to a ball, fusing your body in odd ways. Joslyn put you down on her computer desk and searched up for squishy materials with sweet smells. It didn't take long for her to find results for a newish and increasingly popular matieral called Gummy. She slowly grinned, assuming she had found some of this new fancy material, unaware you were a person.

"so this stuff is used to make all sorts of clothing and stuff..." She muttered, looking up how it was used for anything from ballgowns to sportsware, to comfortable seat cushions. So many idea of what to do with her new find as she read up about Gummy dye, Beta4 and solvent to learn all she needed to make sure you stayed however she wanted. While this was going on, you desperatly tried to reform but her playing with you before seemed to have messed your body up big time, you couldn't so much as twitch, let alone reform to normal. You watched with a growing sense of dread as she looked up so many examples of gummy products. You see her place an express order for Beta4, a dozen different dyes and a small bottle of solvent. Her hand stroking over you as she picked up the ball with a grin "Hmmm ok little gummy ball, what shall I make you into" She said, mostly to herself as she didnt expect gummy to talk.

You hoped that whatever she was going to shape you into, you escaped from before her express, same day delivery order arrived....
123321122311.title: Joslyn's curious about you, so she puts you...

choices: Elise hands you back to Erica, letting her do the tormenting.
Elise keeps you for herself. She has plenty of torture plans in mind.
12332112232.content:
You saw the staff member on the other side of the nursery, sitting on a chair and texting on her phone. She was your only hope for getting out of this mess, and you needed to convince her you weren't a stupid kid, and that you didn't belong in the play area. Before you were able to walk even five feet, you hit a roadblock.

That roadblock was a little girl, probably eight years old. She was wearing a frilly dress that probably cost a fortune. Her long blonde locks spiraled down around her back and down to her thighs. She looked like a princess, and despite her young age, she had a sort of bitchy look in her face. She reminded you of a tiny Elise, a girl from school who you absolutely hated, and who absolutely hated you.

“You look weird.” She said to you, like it was something common to say. You tried to ignore her and push past, but she stopped you with a shift punch to the gut. You were caught completely unprepared, and you gasped and fell to your knees. You stomach had been crushed slightly from the blow, and it hurt like hell.

The girl smirked, and knelt down in front of you. She looked intently at you, and you looked back. The two of you were eye to eye. Her stare was intense, and you felt a chill run down your spine. You had never been so scared of an eight year old in your life. After a long minute of silence, the girl spoke again.

“I like you, so I think I'm going to keep you.” The girl smiled, with an expression not unlike ones you've seen on Gary and Elise. You knew this girl was trouble. You considered yourself to be a nice person, but you weren't going to give up easily. You pushed back at the girl, your weak gummy limbs managing to upset her balance. The girl toppled backwards, but while falling she snapped her fingers three times.

Almost immediately several large forces crashed down onto you, squashing you flat. You tried to cry out for help, but your mouth was the first part of your body to be smashed. Three little girls who had been happily playing with dolls had dropped everything at the sound of the main girl's finger snapping, and they had piled onto your body without hesitation. In seconds you were nothing but a big flat sticker.

The three girls stepped off of you, and the main girl peeled you roughly off of the floor. She waved you around tauntingly, her expression that off cruel victory.

“I'd thank you to be more nice around Erica Courthouse.” The little girl grinned from ear to ear. Her name was apparently Erica, though you didn't recognize her last name. It did sound vaguely familiar however. Erica crumpled you up into a tiny ball, and dismissed her lackeys with a wave of her hand. Erica sat down on a plastic kid's throne and rolled you between her fingers.

“Those girls who crushed you are the daughters of the maids who work at the mansion where I live.” Erica explained. “They do everything I say, just like their mothers.” It felt weird hearing an eight year old girl talk like she was eighteen, but sometimes the truth is just as strange as fiction. “Still, those girls are nice, if somewhat stupid. They might be...my friends. Maybe.”

Erica was about to play with you more when the staff member, who had somehow not witnessed the entire incident earlier, walked over to her.

“Miss Courthouse, someone is here to pick you up.” The employee said, their voice barely above a whisper. You couldn't believe it. The twenty year old staff girl was terrified of Erica!

“Thank you.” Erica nodded, and then walked out of the play area, through the open door that the staff member held open. The maid's daughters trailed behind Erica. Erica walked through the gym and past the exercise bikes, where Mary, Stacy, and Emma were still enjoying their nice workout. You couldn't see at the moment, as your face was crushed, but you somehow still knew that your chance for rescue was slipping away.

Erica approached the front door, where a familiar person was waiting for her. It was none other than Elise, the bitch from high school! You had no idea that Elise was the daughter of a millionaire! And Elise's presence meant only one thing, that Erica was her little sister.

“Hey Erica.” Elise smile warmly. “Whatcha got in your hand?” Erica handed you over to Elise.

“Just a new toy, that's all.” Erica said with a straight face. She had no qualms about taking your life away if it meant entertainment for her. Elise squashed you with her hand a few times, until her face lit up. She recognized you. What happens next?
12332112232.title: The Courthouse Girls

choices: Life as Erica's plaything, but for how long?
You try to sneak away that night, but Elise finds you!
123321122321.content:
Elise smirked recognising you and whispered "Hi Jackie, welcome to your new home. Be good to my sister or i'll make your life even worse" she said before handing you back to Erica who gripped you tightly in her hand as she settled in the car. Elise got in after her and their driver took them home, to a rather large mansion on the outskirts of town. Peeking between Erica's fingers you realised no one you knew ever would find you here. It would be up to your own wits to escape this place.

When Erica got up to her room, once again followed by the little maids daughters she casually dropped you on the floor and turned to them "Make sure my new toy is dressed prettily when it reforms" She said, calling you an IT so naturally. This little brat was certainly a bitch, but the girls obeyed her. No sooner had you regained arms and legs than you found yourself squeezed into the frilliest, girliest huge gummy dress you had ever seen. Outfits like this were collector level expensive off the shops. No matter how much you tugged you couldn't get it off yourself, you needed someone else to help.

Erica next complained about your face and the girls quickly gave you a make over, until your face was painted up like a doll and your hair had been curled and bleached blonde. Tasting lip gloss you pointed a finger at Erica "look little girl, just because you are rich doesn't mean you can..." You began to protest before she clicked her fingers with a frown and one of the girls pinched your lips shut before smearing what looked like gummy glue over them. As your lips reformed and you couldn't seperate them, it turns out it was gummy glue.

"Toy's don't talk back to their owners little doll" she said and gave you a shove, causing you to stumble back and trip over the petticoats of your outfit. as you lay on the floor she towered over you "you belong to me, you are my doll, my toy, my plaything. Anything i want to do to you I will. All the servents in the house do what I tell them so you will never get away!" She looked smug "Now i think I will name you... Princess Pottypants!" She said with a giggle, the other girls giggling just behind her, knowing they should.

You couldn't believe it, this little brat was treating you like you were something that could be owned. With Elise around you knew better than to try to run out of the room, she would do much worse to you if she found you wandering alone. Plus, this dress was heavy and difficult to move in. You hoped Erica would lower her guard if you played along and maybe you could get away soon...
123321122321.title: Elise hands you back to Erica, letting her do t...

choices: You choose to be molded into clothing for Elise's gorgeous mother, Evelyn.
You choose to be baked into a dessert as a reward for the new maid.
1233211223212.content:
You put on the biggest smile you could manage, doing everything you could to appease Erica. You thought that if you played along, there would be a chance the she would be lax with you, potentially allowing you a chance to escape. The only downside was the you were put through one humiliating experience after another for the rest of the day. You sat at tea parties, experienced an hour under each of the young girl’s butts, and her lastly licked and chewed in Erica’s mouth.

At around 9:00 that night, it was time for Erica to be put to bed. Erica dropped you in the corner of her room, in a large pile of several other dolls. You sat on the top of the pile of dolls, trying your best to look like an emotionless, plastic toy. To your relief, Erica didn’t seem to remember you, as she simply crawled into her bed. A minute later, the door to her bedroom swung wide open, and someone strolled in.

A woman who appeared to be no older than twenty walked into the room. She was quite tall, about 5’10”, and her nice, long legs seemed to stretch for miles. She had wavy blonde hair down past her shoulders, and sparkling blue eyes. She was also insanely curvaceous, with gigantic boobs, a round jiggly ass, and perfect thighs. Her appearance was complimented by a flowing silk night gown. From the wiggling of her flesh, it was clear she wasn’t wearing any underwear. The woman also carried herself with a powerful stride. She was perhaps the most beautiful woman you had ever seen.

“Goodnight my love.” The woman smiled warmly, bending down to plant a soft kiss on Erica’s forehead. Her voice was like a choir of angels.

“Night mom.” Erica sighed pleasantly, actually sounding like a cute little girl. You softly gasped in surprise. This hourglass-figured woman was Erica and Elise’s mother? She looked like she was only twenty, though in reality she was thirty-five. Her name was Evelyn Courthouse, though most people call her Eve. She is kind and caring to everyone around her, always eager to help those in need. Unfortunately, she usually tends to be a rather clumsy, forgetful, and oblivious woman.

“I’ll see you in the morning.” Eve walked out of the room, and you knew this was your only chance. Staying completely behind Eve, you dashed out of the room as she closed the door, making as minimal noise as you could. Thankfully, Eve remained totally oblivious to you, closing Erica’s door without even seeing you slip out. She then sauntered away, and you couldn’t help but watch her quivering ass shake back and forth as she walked off, her silky gown doing almost nothing to contain her curves.

You sank to your knees, breathing heavily and trying to calm yourself down. You had thought for sure that Eve was going to see you sneak out, but due to her oblivious nature and the very dark hallways of the mansion, you had not been spotted. After cooling your nerves, you stood up and began wandering around the mansion, desperate to find the way out of this house before anyone caught you.

Several times you had to hide behind vases, duck into cabinets, or just pretend to be a normal doll when a maid would come strolling down the hallway. One maid even noticed you on the floor, and with a giggle, picked you up and carried you all the way back to Erica’s room, placing you outside the door. As she walked away, you swore several times under your breath, as you had been so close to escaping.

You wandered aimlessly for such a long time, that it wasn’t until nearly midnight that you found yourself walking into the lobby of the mansion, the front door looming before you. You had managed to navigate the dark, massive, three floor mansion, and you were eager to escape through the door and head home. You walked up to the door and just barely managed to grab the doorknob. You twisted it…and it was locked.

“Looking for this?” A cold voice snickered. You whirled around to find Elise reclining in a lounge chair, feet propped up on a footstool. She was spinning a large key around in her hand. “I locked the front door and kept watch, because I just knew something like this would happen.” Elise stood up, and you could see she was only wearing an expensive and silky bra and panties. “Don’t you get it Jackie? You’re never, EVER, going to leave this house.”

You opened your mouth to scream, and Elise lunged at you. She tackled you to the floor, her boobs along crushing your chest flat. In one solid movement she stood up, peeled you off of her body, and crumpled you up into a ball. With a flick of her wrist, your doll clothes were ripped right off and tossed into the trash can. You were now nothing but a tan lump of gummy, all your hopes and dreams crushed in an instant.

“I bet you were so happy, weren’t you?” Elise asked, walking back to her lounge chair and sitting down. “You thought you were home free. Well, did I crush all of that hope? Good.” She let out a yawn. “Man, I’m tired. Still, I’m not about to go to sleep without torturing you some more. Erica had her chance, and she failed. You’re mine now.”

“The question is…what do I do with you? I need to do something that’s sexy, humiliating, painful, and will keep you hidden for a very long time. It seems difficult, but I have a few ideas. Idea one: I think you would make a perfect addition to my mother’s wardrobe. She’s a very sexy and curvaceous woman, so she would surely appreciate some custom made gummy clothing. Don’t even think of trying to get her to help you. She’ll set you on a chair, go to call your mom, forget what she was doing halfway, and then plop her ass right on top of you.

“Idea two: Our family just hired a new maid, and she’s certainly something. She’s a perfect maid, and I’ve been meaning to give her a gift. How do you think she would like a special little dessert, with you as the secret ingredient? She gobbles you up, shits you out, and you plop down into our private septic tank beneath the mansion. You wallow in disgusting waste for a day, until one of our worker’s empties the tank, making sure to pick you out and give you back to me. You would still get back to me in the end, but I'd make sure to make each of your torture sessions interesting and unique!"

“Really though, it’s your decision Jackie. I’m leaving the choice entirely up to you. Do you want to be a permanent addition to my mother’s collection of clothing, or does a trip through a sexy maid’s body sound better. Take your pick. Wiggle for option one, don’t do anything for option two.” Elise waited for your response, a sadistic smile on her face. After some hesitation, and realizing that your situation was hopeless, you made your choice, hoping some stroke of fate would save your life.
1233211223212.title: Wandering the Halls

choices: "pick what you like, my mom never wears these anymore" Mary might pick you.
"This is my mothers wardrobe, vaccum it daily" Mary got hired as a Maid.
12332112232121.content:
Not wishing to be trapped going through the digestive system of someone and then spending the night in a septic tank as well as knowing you were trapped between two horrible options, you could only wriggle. Elise's eyes lit up as she grinned "Oh what a silly choice squishy boy, there was always the chance one of our servants would mess up and dump the septic tank with you in it, letting you escape. We don't keep any solvent for Beta4 in the house, once you are molded you are trapped forever" She taunted to let you know what a collosal mistake you made.

Carrying your terrified orb of a body down to the servants sleeping quarters with a sadistically gleeful skip in her step, Elise opened the door to one of the girls rooms and shook her awake. the poor girl stirred confused "M..miss Elise..is something wrong?" She asked rrubbing her eyes. Elise shoved your orb into her hands and said "You are the best gummy molder in the staff Jane, make this into something my mother will love right away and leave it hanging in her closet to find" She said simply before leaving the girl blinking in the darkness, holding you confused.

In her sleepy state she didn't notice your attempts at squirming but simply got up to obediently begin molding you. She took you to a room filled with sewing machines, reels of fabric and other such things of fashion design. She rolled you out into a long sheet, smoothing you out to get rid of any remaining "discolourisation" of your features. She then began painting a beautiful design of flowers and swirls in varying shades of pale pinks and purples. she rubbed a clear powder into every inch of you, making sure not to miss a spot before she ran a hairdryer over you to warm it up. You felt it melting into your gummy flesh and bonding, making you shimmer like satin and seal in the colours of the fabric dye.

After that she began folding and overlapping your shape with a look of sleepy but determined concentration on her face. By now you couldn't even twitch with how much she had flattened and shaped you. Finally came the worst part, she sprayed a thick mist of Beta4 over every inch of you, inside and out before slipping you onto a hanger. Catching a glimpse of yourself in the window reflection, you saw a beautiful dress, medium shoulder straps hanging it from the hanger, a shaped bodice with the swirls of colour helping shape it, a wrapped sash around the waist that tied off into a bow at the side and a skirt that flared out at hip height, with a pale but beautiful painting of a flower on the skirt. It shimmered like satin, looked amazingly beautifull and you knew it was you.

Not even Elise knew what you looked like, once the maid had quietly tucked you into the closet amongst hundreds of other dresses, she left as ordered meaning the only person who knew this specific dress was a molded ball of gummy was the maid, no one, not even Elise knew this dress was you.

You hung there motionless for a few weeks, only getting glimpses of light as Eve chose her daily outfits, never een going near you. Clearly she had so many clothes she didn't notice a new design amongst them. Eventually though they were holding an elegant party and she spotted you "ooh this one is simply divine" she said as she held you up to herself infront of the mirror. A short while later, with the help of her maids, Eve's body was inside you, feeling her warm flesh and heavy globes of breasts pressed up inside you. her legs brushing against her loose skirts as she walked. Your eyes bounced with her footsteps, apparently on the top of the bodice.

You saw Elise wearing a sky blue slinky dress as the party started, she commented on how beautiful her mother looked but paid you no extra attention, she didn't know the dress was even you. You cried for help but no one could hear, you tried to escape but your body would not move on its own. Eventually the night was over, you were stripped from Eve's warm flesh and hand washed by a maid before being dried and placed back in her wardrobe.

Eve wore you very rarely, she had so many outfits and was always buying more. You could do nothing but hang there like a pretty dress as the weeks turned into months, which in turn turned into years. Elise was right, you were never put near solvent, you were a dress for parties, there would be no solvent there. You often wondered what was going on in the lives of those you loved. Had they given up on finding you? Had Mary moved on? Was your mother ok? None of these questions had answers as you hung in the vast walk in wardrobe in Eve's bedroom. It had been so long that your memories of being human were vague at best, you kept telling yourself your name was Jack, but it didn't help when you couldn't say it out loud.

One day however, you heard voices. Trying to glance to the side so you could see more than just the green gown that was your neighbour on the rack, you saw a full grown and beautiful Elise wearing an elegant short black dress and heels followed by a woman who awoke so many memories in you, it was Mary, fully grown. but Mary and Elise had never gotten along, why was Mary here? You saw Elise turn to her and say...
12332112232121.title: You choose to be molded into clothing for Elise...

choices: Mary, carrying solvent to free you, and then smuggle you out of the mansion.
Evelyn, looking for a dress to bring with her on a cruise. She chooses you!
123321122321212.content:
“This is my mother’s wardrobe, vacuum it daily.” Elise droned, clearly bored. You shifted your focus from Mary’s beautiful face to the rest of her body, and could now see that she was wearing a fairly revealing French Maid uniform. You realized that she must have taken a job at the Courthouse Manor working as a maid.

“Yes ma’am. I understand completely.” Mary nodded, the perfect picture of a loyal maid.

“Good. Other than that…” Elise closed the wardrobe, but you could still hear the two women talking. “…you need only to listen and obey every single command I or my mother give to you. Do that, and you will be paid more for this job than you could ever hope to earn in your own, insignificant life.”

“Insignificant. Yes ma’am.” Mary agreed, not missing a beat. She didn’t even flinch at Elise’s cruel remark.

“Glad to hear you know your place.” Elise giggled. “The servants’ quarters are on the first floor and down the west hallway. You are finished for today.” You could hear the faint sounds of the two girls leaving the room, and the door closing behind them. Even if your situation had not changed much, your heart was filled with hope and happiness at being able to see your beloved girlfriend once more. Maybe, just maybe, she would free you from this madness.

Night passed, and morning came once again. Evelyn opened her wardrobe, her soft hands brushing against your body as she searched for something to wear. She settled on a simple, purple gown, and closed the wardrobe, casting you back into darkness. Two hours later, you heard someone enter the room, and the wardrobe door was opened to reveal Mary, who was dragging a vacuum cleaner behind her.

She gazed at the wardrobe, a bored expression on her face, and turned on the vacuum cleaner. The engine roared loudly as it sucked up dust from the floor of the wardrobe. Mary twisted and turned around the wardrobe to clean every inch of the floor, her body bumping into you several times. Finally, she finished, and it seemed as if she was going to close the wardrobe and leave the room.

Suddenly, she closed the wardrobe door behind her and pressed tightly against the clothes rack. She was visibly shaking, and breathing heavily.

“Jack. I know that you’re in here.” Mary whispered, and your heart skipped a beat. “I’ve never once forgotten you over these long six years. In fact, I’ve been doing a lot of investigating, and the trail of evidence led me here. All I know is that you are one of these dresses, and have been for all this time. So until I can rescue you, I’m going to work as a maid for this…this BITCH.”

Mary spat in anger, and her saliva actually splattered across your face. Of course, Mary had no idea what she had done, so you couldn’t really be too grossed out.

“I brought a secret weapon with me, and I’m going to save you. I swear.” Mary pulled out a tiny bottle of solvent from her cleavage, and you noticed it had a small dropper inside. Mary proceeded to let one solvent drop on each dress in the rack, leaving a tiny spot of raw gummy on every dress. No one would notice, and Mary would get the results that she wanted.

Mary then walked down the line, taking in a deep whiff of each of the dresses, gowns, and outfits lining the clothes rack. When she reached you, she breathed in deeply at the one spot on your body she had freed from the Beta4 hold. She then moved on, but paused as your familiar strawberry scent finally tickled her nose. She scurried back over to you and took in several more deep whiffs, confirming that it was you.

“Oh god Jackie!” Mary cried, tears of joy flowing freely. She embraced you tightly, squeezing your front half into her warm and squishy breasts. She didn’t let you go for a full five minutes. “I’m so glad I found you! I’m really sorry, but this is all the solvent I could smuggle in my outfit. I’ll come back for you tomorrow, and we’ll be cuddling back at home by tomorrow night!”

Mary opened the wardrobe door and stepped out. She blew you a kiss, dried her tears, and the closed the door. You heard her push the vacuum cleaner out of Evelyn’s bed room, and then close the door behind her.

You were on cloud nine, and could hardly process this wonderful turn of fate you had been blessed with. The most amazing human being in the world had finally returned to you, and you were finally going to be your normal self again. You drifted into a pleasant sleep, your thoughts of Mary.

You were woken up the next morning by the wardrobe door being thrown open. As your eyes adjusted to the bright light of the bed room, you saw…
123321122321212.title: Mary's Mission

choices: you get misplaced during the cruise.
after a month long cruise, you are taken back "home"
