12333.content:
As your vision bounced and jiggled, you briefly caught a glimpse of Mrs. Evans before Stacy turned around to sit on the couch.
"Hold it", Tina said to the redhead, stopping her from taking a seat and preventing you from getting squished again. "It looks like you sat in something. Turn around please?"

The girl was puzzled, but did as she was told anyway. As she turned the other way and looked down at her ass, both she and Mrs. Evans burst with laughter. There, clear as day, was your gooey form, spread across Stacy's bubble butt, only your eyes having managed to reform. "Haha, oops! Sorry about that, Jack", the girl laughed. Mary, however, didn't find it as funny.

"Jackie!", she cried before peeling you off of her friend's bike shorts. "How on earth did you get here?", she asked as she held onto your two-dimensional body.

"Yeah, wasn't he in your room earlier?", her mother asked as they waited for you to reform.

Once you were completely back to normal, Mary sat you in her lap and hugged you like a teddy bear. "So how'd you end up on my butt?", Stacy asked as she sat down with the two of you, wiping the sweat off of her. "Um, sorry again", she said, blushing a bit.

"*sigh* It's alright", you said as you held onto Mary's arms. "It's not your fault. After Mary left the room, Gary took me and poured me into the bike cushion. M-maybe I ought to try learning how to reform faster..."

"Ugh!" Mary set you down and stormed off, hoping to confront her twin brother, but he had apparently locked his door, as you could hear her banging on the door and yelling. After a few minutes of this, she had given up and stomped back into the living room. "Ugh, I can't believe him! And you're still letting him go to the party?", she asked her mother.

"I'm sorry, but I'm going to need help setting everything up. I'll make sure to have some sort of punishment ready for when we get back, though, so don't worry", Mrs. Evans said as she started pedaling on the exercise bike, squeezing in a quick workout before they left for the housewarming party. "You know", Tina said, looking in your direction. "If you stood up for yourself every once in a while, he might pick on you a little less." While your own mother had coddled you a bit more than was necessary, the twins' parents were always trying to get you to 'man up' and stand up for yourself more and not rely on other people to defend you.

"W-well I would, but that might make him even more upset, a-and he's a lot bigger and stronger than me", you stammered. Running into the twins when you were younger was both the best, and worst thing to ever happen to you. Even though you met the girl who would become your girlfriend, her brother was the bane of your existence. Not only had he successfully destroyed your self-esteem, constantly reminding you of how weak you were and how little it took to squash you like a bug, but he made sure to mess with you every chance he got. More than once, you had ended up as their mom's toejam, mixed in with Mary's dessert, or turned into the bully's gum.

Mary then picked you up and sat on the couch. "Mom, it's not his fault he can't defend himself", she said as she gave you a kiss on the forehead. "You'll just have to stick closer to me", she giggled as she hugged you tightly.


"Not too close", Tina said as she hoped off of the exercise bike. "I don't need to see any little squishy babies crawling around any time soon", she said, causing both you and Mary to blush and Stacy to giggle.

"M-mom!", Mary yelled, her face bright red.

"W-we don't do anything, um, dirty, Mrs. Evans", you said. It was true that you and Mary had never actually done anything sexual, but you'd be lying if you had never thought about it.

"I'd hope not", the twins' mother said as she wiped the sweat off her face. "I know you two are close, but sometimes kids your age get certain... urges."

"Ew. Mom. Gross. I'm out of here", Mary said as she set you down. "Stacy, keep an eye out for my brother, I'm gonna take a shower before we head to the party", she said as she left the room, her mother soon leaving as well.

You sigh as you lean back in the large (to you) couch. Neither of you liked talking about stuff like that, both because it was embarrassing, and because you were still pretty young. Just as you're in mid-thought you notice a shadow blocking your vision.

"Oops!~" You soon found yourself back underneath Stacy's plump rear, completely flattened by her weight. "Sorry about that, Jackie", she giggled. Though you knew it wasn't an accident, you weren't upset with her. It's not like she was being mean, she was just messing around.

"*groan* Mmmf rrlrght", you groaned underneath the redhead as she wiggled her her butt into you. She continued to sit there until you heard the shower stop running, after which she got up and allowed you to reform, after which she patted your head and left to go change her clothes, as she wasn't going to the party with the twins. After returning to normal, you're greeted by Mrs. Evans, wearing a simple, tight-fitting purple dress, walking into the living room.

"Well, I guess you should call your mother to pick you up. Unless you want to come along with us", she said.

"Y-you mean to the party?", you asked, a bit surprised.

"You might as well, you're already here. Besides, Marilynn's been wanting to show you these matching outfits she got for the two of you", she said. "But, I know how much your mother worries whenever you're late getting home", she said, as Stacy looked around the corner.

You did want to spend a little bit more time with Mary, and you know how much it makes her happy to see you wear the clothes she picks out for you. Though, you don't know the other people at the party, and Gary might use this chance to mess with you.

Then again, you knew that calling your mom this late might make her upset, if she's even at home. She spends a lot of time next door at the Morrison's house when you aren't at home, though you aren't sure why. Actually, it's more like you don't want to know, given how close she is with Andrew's mom.

Maybe you can catch a ride with Stacy. She does live right across the street from you.

What will you do?

Mary drops you on her bed, and shuts the door to the her room behind her.

“Alright Jackie!” She exclaims. “I’ve got a simple but awesome outfit for today’s party. Are you ready?”

“Of course Mary!” You cheerily reply, silently hoping it isn’t something utterly embarrassing. Instead, Mary opens a box, and pulls out an attractive red dress, and a small red suit! The outfits look amazing, and you tell Mary so. She gives you a kiss, and then gently shoves you into her closet to get dressed.

You slip into the red suit, and it fits perfectly. You admire yourself in the mirror, and are pleased to see that you look quite handsome in the suit. You hear Mary say that you can leave the closet, and you do, only to find yourself staring at Mary, who is wearing the tight, sexy, red dress, and is standing by her door, waiting for you.

You find yourself staring at Mary for a full thirty seconds. The dress hugs her curves nicely, and shows off just enough cleavage to be enticing yet modest.

“Hello? Earth to Jackie?” Mary calls, blushing, as she notices you staring.

“Oh. Sorry!” You apologize. You and Mary leave the room and walk back to where Tina and Gary are waiting. All four of you get into the car, and drive to the housewarming party. Gary stares silently at you the entire car ride, making you quite uncomfortable. Mary leans on you as you ride though, and her warm body resting beside you makes it all better.

Once at the house, the four of you enter through the front door, and are greeted by the family. The mom introduces herself as Janice, and she is quite the looker. She has big breasts and a nice butt and thighs to boot. Her daughter Isabelle is just the same, only younger and a little less curvy. Isabelle and Mary immediately head upstairs to Isabelle’s room, and Tina goes off with Janice. You are left with Gary, but you aren’t too worried, as there are over twenty other people spread throughout the relatively big house.

“Hey Jack. Come check this out!” Gary motions for you to follow him. He slips through the crowd and through a door into the kitchen. You are a little wary, but you still follow him into the kitchen.

Once inside, you realize that the kitchen is completely empty, save you and Gary. Gary turns to you with a sinister smile, and right as you try to leave, he kicks your legs. Your legs bend forward, and you fall. Gary picks up a box from the floor, and drops it onto you, crushing you flat underneath it. And here you thought you would be safe at the party.

Gary lifts the box and puts it back, and then peels your papery form off of the floor.

“Ha! Look at you! Pathetic.” Gary laughs cruelly. “I came up with a perfect plan for you on the way here. I think you’ll love it.” Gary begins to roll your body up, until you are nothing but a little bumpy ball, roughly three inches in diameter. Because of your suit, you are also completyely red. At least your face is poking out, and you can see what is happening.

You tried to move or talk, but alas it was in vain. Gary noticed your minimal efforts, and only laughed harder.

“See ya later squishy! Or not!” He roared. He carried you across the kitchen, and dropped you into a bowl. You landed on some squishy objects, and you could see even more around you. Gary walked out of the kitchen, closing the door behind him.

You attempted to see what you were surrounded by, but you couldn’t make it out. Some sort of strange red objects, similar in appearance to what you now resembled. Just then, the door to the kitchen opened again, and footsteps approached.

The giant face of Janice entered your vision, as she peered down into the bowl you were in. You hoped she would see you, but of course, she didn’t even know about your ability, let alone really know you at all. She stared right at you though, and smiled.

“Mm…” She sighed. “Those meatballs look so delicious!” You gasped. Meatballs!? Oh no! This could be terrible! “All they need now is some tasty sauce!” Janice left your view for a second, and reappeared with a small bowl of sauce in her hand. Without another delay, and nothing you could do, she turned the bowl over, and sauce rained down from above.

The sticky, slimy sauce poured out from the bowl, and splashed down into the bowl of meatballs. The sauce washed over your body and the other meatballs surrounding you, completely coating and covering you with its substance.

Janice, satisfied, picked up the bowl, and carried it out of the kitchen. She passed through the crowd of people and set it down on a table filled with lots of other food and drinks.

“Attention everyone! The meatballs are done!” Janice announced to her guests. “They are really good, so make sure to grab some! You won’t regret it.” Janice walked off, as swarms of people headed to the table.

Many, many people began to appear in your vision, peering into the bowl to grab some meatballs. Every time the spoon entered the bowl to pick up a meatball, you thought you would be chosen, but you never were, thank goodness. Many different guests passed without taking you, and you hoped that maybe you would be spared. Unfortunately, it was not meant to be.

12333112112.title: Isabelle's mother Janice is doing the laund...

123331121122.content:
Somehow, in a feat that you never would have thought possible, your body had been morphed and molded into a perfect pink skirt by the end of the wash cycle. Your squishy body had been stretched and pulled, and then your head had gotten practically fused to your feet from all the spinning and crushing the wash cycle had put you through. Your red coloring was also gone, as your clothes had been torn to smithereens. Your naked body was bright pink though, a result of the beating you had been put through.

Janice cocked her head to the side upon spotting you, not remembering anyone in her house owning a cute pink skirt like the one she saw in front of her. After a moment she shrugged her shoulders, simply assuming that Isabelle had gone out and bought a skirt that she merely didn't know about. Without another thought, Janice gathered you up in her hands, and dropped you into a basket filled to the brim with other warm and damp articles of clothing.

She carried you and the other clothes out into the warm summer air, and approached what you could tell was a clothes line. She hooked all of the clothes to the line, including you, pinning you up like the useless skirt you were. She unknowingly jabbed the clothes pins right into your eyes, painfully gouging you while you hung there. She sauntered away when she was finished, leaving you there until she was ready to take you down.

For three hours you could do nothing but flutter in the breeze, and wish for the agonizingly sharp clothes pins to be removed from your eyes before you suffered any permanent vision damage. The breeze felt good, and you could feel the moisture evaporate off of your body. You would have thought to reform by now, but something unique had happened. The water coating your body had evaporated in such a way that your head and feet had been fused together in the process. Your body had been sealed in this skirt form essentially, and it would take a long time, or outside help, in order to reform.

Both of those options seemed unlikely though, as Janice returned several minutes later, grabbing you and the rest of the clothes off of the line. She folded you up neatly, placing your face against your back while doing so. This prevented you from being able to see anything, and also hid your most human feature from the rest of the world. Janice didn't know it, but everything she was doing was making your life worse.

She separated Isabelle's clothing from her own, and dropped you into her daughter's basket. Loads of clothes fell on top of you, preventing any attempts at starting to reform. When Janice had finished, she carried the basket to her daughter's room, setting it on the floor beside her bed. She then left the room, leaving you to rot away at the bottom of the basket until someone finally showed up and freed you.

It didn't take long for that to come true, as Isabelle walked into her room an hour later. She smiled as she saw her basket of clean clothes, and got to work sorting the articles of clothing into different drawers and areas of her room. Finally she reached the bottom of the basket and came to you. She frowned upon seeing you, and lifted you into the air in confusion.

“I don't remember this skirt.” Isabelle said. She stroked her fingers across your naked body, causing you blush. This hot girl was feeling you up all over, and yet had no idea. Unfortunately, your blush blended in with your pink skin. Your face was also still tucked away from Janice's folding job, preventing Isabelle from noticing the slight facial features that were still visible.

“It certainly is soft though. And probably super comfy.” Isabelle grinned, but her smile quickly faded. “Still, what if this isn't mine at all? I would be thrilled to have a new skirt to wear, especially one as cute as this, but it could be Mary's. Maybe she accidentally left her skirt here?” Isabelle stood up, clutching you tightly against her ample chest. What does she decided to do next?

Isabelle knocked on the door and stood there waiting for someone to answer, idly rubbing her hands over her new skirt. 12333112112222.content:
“Oh my gosh!” Mary exclaimed, grinning from ear to ear. “It's so cute!” Mary couldn't help but reach out and run her hands across your skirt shaped body. Isabelle giggled at how excited Mary was about her new skirt, and any thoughts of you belonging to Mary flew out of her mind. Surely Mary would have recognized you if you belonged to her. From this point on, Isabelle would keep you for herself.

Upon hearing your beloved girlfriend's words and her hands rubbing your skin, you felt your hopes shatter into a million pieces. Mary was the only person in the entire world who could have possibly gotten you out of this ridiculous mess, and even she didn't recognize you. You really were exactly like a skirt, and now because of her oblivious nature, it seemed as if you were going to spend your life as one.

Mary led Isabelle up to her bedroom, and Isabelle jumped onto Mary's bed like a giddy schoolgirl. Her ass crashed down onto the bed, her butt and thighs mercilessly crushing your underneath all of her weight. Isabelle crossed her legs to get more comfortable, pinning your face between her jiggly thighs as her legs crossed and your fabricy body folded.

“You have a really nice room Mary!” Isabelle gushed. Mary blushed slightly, waving her hand.

“It's nothing really. It doesn't compare at all to your room, that's for sure.” Mary tried to act coy, but you knew how she loved compliments. Thankfully, despite your vision being blocked by Isabelle's thigh, you could still mostly hear everything that was going on. Sadly though, the only human part about you, your faint facial features, were totally obscured.

“I guess my room is pretty fancy. I don't know, after a while it begins to feel pretty boring. You forget how cool it is I guess.” Isabelle shrugged. “I really like the pink décor though.”

“Do you?” Mary inquired. Almost everything in Mary's room was pink, as it happened to be one of her very favorite colors. Anything else in the room was a pleasant shade of tan, not unlike your own skin color. That fact alone had led to quite a few embarrassing incidents, like being crushed into the carpet, stuck to the walls and painted over, or hidden out of sight under Mary's mattress.

“Yeah Mary, the shades of pink are super appealing to the eyes. Not that I'm a fashion expert or anything.” Isabelle smiled. “Though from what I heard, you're quite the fashion guru.”

“Guru?” Mary laughed. “I wouldn't go that far. I'm okay at matching outfits together, and I know what colors work with what. I suppose I dabble in clothing creation occasionally, but I'm far from a guru.”

“Clothing creation? That's amazing!” Isabelle was in awe. “You mean you, like, sew your own clothing and stuff?”

“Yep.” Mary nodded, once more blushing.

“That's so awesome! My mom is a professional fashion designer, but for someone your age to sew your own clothes too? It's pretty inspiring actually. Could I see some of your stuff?”

“Of course! But maybe later, I think I hear my mom coming upstairs.” Almost on cue, Mary's mother Tina walked into the room carrying a glass of water and a glass of fruit punch. She handed the water to your girlfriend and the fruit punch to Isabelle. Tina then walked out of the room, with the two teen girls thanking her for the refreshments.

As Isabelle lifted the lemonade to her lips, she was seized by a sudden sneeze attack that rocked her entire body. That actual sound of the sneeze was quite cute, but the spasm her body went through was not. Her arm jerked, and the entire glass of lemonade was spilled all out across your body. The liquid soaked through your gummy skin, and you shivered ever-so-slightly from the extreme temperature change.

“Aw. Darn it.” Isabelle sighed, looking down at her new skirt. The lemonade had made several discolored splotches on your skin, making you look quite revolting. “My new skirt is ruined!”

“Don't worry Isabelle. My mom's laundry detergent is some pretty powerful stuff. If we wash the skirt now, it should be good as new in an hour or so.” Mary suggested, and Isabelle was so gung-ho about the idea that she slipped you off in less than five seconds, standing before Mary in only a blouse and panties.

Mary picked you up and texted her mom with a request to come and pick you up. As Tina graciously walked upstairs to retrieve you, Mary and Isabelle resumed their previous conversation.

“So, I've been experimenting with clothing design and creation for a while.” Mary admitted. “A few years actually. I usually use simple fabric like cotton, but sometimes I go crazy with silk or even leather.” Isabelle was entranced, and the door opened for Tina to enter. As Tina grabbed you and started to walk away, you heard one last bit of information.

“Just recently, I've been trying out some gummy material. In fact, I just got a huge load of pink gummy material. A bunch of pink gummy blobs. I love the squishy texture, and with the special Beta4 stuff, gummy material makes the softest and most comfortable clothing. Want to make some stuff with me later Isabelle?”

You couldn't hear the reply, as Tina slammed the door behind her. You also couldn't believe what Mary had just said. You hardly knew about her clothing design in the first place, but she was also using gummy material? What if you got mixed up in that material? That could be life threatening! You made a mental note to steer clear of Mary's work area.

Your thoughts were broken by Tina tossing you into the washing machine and starting the cycle. The freezing cold water soaked you to your core, and the spinning began tossing you all across the inside of the barrel. You noticed that you were the only article of clothing in the wash. Because of that, you were slammed all over the place like a rag doll. The wash had only just began, but you were already praying for it to stop.

The washing cycle came to a stop, and it wasn’t hard to tell what you had become. Your poor body had been crumpled and smashed, rolled over and over until you resembled nothing more than a small orb of gummy. You had also sunk to the bottom of the clothes pile, your now ball-like body resting under a few bras and a pair of panties. Sure enough, your intuition was right, as it usually was. She picked you up and sighed, but she had a slight smile on her lips. Abandoning the clothes for a moment, she carried you upstairs and into Mary’s room.

“Mary. One of your gummy orbs was downstairs in the washer.” She tossed you to Mary, who caught you delicately. “Try to be more careful with them.” With that Tina left the room. Mary turned to Isabelle, who was still hanging out with Mary, and flashed her a joyful grin.

“Ready to make some gummy clothing Isabelle?” Mary inquired, and Isabelle’s eyes lit up.

“Really? Right now? With that?” Isabelle could barely contain her excitement.

“Yeah. A wet gummy orb is easier to mold.” Mary squeezed your body several times for emphasis, and you wished you had recognized you. Sadly though, Mary had no reason to suspect that her beloved boyfriend was the glob in her hands, and she went on like everything was normal. Which, to everyone but you, it was.

“Can…can we make…a thong?” Isabelle asked, blushing. Mary blushed to, but barely showed it.

“A thong?”

“Well, a bikini thong. As soon as I get home, my mom is driving me to the airport. I’m visiting the beach with my grandparents for a few months. I want to look sexy, so I was wondering if we could make a few thongs.”

“Uh...yeah sure. That’s fine.” Mary pressed you down onto her desk and then stretched you out. Isabelle eagerly watched Mary, work, even taking a few notes. Mary, with the talent and expertise of a professional, stretched you out to the exact length you would have to be, measuring Isabelle’s ass just to make sure.

She then grabbed your arms and your legs, stretching them out and squeezing them until they were long and thin. The rest of your body was flattened and pressed down until it was as thin and taut as dental floss. Mary finished by attaching your left arm to your left leg, and your right arm to your right leg. Mary dumped you into a vat of Beta4, and proceeded to make two more matching thongs for Isabelle. Once they were all molded and frozen in Beta4, she handed them over to the overly ecstatic Isabelle. Isabelle was so happy that she planted a quick kiss on Mary’s cheek, and then went on to profusely apologize for the next twenty minutes.

The girls went back to chatting and gossiping, and Isabelle set you down near the edge of Mary’s bed. As the conversation dragged on, Isabelle shifted back a bit in the bed, and her rather impressive butt knocked you off onto the floor. Neither of the girls seemed to notice, and you spent the next few hours lying there.

Finally, it was time for Isabelle to go home. Isabelle packed up her belongings, stuffing the other two thongs into her purse. She stood up to leave, ready to head home and drive to the airport, and she began to walk out of the room. As you watched her go, you didn’t know whether to be happy or scared that she had forgotten you. But what happens next?

1233312121.title: In a world of shit

choices: The fridge is opened the next day, for Janice and Isabelle's lunch.

12333122.content:
Suddenly, salvation came to you in the form of a cough. Actually, Tina was choking on you, but she began coughing violently as a result. Her forceful coughs pushed against your squishy body, until finally you shot out of her mouth, landing on her plate with a splat.

“Goodness Tina! Are you alright?” Janice asked her with concern. Tina set her plate down on a nearby table, and composed herself.

“Y…yes. I’m fine. Calm down.” Tina assured the worried host. “The food was just going down the wrong pipe, that’s all.” Tina began to pick up her plate again, but Janice intervened.

“Hold on Tina. Look at your plate. That half chewed meatball is so disgusting looking, isn’t it?” Janice pointed out. Your mashed and sauce caked form did indeed look gross splattered out on Tina’s plate. “I’ll put this plate back in the kitchen, and get you some more food.”

“Thank you.” Tina nodded, taking a seat. Your plate was picked up by the giant party host, and you were whisked away towards the kitchen.

Once in the kitchen, Janice quickly tossed the plate onto the counter, and sped out of the kitchen to get back to Tina. Unfortunately, that meant she was unable to see what happened next. She had aimed her toss poorly, and the plate flipped over when it hit the counter. Your gooey form slid off of the counter, and fell to the floor.

Or at least, you would have if a large pan of meatballs hadn’t been lying out on the floor. You crashed down into the pan, rolling to a stop between a large number of sticky meatballs. Your tiny form was totally recovered in meat sauce, and you were once again perfectly and unintendedly disguised.

You hoped to be rescued quickly, but those hopes proved not to come true. In fact, it was nearly four hours before someone reentered the kitchen. It was Janice, and she was carrying a large bowl of meatballs with her.

“Goodness.” She exclaimed, wiping sweat off of her forehead. “Everyone sure loved these meatballs. I guess I made a smart move in deciding to save them.” Without even a glance down at you, she emptied the bowl directly into the pan, and you were bombarded with a hailstorm of giant meatballs. You were easily hidden underneath several layers of the meaty food stuffs.

Janice then closed the lid on the pan, casting you into absolute darkness. She picked up the heavy pan, and slid it into the refrigerator, closing the fridge door behind her. She then flicked off the light in the kitchen, and walked back outside. She was exhausted from her party, and ready to hit the hay.

Meanwhile, you trapped in a whole new kind of hell. The pounds and pounds of meatballs all around you caused intense pressure, not to mention kept you from reforming to your normal shape. The meat sauce was beginning to smell terrible to you, and the cold temperatures of the fridge were unbearable. You closed your eyes and whimpered, hoping someone would come rescue you soon.
12333122.title: Left Behind

123331221.content:
You sat in the cold darkness of the fridge, shaking and shivering uncontrollably. You had no idea how long you had been in there. It could have been minutes, hours, days, or even weeks for all you knew. The smell of the meat sauce was the only thing that gave sensation to you at this point, and even that was beginning to fade.

You could no longer feel the pressure of the meatballs around you. You had been molded into the perfect meatball shape by this point, the layer of meat sauce on your body having dried. You looked like a perfect little meatball, with there being absolutely no way for anyone to tell what you really were. Even Mary wouldn’t guess that you were her squishy boyfriend, and she would probably eat you right up.

Just then, the fridge was suddenly opened, and light poured in. You winced in pain, as your eyes had become adjusted to the darkness by this point. Two hands reached out from the light, and grabbed the pan of meatballs. You felt your world shifting and shaking, until you found yourself back outside in the real world. Or more specifically, Janice’s kitchen.

The hands set you down on the table, and then you saw the smiling faces of both Janice and her daughter Isabelle appear from above you. The two girls both had ravenous looks on their faces, and they licked their lips as they eyed the pan of meatballs. You felt yourself shiver in fear, but there was nothing you could do to save yourself.

The two giantesses began scooping out meatballs and dropping them onto their plates. Finally, the inevitable came. Janice’s fingers wrapped around your body, and you were dropped onto her plate beside three other meatballs and two slices of bread. The rest of the meatballs were placed back in the fridge, and you desperately wished that you could have joined them.

Janice picked up her plate, and slid it into the microwave. The door closed, and then you felt yourself being slowly spun in circles. As you spun, the temperature began to rise drastically, and you soon found yourself burning up. You mentally screamed and screamed as the temperature rose, but no one was coming to your rescue.

After a hellish two minutes, the plate was retrieved from the microwave. Your body was burned and scorching, and you had even melted slightly. Unfortunately, your melting had only made you look even more like a tasty meatball. You heard Janice hum a happy tune as she spread apart the two slices of her bread. Her fingers grabbed onto you, and then you were dropped between the bread slices.

Pressure came in on you from both sides as Janice squeezed her bread slices together, trying to make her sandwich was flat as possible. Your body was crushed flatter, but so were the other meatballs. You hoped and prayed for some kind of miracle to come rescue you, but deep down you knew that nothing was going to happen. You were doomed.

Janice raised her sandwich to her mouth, and began digging in. In only a few bites, your time had come. Janice’s teeth closed behind you, and you were forced into her mouth. The air was thick and heavy, and the temperature was unbearable. Bits of food were flying everywhere, and you couldn’t see a thing. Suddenly, your body was painfully smashed, as Janice had bitten down on you.

She continued to chew on you for a few seconds, reducing you to nothing but a beaten pulp. When she had finished with you, she ran her tongue along you body, soaking up the last of your flavor. You were coated in her sticky and disgusting saliva. A moment later, a huge wave of milk pushed you backwards, and straight down her throat.

You tumbled through the air with the rest of her chewed up food, splashing down into her stomach. Your body sank underneath her stomach acids, and you instantly felt the melting down process begin. You closed your eyes, having lost the will to fight anymore. You were trapped inside of the stomach of a woman who had no idea of your existence. No one on the outside world knew what had happened to you. You were going to be digested, excreted into the toilet, and flushed down into the sewer. What ends up happening?

1233312211.content:
Janice stood up from the table, feeling satisfied and full after her delicious meal. She dropped her dishes into the sink, and then headed out into the living room. She plopped onto the couch, her stomach jostling slightly. She let out a quiet burp, and then blushed slightly. That sandwich she had just eaten had been the most delicious sandwich in the world, and she had no idea why. Putting the thought out of her head, she leaned back against the couch and drifted off to sleep.

Inside Janice’s stomach, you couldn’t do a thing but wallow in the lake of stomach acid. Your world was constantly being shifted and shaking around as Janice strolled about the house, oblivious to the horrific atrocity she had just committed. Your gummy form bobbed along the surface of the stomach acids, until finally they got to work.

Your body dissolved into nothing but liquidy slush as the acid ripped you apart. The rest of the sandwich was also dissolved swiftly and efficiently, and it wasn’t long before you were sent on your journey down the intestines. As the day progressed, you inched slowly closer and closer towards your untimely demise. Finally, your body came to rest near Janice’s asshole, digested form forming a casing of shit around your body.

Early the next morning, Janice headed into the bathroom before going to work. She slipped out of her yoga pants and pulled down her thong, plopping her large ass onto the toilet seat. With a groan, several disgusting pieces of poop dropped down into the toilet, one specific piece containing your body. Janice, feeling relieved that she had gotten it out of her system, wiped twice and then flushed everything down the toilet.

You were sent spiraling through the drainage pipes, water completely enveloping you. You and the rest of Janice’s waste splashed down into the sewer system, but the splash was so large that the small piece of poop you were trapped in was launched into the air, landing on the sidewalk used by sewer maintenance crew.

Realizing that you were not in the water anymore, you tried your hardest to shake and wiggle free of the gross shit encasing your body. It wasn’t easy, and it took you three full days just for your gummy body to pop free. It took four more days after that for your gummy lump of a body to reform, but even then your troubles weren’t over. Not all of your body mass had been contained in the same piece of poop that held your conscience, so you had reformed to a measly six inches in height!

You sank to your knees and openly cried for an hour. A simple party with Marry had turned into one of the worst night’s of your life, and now you were stuck at a mere fraction of your normal height. It would take several long weeks of reforming for you to return to normal, and that was assuming that nothing crushed or flattened you during that time. Worse still, how would you get anyone’s attention at six inches tall. How would you even get home?

Once your crying stopped, you began to wander aimlessly around the dark and putrid sewers. After a few hours, you came a ladder, which had rungs spaced apart at just the right length for you to climb up. It took you thirty minutes to scale the ladder, and a sewer grate blocked your path. Thankfully, you were able to squeeze through the bars, and you popped out back in the real, bright world.

Your eyes adjusted just in time to see a teen girl on a bike racing towards you. You jumped out of the way, landing in the grass at the exact moment the girl raced by. As you took a deep breath, you realized just how insignificant your truly were now. The girl had been looking straight at the road, and still hadn’t even noticed you.

Looking around, you realized that you were in a rather large park. You recognized that park as Mercy Park, a tourist attraction that was about an hour from your home. There was a giant playground area, a lake with a beach side that was usually always quite popular, vendors selling hot dogs, ice cream, and everything in between, locker rooms for beach goers, a nature trail, and a bike path.

Every single place you could possibly go was incredibly dangerous, but even more dangerous would be trying to walk all the way home at your height. You had to get help from someone, and fast. In your current spot, the beach and the playground were an equal distance apart. It looked as if they would be your best choices.

The beach had about five girls sun tanning, four girls playing volleyball, and three girls splashing in the ocean. There were a lot of people to help you, but also a lot of people to harm you. At the playground, two eight year old girls were playing tag, while their attractive mothers were gossiping at a nearby bench. The women seemed nice and friendly, but you would have to get past their energetic and playful daughters to get to them. What do you eventually decide to do?

12333122111.content:
You felt an overwhelming sense of fear watching the two young girls chase each other around the playground. Something about children terrified you, and you had a horrible feeling that trying to get help from the mothers on the other side of the playground would not go as planned. It was most likely that one of the girls would catch you and confuse you for a small doll. That was definitely not something you wanted to happen.

Still, it wasn’t like the beach was that much better of an option, but you didn’t really have any other good idea at the moment. So you trudged down the path towards the lake, praying that everything would turn out okay. You knew fate had it out for you, but you were determined to get the attention of one of the girls at the beach, and get home to your family safe and sound.

Touching on the sand, you shielded your eyes from the bright sun and looked around at the area. The beach was fairly long, though nothing compared to an actually beach by the ocean. The rather large lake was sparkly and beautiful, but you weren’t here to sightsee. You glanced back and forth between the twelve girls spread across the beach.

A group of five girls were huddled together in one corner of the beach. Two girls were lying out on towels, and appeared to be asleep. One girl was lying on her stomach, and the other girl was on her back. The third girl was sitting beside them, and rubbing sunscreen on herself under the shade of their umbrella. The fourth girl was spread out under the sun, but was reading a book, while the fifth girl was listening to music while checking her phone.

The four girls playing volleyball were laser focused on their game, and kept screaming and laughing with joy. It was a two on two game, and both sides appeared to be equally matched. The girls also appeared to be fairly athletic, and were able to jump and dive for the ball with ease.

Lastly, the three girls in the cool water of the lake were having a blast. Two girls were chatting while casually splashing each other with water, while the third girl was swimming laps around the lake. She was swimming with surprising speed.

Every single girl in the area was wearing some form of sexy or revealing bikini, and they were all quite attractive. Weighing your options, you really couldn’t tell which option would be the safest. They all looked equal parts logical and terrifying. You knew you had to make a decision soon though, as you could already feel your gummy skin begin to melt.

What do you eventually decide to do?

The salty water had done a bad job on your throat, making it hard to speak. It hit you hard in the back and sent your little body flying through the air. "It's a sticker?" a voice from above calls as you are pulled free from Hannah's cheek. Unable to so much as twitch, you are lifted up to her face and find yourself staring eye to eye with her.

123333.content:
"Actually, I should probably be getting home." You answer. Mary's face drops, but not too much.

"If you're sure, then go ahead." Mary's mother, Tina, nods." You turn to Stacy.

"Hey Stacy, can you give me a ride home?" Her face instantly brightens, and her eyes lit up for a brief moment.

"Why of course Jackie!" She exclaims. Without another word, she grabs you by the hand and leads you out the door. Once outside, she lifts you up into her arms, and carries you like a child all the way to her car. You, of course, kick and protest the entire time, but her grip is too tight for you to break out of. She just laughs the entire time, petting you on the head with her free hand.

At her car, she drops you into the passenger's seat, and then climbs into the driver's seat. However, she doesn't start the car. She just stares at you as you get comfortable in the seat. Finally, to break the silence, you speak.

"What is it Stacy?" You wonder. "Something on your mind?"

"Oh you would be perfect." She says softly.

The hours passed by in the fridge, and there wasn’t a thing you could do to change the horrible situation that Gary had put you in. You had no way to reform, move, talk, or do anything. Your body had been churned, melted, and spread throughout the entire cake. A small corner piece housed your conscience, but the rest of your body was as much a part of the cake as sugar or cheese.

You mentally cried at this twist of fate, but most of your emotion was turned more towards anger. You hated Gary so much. Why did he feel the need to make your life miserable? Why did he feel the need to do these terrible things to you? If you somehow got out of this, you swore to yourself that you would make Gary pay for the all of the torturous things he had done to you.

Finally, the fridge was opened, and the pan was lifted out. Everything was pitch black, as your eyes had been swirled and distorted from the blender, but you were still able to hear. You could hear the sound of Mary, Tina, and Gary, and then the familiar sound of a car engine. No doubt they were heading off to the party, and bringing their delicious cake with them.

After arriving at the house, Mary carried the pan inside, oblivious to the fact that her boyfriend was trapped just inches from her face. Tina chatted with Janice, Gary played games on his phone, and Mary conversed with Janice’s daughter, Isabella. (Almost) Everyone was having a fun time.

An hour after that, the party was in full swing. Many different, delicious meals were available, and all of the guests were eating and laughing. Loud music played throughout the house. Inside the dark, cold freezer, you were unable to experience any of this. You had spent every single second trying to reform, despite knowing that it was hopeless.

Janice eventually announced to everyone that, thanks to Tina, there was a delicious cake ready to be served. She returned to the kitchen, brought out the cake, and plopped it down onto the table. Immediately, every party guest rushed over to the table, and began cutting chunks out of the cake and placing them onto their plates.

You mentally screamed and cried in pain as sections of your body were sliced apart, chomped to bits, and sent tumbling down into the stomachs of everyone at the party. Janice, Isabella, Mary, Tina, and the myriad group of other party goers all had a slice, and marveled at the delicious flavoring. Mary licked her lips happily, and Janice gushed to Tina about how it was the most delicious cake that she had ever eaten.

Meanwhile, the corner piece containing your conscience had remained untouched. You were still suffering though, as you could feel bits of your body dissolving in the stomach acid of women’s stomachs, or caught in their teeth. A chunk of you had fallen onto the floor, and was currently being stomped on by several unaware guests. A few bits of your body had dripped out of Tina’s mouth and were jammed into her cleavage. You were feeling all of these experiences at once, and it was true hell.

The party began to wind down, and Janice found herself wandering over to the food table. She glanced in and saw that there was only one slice of cake left. Patting her full stomach, she wondered if she could even pack away one more piece. She lifted the piece out of the pan, and held it in front of her face. You were panicking, and sending all of the possible telepathic waves you could towards Janice, telling her not to eat you. Of course, this was dumb, and you knew it was dumb, but it was all you could do. This blissfully unaware woman held your conscience, your very existence in her hands, along with your fate.

The sewer waters propelled you along a set path, and soon you found yourself in the sanitation plant. In the corner, globs of compost were shoved into big bags and sent off to a farmer’s market. You were picked up as well, and dropped to the bottom of a bag, buried under the gross waste.

Your bag was left on the shelf in the farmer’s market for an entire month before someone finally picked it up and purchased it. Thankfully, you landed at the very end, resting gently on the dirt. The farmer walked out of sight, leaving you alone in the middle of the field. You got to work reforming almost instantly, desperate to get home back to your loving mother as fast as possible.

By the time you had finished reforming, your worst fears had been realized. You were now standing at only a foot tall, because not all of your gummy body had made it through Mary. No doubt some of your gummy self was now padding at Mary’s sizable ass, or had been filling nutrients for her growing body. You couldn’t blame Mary for what she had done, as it was truly Gary’s fault, but now your situation was much worse.

You started sprinting towards the farmhouse, as made there would be someone there who could help you. The ground was soft an uneven, and you tripped over and over. Your entire body was quickly a gross mess of dirt and compost, making you almost completely brown. You didn’t care though, as making it to the farmhouse was your only goal.

That goal shattered into a million pieces when the farmhouse door swung open, and two people walked outside. You recognized them instantly as your cousin Kat, and her mom, your aunt. Her aunt had always been nice to you, but the sight of Kat made your blood run cold. She used to do mean things to you in order to toughen you up, but as she grew older, she started to get sick pleasure at watching other people unknowingly torment you.

Thankfully, neither of them had noticed you yet, but Kat’s mom seemed to be walking right towards you. Kat started picking up rocks from the field and tossing them into the nearby woods, as Kat’s mom fired up the machine. The engine roared like a jet plane, and smoke started to gently flow out from it. You finally picked yourself up off of the dirt, but everything had already become much worse. Kat spotted you instantly, and despite you being a fraction of your normal height, and covered in dirt, she recognize you right away.

A devious smile spread on Kat’s face, and a chill ran down your spine. You looked for an escape, but the massive machine was heading in your direction. The machine was designed to suck up compost, chew it into little, miniscule bits, and shoot them out far and wide behind it. That machine would grind you to dust, but would it be better than what Kat would do to you?

Kat was now sprinting to catch you, desperate to grab you before her mom ran you over. Of course, Kat’s mom was totally oblivious to everything that was going on. If you stood still, Kat would save you from the grinder, but you would be hers to use however she saw fit. Her sick and sinister forms of torture were sure to follow. On the other hand, if you ran towards the grinder, Kat wouldn’t make it to you in time. You had now idea what would happen to you if you went into the grinder. 131112.content:
You hung on the wall, trying your hardest to wiggle free from your current confines. Unfortunately, the hook was digging too deeply into your tutu, so there was no way for you to rip free. Your mouth had also not reformed yet, so you weren’t able to yell for help, although you didn’t know if that would have been a good idea. All you could do was hope and pray that Mary would arrive soon to rescue you.

Unfortunately, it was not Mary who turned the corner a few minutes later. It was Elise, a girl you had known for a few years. Elise was a bitch, and there was really no other way to put it. For some strange reason, she was jealous of all the attention you got with your squishy condition. She had made it her personal vendetta to make sure you got all the attention you could…just not in the normal ways.

Elise stopped right in front of you, and stared at you in confusion for a few seconds. While she was staring, you took a moment to look her over. Elise was a rather self-conscious girl, and she felt insecure about her body image. You didn’t know why. Her breasts weren’t too big, and her curves were subdued compared to most girls you knew, but she was certainly still cute. Her swirly blonde hair framed an innocent face, with sparkling blue eyes. You knew better than to trust her though.

Elise’s look of confusion slowly turned to utter glee, and she burst out laughing. You silently cursed yourself. It would have been much better if she hadn’t recognized you, but she clearly had. Elise tried to compose herself several times, but seeing you strung up on the wall and dressed like a ballerina was too much for the girl to handle. Finally, she calmed down.

“Oh god Jack. Thanks for the laugh!” Elise wiped a tear from her eye. “Who did this to you, because I would love to go thank them!” Elise reached up, and grabbed your chest. She pulled you off of the wall, and you couldn’t believe what was happening. Elise was never nice to you.

Of course, this time was no different. Elise tossed you onto the floor, and then promptly sat down on your chest, her butt easily crushing you flat. As you helplessly struggled underneath her, Elise rubbed her butt all over your body, flattening every inch of you. When she had finished, you had been crushed flat, and now looked like a big ballerina/fairy sticker.

Elise peeled you off of the ground, and then carried you down the hall, entering into one of the school’s art rooms. The room was empty, and Elise giggled with glee. She placed you down on a table, and you felt something smooth underneath you. Elise had set you down on something, and you couldn’t tell what it was.

“So Jack...I was assigned to do this project a few days ago.” Elise began talking, all while rummaging through art supplies. “Miss Mason asked me to make a poster for that ballet show coming up. You know the one? “Swan Lake” or something? Anyway, I had no idea what to do for the poster.” Elise dropped a few cans of paint beside you, causing you to shiver with fear.

“I’m a pretty creative person, as I’m sure you’re well aware.” Elise paused her work, and gave you a quick wink. You knew about Elise’s creativity first hand. She had displayed you as a tattoo on her stomach, worn you as a headband, stitched you into her panties, and had even molded you into a designer jacket. Elise’s seemingly endless and sadistic creativity was the bane of your existence.

“But now…I think I have the perfect idea.” Elise stroked your face, her warm fingers brushing against your skin. “Think of it Jack. Who wouldn’t want to go to a ballet show, if the poster has such a cute ballerina on it!” Elise dropped glue beside the paint cans, and then set her purse down as well. “And you’re going to be that ballerina!”

Your heart skipped a beat, and you began to squirm and shake for all it was worth. Elise laughed at your pitiful attempts to escape. She lifted you off of her poster board, and lathered a large section of it with glue. She then dropped you back onto the board, and pressed her hands down on you.

Your gummy body instantly began to stick and adhere to the glue. Elise’s weight pressing down on you did the job quickly, and the glue only took a few more seconds to dry and harden. In less than a minute, you had been completely fused to the poster board, looking to all the world like a little ballerina decal.

Elise didn’t waste any time though. She pulled out some eyeliner and mascara from her purse, as well as some lipstick. With a devilish grin, she began applying the makeup to you, much to your horror. She painted your lips thoroughly with bright red lipstick, and then covered your eyes with eyeliner and mascara. She even added some blush to your cheeks. The class from before had put makeup on you, but Elise's added touches pushed it over the top. With her work down, you looked nothing like yourself anymore. In fact, you looked exactly like a cute little girl.

With your aspect taken care of, Elise began to decorate the rest of the poster. She painted and drew pictures of ballerinas all around the poster. She then added the important information in bright marker colors. Her poster was a work of art, and was sure to catch the eye of anyone nearby.

There was only one step left. Elise lifted the poster board off of the table, and began to carry it over to the laminator. Your eyes mentally widened in fear as you saw the laminator. If the poster was laminated, your body would be compressed to the poster board for months, if not years. You wanted to stop this psychopathic girl from ruining your life, but it was all up to fate now.

131211.content:
“Alright Jack, we’re home.” Mary said in her soothing, perfect voice. Your body had cooled into a gummy lump by this point, so she peeled you out of the jar and set you down on the floor in front of her. One of your eyes was able to see, and you saw the clear visage of Mary’s bedroom. The color pink was everywhere, and a few dresses and pairs of leggings were still lying about.

Mary waited patiently for you to reform, which ended up only taking about thirty minutes. Once you had returned to normal, Mary opened a special drawer in her cabinet, which had a simple pair of shorts and a plain white t-shirt. The clothes were a little big for you, but you were happy to not be naked.

You passed time with Mary for the rest of the day. You talked about life and the future, worked on a bit of homework, watched a movie, and just generally had an amazing time. Nothing bad occurred, as if fate had just taken a step back from your life for the time being. You called your mom and told her you would be spending the night at Mary’s house.

Mary insisted and insisted, so you sleep in her bed with her that night. As such, Mary kept her clothes on, or at least a bra and panties. This act saved you in the end, as your curvy girlfriend crushed you in her sleep, leaving you as nothing but a tan splotch on her panties. Thankfully, your tan body contrasted sharply with her pink panties, and she noticed you immediately upon waking up. It would have been a very different story if you had been stuck to her naked ass, as you would’ve blended in almost perfectly.

Mary let you reform while she ate breakfast, and then the two of you headed off to school. Unfortunately, the only clothes that you could wear to school was a matching set of tan pants and a tan shirt. Mary promised you that your unfortunate clothing options wouldn’t be a problem, and that she wouldn’t let anything happen to you.

On the way to school, you remembered that your Science class was taking a full day trip to the “Hudson Chocolate Factory”. You were a little worried about how the trip was going to go, but at least Mary would be there to keep you safe and secure. Of course, a few other not-so-nice people were also going on the trip.

Everyone loaded onto the school bus, and the bus headed off to the factory. You sat beside Mary, and tried to teach her how to play “Super Smash Bros” on your 3DS. Right as she was getting a hang of the game, the bus pulled to a stop, and everyone got off. All the students had to leave their belongings on the bus, and couldn’t bring anything into the factory.

“Hello there students!” An extremely friendly voice called. A beautiful girl with blonde hair tied back in a ponytail stepped out of the factory’s main entrance, and waved cheerily. She was wearing a tight tan blouse and a rather sexy tan miniskirt that fluttered around her thighs as she walked. She was noticeably curvy, and you couldn’t help but stare for a few seconds at her gorgeous appearance.

“My name is Sherri, and I’ll be your tour guide today.” The girl flashed a brilliant smile, winning the hearts of every guy in the class, and several girls. She looked to be about 26 years old.

“Follow Sherri class.” Your teacher instructed. “And remember, you will have a test on what you learn here tomorrow.” With that, your teacher walked back onto the bus, and the bus drove away.

“Okay kids, let’s get right to it and head inside!” Sherri gestured to the factory, and then led the way. Several boys rushed to the head of the pack, just to get to see Sherri’s perfectly round ass sway side-to-side as she walked. Thankfully for them, Sherri seemed to be rather a tad oblivious, if not downright ditzy.

Inside the factory, Sherri led the group up a flight of stairs and onto a balcony that overlooked the entire facility. Complex machinery spread across the entire factory, with gears, conveyor belts, presses, and mixers seeming to stretch on for miles. Right below the balcony was a large vat of liquid chocolate being mixed and churned. Everyone smiled at the pleasant scent that filled the factory.

“This is, as you can probably tell, our main factory.” Sherri explained. “Most of our tour will not be in this room however. We like to keep the Hudson chocolate making technique a secret. In fact, we don’t even have any security cameras in this room.”

A few students peered down into the huge vat of chocolate below the balcony, drool practically spilling from their mouths.

“Yes, that chocolate does look appetizing. However, you wouldn’t want to fall into that vat.” Sherri giggled. “That chocolate is undergoing intensive mixing, and will then be crushed, pressed, heated, and finally cooled into a perfect chocolate mold. The mold will then be wrapped and shipped to anywhere in the world, placed on a store shelf, and purchased by a loyal customer. I’d hate for any of you to be turned into chocolate, so please take a step back from the guardrail.”

The students quickly backed away, frightened by Sherri’s incredibly detailed and slightly gruesome description. A bunch of students began to ask Sherri questions, so she turned to answer them one by one.

“Jack.” A soft voice said at your shoulder, and you glanced up to see Mary. “I’m really sorry about this, but I have to use the bathroom. I’ll be back in a minute, so please, be safe!” Mary kissed you on the forehead, and then dashed down the stairs towards the bathroom.

Only a few seconds passed before a cold hand clamped down on your shoulder, sending a chill through your body. You struggled, but a second hand clamped onto your other shoulder. Right as you opened your mouth to speak, a third hand pinched your gummy lips shut, sealing them tightly. The person holding your shoulders then spun you around, and you stood face-to-face with Mary’s cruel brother, Gary.

“Heya squishy. It’s been a while.” Gary teased.

“Thank you for the assistance Gary. You can go now.” A terrifying voice said. Gary nodded and stepped away, only to be replaced quickly by your worst nightmare: Elise Courthouse.

“Sure thing Elise. Just do something really funny to him.”

“Oh, I will.” Elise almost purred. She stroked your face and grinned. You glanced nervously over at Sherri, who was surrounded by fifteen students. Neither she nor the other students had any idea what was happening to you. No one could save you now.

“Mph…mmm…” You tried to scream, but couldn’t.

“Mary should know better than to leave you alone.” Elise laughed. “What torment should I inflict upon you today? Personally, I think Hudson Chocolate Factory could use a new ingredient in their chocolate. You’d fit that bill perfectly, and no one would even now, right? There aren’t any cameras in this factory! At the same time though, that Sherri girl is pretty sexy, I must admit. Her tan outfit is such a nice choice. Oh wait! You had a tan outfit on today too! That could be fun!”

Elise giggled, and ran the options through her head. Both choices were so tempting, and she had all the time in the world to decide. She currently had one of her friends hogging the only stall in the girl’s bathroom, so she knew Mary wouldn’t be coming back any time soon. Eventually though, Elise reached a decision. What does she decide to do to you?
