Youve managed to reform inside her bag, waiting for her to open it.
1323112121.content:
Janet felt something weird go up her arse so she quickly reached her hand down and grabbed it, feeling whatever it was squish between her fingers. "Eww is it gum or something" she said to herself as she pulled you out. Her look of confusion didn't fade as she looked over your balled up form with her finger indents slowly fading. She rolled you in her hand and poked you gently with her other hand "what on earth is this. its like gel." suddenly she pinched at you and spread her arms wide, watching you stretch out like a ribbon, unknowingly torturing you. "wow its very stretchy. this is incredible, its like that material the gummy dolls are made of or something...i wonder..." she trailed off and realised she was getting distracted from gym class. She quickly crushed you back up into a ball like glob in her hand and rummaged in her bag. She was a curious type, a nerd as alot of people called her so she always had a few little containers incase she found something worth investigating more, something like you.

Helpless and unable to move you can't alert her to her mistake as she brings out a little clear pot barely bigger than your current shape and watch as she stuffs you in, squishing you against the bottom. The world goes mute as she puts the lid on sealing you in airtight, thankfully like this you didn't need to breath or you would be panicing alot more. She tucked the little container and you into her bag and finished getting dressed. With no space to reform inside this container you know your not going anywhere for a while and wait in silence. The total absence of sound was disorientating as even the usual unnoticed background noise couldn't be heard in this airtight container in the gym bag. Eventually however you found yourself drifting off to sleep, which is why you missed Janet coming back and stuffing her gym stuff back in her bag.

You slept all through the next couple of classes all the way until lunchtime, the sudden rush of sound as she opened the seal of the container woke you up with a start. You were confused where you were before it all came rushing back to you as Janets fingers grabbed you and pulled you out like silly putty. She was in the schools science labs and you found yourself dropped into a glass beaker. Janet had a pair of safety goggles on and a notebook next to her, terrifiying you saw the list of tests she had planned for you. Never before had you wanted to reform so fast, which is saying something concidering some of the situations you have been in.

Janet, unaware your a living thing, a fellow student, turns on the bunsen burner thats under your beaker and begins to write notes as you feel the heat in your beaker rise painfully fast. Your gummy form has no resistance to such heat and it doesnt take you long to melt into a puddle of tan liquid bubbling as you boiled. It hurt so much but you couldn't scream. Janet just scribbled something in her notes as she watched you bubble before turning off the flame and, using utensils she poured you out into a petri dish, carrying your hot, now almost pinkish liquid to the microscopes and placed you under a lense. She watched as your body began to try reforming from that melting, curiously watching on a microscopic level as your body healed. This thing was fasinating, even Gummy dolls didn't fix when melted.

When you had cooled into a gel like substance in the disk she noticed that your body was still changing. Deciding it was time for more tests she carried you over to a clip on the wall and wearing latex gloves, peeled you out of the petri dish. You looked like a gel coaster thanks to your body cooling to the shape of the dish. She clips one side of you to the clip and then holding you, begins walking backwards, slowly stretching you out across the entire room. "amazing, it doesn't seem to have a limit to be stretched to, at least not a small limit if it does" she said letting you drop and wrote more notes, also noting how long it took your form to shrink back down together. within 5 minutes your entire body was back over at the clipped side, once again a disk shape.

Janet was loving this, you, not so much. She unclipped you and placed you in another dish. You heard her say "Alright now lets see the reactions to chemicals!" before she used an eye dropper to put the first chemical on you, it tingled and quickly began burning. it actually made your body froth and sizzle as she watched under the microscope. It was agony but you couldn't make a sound. You felt your body slowly melt with the chemical, mixing together before she saw your body once again fix itself. Various chemicals had various effects on you. The worst was acid, if you thought the first one had been painful, this put it in perspective. Howver your resilient little body slowly seemed to absorb it and cool back into shape.

Finally the lunch break was over, she peeled your gummy shape out of the petri dish and washed you off under the tap incase of residue. "This substance is amazing, i wonder how i can replicate it. I bet lots of companies would love to have some!" You didn't like the sound of that but right now you could do nothing. She stuffed you back in the container but in her haste didn't seal the lid. As she moved to class, the movement knocked the lid off, giving you an opening to begin reforming. By the end of the school day...
1323112121.title: Janet pulls you out, but has no idea what you are.

choices: You are used and abused by Synchro Technologies for a very long time.
Your glass is knocked over one day, allowing you to reform and try to escape.
13231121211.content:
Janet rushed off of the school bus as soon as it pulled up to her stop. She dashed all the way home, throwing open the front door and sprinting into the kitchen. Her mother, who had just gotten home from work, was reading the newspaper. She nearly dropped her paper in surprise as Janet ran in.

“My goodness!” Janet’s mother exclaimed. “What is it Janet?”

“Hold on! You have to see this!” Janet fished around in her backpack until she found your container. The chemicals and tests that Janet had forced you to endure had broken you, disabling your reformation process for the time being. At this rate, you weren’t going to be anything but a lab experiment for the rest of your life.

Janet dropped you down onto the counter in front of her mother, who didn’t waste any time in picking you up. She squeezed you between her powerful hands, molding you around her fingers. She smelled you, taking in your strawberry cheesecake scent. She pulled you out to the length of a meter stick, and then folded you back up once more.

“This is very similar to gummy substance.” Janet’s mother mused. “It’s different though. It feels more natural, it gives off a bit of heat, and it has a distinctly pleasant smell.” Janet’s mother dropped you into her purse. “I assume you don’t mind if I take this into work tomorrow?”

“It’s no problem.” Janet smiled, and then slipped out of the kitchen and up to her bedroom. Janet’s mother zipped up her purse and went back to the newspaper, and you had no choice but to drift asleep. You knew that in the morning, your life was about to get much, much worse.

Morning came, and Janet’s mother drove off to where she worked, which was a giant laboratory in the middle of nowhere, called Synchro Technologies. She was the head of the entire company, and was one of the smartest and most commanding women in the realm of science and development. Several workers even jumped out of the way as she walked through the halls toward her office.

When she reached her office, she buzzed the intercom for several of her top scientists to come into the room. When they arrived, she tossed you to the scientists, and the group of three girls ran you through nearly hundreds of tests to determine what you were and what you were made of. They poked you, prodded you, dunked you into vats, melted you down, froze you, stabbed you, stretched you, and everything in between.

“Valencia.” One of the girls finally spoke up, addressing Janet’s mother. “We’ve determined what this strange substance…is.” The girl hesitated, and Janet’s mother, whose name was Valencia, tilted her head to the side.

“Why did you pause?” Valencia inquired.

“Well…we think that this substance might be…alive.”

“Alive?”

“Actually, this might sound strange, but hear me out. From what we can tell, this squishy little orb is not only alive, but is a human being. It appears that a seemingly normal human being was actually born with a gummy body. Imagine a person made out of gummy material, and you would get this. Suffice it to say, I’m currently holding a real, teenage boy in my hands.”

“This…is unbelievable.” Valencia stared at you in awe.

“With your permission…I’d like to let him reform and contact his fam…”

“Are you insane?” Valencia stood up, knocking her chair over. “We’ve kidnapped a human being, and tortured him! It’s too late to go back now.”

“Then…what do we do?”

“We keep him here. Keep him locked up, and tell everyone in the building to apprehend him on sight if he gets loose. Also, since he’s here, we’re going to continue to treat him like nothing more than a newly discovered substance.”

“Ma’am!”

“Hush. I’m not finished speaking. No one knows that we have him here, and if we’re careful, no one ever will. He’s powerless to stop us, and I’m not even sure if a gummy little freak counts as a human being.” Valencia smiled, a glint in her eye. “Think of all of the uses for something as amazing as this!”

“I…I…if you say so Val.”

“I do say so.” Valencia grabbed you from the girl and dropped you into a glass jar, sealing the lid tight. She then placed you on the corner of her desk, in plain view of everyone in the room. That way, she would always have you in her sights. Her office didn’t have windows, so the only escape would be through the door, and out through the entire facility. You didn’t know if you would be able to manage that.

The scientists left the room, with the girl who had held you earlier giving you a sympathetic look before closing the door behind her. Valencia got to work, jotting down idea after idea for what she could use you for, occasionally giving you a devilish grin. You were trapped, and completely at the mercy of this soulless company. You mentally cried, knowing that no one was going to come to save you.
13231121211.title: Synchro Technologies

choices: Many years later you finally manage to reform your body, though tiny.
No one ever finds you, you remain a pet forever.
132311212111.content:
This was your life for many years, trapped as nothing more than a sample for Synchro Technologies. For the longest time you were kept in the tight little box, unable to move, but eventually they discovered that the many, many tests they had run had broken your body, it had grown so used to this shape that it was now your default form. After that you were upgraded to a Terranium in Valencia's office, treated like an office pet as you wriggled about in the tank, unable to escape or communicate in any way.

This was a horrible life for you, even if you ever escaped, this was your shape now. No one outside the company knew what you really were. As time passed, the number of people got smaller as they moved on to different companies or your true nature just got forgotten. Even Valencia just called you her "Cute little gummy bear" which was a horrible pet name. Eventually you saw Janet, now a grown woman come to work for her mothers company, though she had no idea what you were. She just thought her mother had somehow created this little creature amongst all the new gummy like technologies she had invented thanks to their study of you.

Not a day went by when you didn't try to force your body to reform, but the closest you got was fingers before they reformed back into your little flat form. You were desperate for anyone to recognise you, you didn't want to spend your life in a pet tank in a sadistic inventors office. Sadly though, it looked like you would be just a gummy pet forever, especially as the years continued to pass...
132311212111.title: You are used and abused by Synchro Technologies...

choices: staying in the locker
taken to class and noticed by someone
taken to class, not noticed by anyone
133.content:
You looked around for Mary, wanting to be by her side before you ended up wadded up by some bully. glancing towards her locker you couldn't see her, but nearby were her two friends Stacy and Emma. Stacy was a red head who giggled a lot and often playfully squished you when Mary wasn't looking, usually by "accident" but she wasn't mean like Gary, she would stop if she saw you getting upset or scared. Emma was a blond and a bit more sensible, but tended not to notice as much. Gary had once managed to crush you up and slip you under her seat. one flip of her skirt later, you were molded to her butt without her knowing. you spent the rest of the day there, it wasn't until she noticed you fall off when doing her laundry you were discovered.

you walked up to the with a smile, glad to see friendly faces, though they were deep in conversation, giggling and gossiping, neither had noticed you yet. you reached out to tap Emma on the back when she suddenly took a step back, bumping you and making you trip over your own legs into her open locker.

in your panic to steady yourself you managed to knock the shelf above you and every single book and the shelf slammed down on you, crushing you flat. the girls yelped in shock "how on earth did that happen?" you heard Emma cry out in shock, Stacy didn't seem to have an anwer. they both crouched down to pick up the books, you were lifted with one of the text books, stuck to the front looking dazed. thankfully face up. you stared at them before another book was put down ontop of you before you could cry out.

you didn't like the idea of being stuck between books all day but could do little to stop it, you finally heard Mary's voice as she greeted her friends "come on girls, time for class lets go! have you seen James?" her friends shook their heads unaware how close you were.

were you on a text book Emma needed for class or were you staying in the locker?
133.title: You find Mary's friends.

choices: She hates it, and throws it in the trash (potentially allowing you to reform).
She loves it, and wants to staple it to the wall (oh no)!
She hates it, and crumples it up and throws it out the window (oh no)!
1331.content:
You let out a sigh of relief as you realized that Emma didn’t need the book that you were stuck to for her next class. Unfortunately, she didn’t need the stack of papers and books that were on top of you either, so as she closed her locker you realized that you were going to be trapped for quite a while.

The weight of the papers and books above you was intense, and there was really nothing you could do about it. You were crushed as flat as a piece of paper, and you weren’t able to reform at all. You could merely content yourself to waiting in Emma’s locker for her to return from whatever class she had gone to.

After about five minutes, you realized something that actually scared you. There was a large stack of papers and books currently sitting on top of you, but one paper in particular was directly on you. For some reason, you began to feel your papery body sticking to the paper pressing down on you. That would be bad if Emma returned to her locker, and couldn’t find you because you were stuck to the paper.

***

About forty minutes later, you heard the sound of Emma’s locker being opened. Her class had ended, and she was headed off to English next. However, she had accidentally left her English project in her locker, so she needed to get it. She lifted several textbooks from her locker, until finally she saw her project sitting there. It was a paper that had a bunch of colorful picture of literary elements on it. Emma had drawn her project on tan paper.

***

To your surprise, you felt weight lifting off of you. You realized that Emma must need something that was underneath her mound of text books. Soon, all of the weight was gone from you, except for that one piece of paper on top of you. Suddenly, the paper above you was picked up, and you went with it! Your fears had been confirmed! You had stuck to the paper above you, and you probably blended right in!

***

You couldn’t have been more right about blending in. Emma realized her paper was heavier than she remembered, so she turned it over to make sure nothing was stuck to the back. All she saw was a totally tan back side. Your face had been so mashed and squashed, that you were unrecognizable! She shrugged her shoulders, and then ran off to her English class, tightly clutching her project.

***

You felt her hands grip you tightly, squeezing you forcefully, and then you were being whisked down the hall at blinding speeds. You figured that Emma had recognized you, which spelled disaster for you. You had to get out of this mess quickly, but at the current moment there was nothing you could do.

Emma walked into her English class, and dropped her project on the teacher’s desk. You landed with a slight thud as you hit the desk, the side of the paper you were crushed to face down. Your world was darkness, and you couldn’t see anything that was going on.

Emma’s teacher, Miss Scarlet, looked over from her computer, and at Emma’s project. She was known for being harshly critical of project’s she didn’t like. What does she think of Emma’s project?
1331.title: Emma's English Project

choices: you spend the entire semester on the wall (or longer)
someone spills a drink over the project, ruining it after a few days
13312.content:
Miss Scarlet lifted up the paper you were on, glancing over it as her fingers brushed the back of the you, not noticing you were not paper. Stacy stood there nervously awaiting the judgement on her project. Miss Scarlet looked up at Stacy and said "young lady.....this is the best project i have seen all year! well done!" she said smiling, making Stacy let out a sigh of total relief. "really miss? you think so?" she said, disbelieving. Miss Scarlet smiled "of course and to prove it i think it should go up on the wall for all to see for the rest of the semester. "wait what?" you thought, you were stuck to this paper, she couldnt put you up on the wall all semester! unfortunatly, you couldn't really stop her right now.

you felt the staples punch through the paper and you firmly pinching you to the wall, feeling the paper press on you from the front and the wall behind. a total of eight staples pinned you firmly in place hidden behind Stacys amazing project as she actually got a little bit of applause from her class mates as she went to her seat. you however would have prefered her to get a failing grade, at least you wouldnt be stuck on a wall. how were you going to get out of this one?

the rest of the lesson you tried to move, to no avail, the paper pressed down on you too tightly to allow any reformation to take place. you stayed put as the bell rang, you stayed put as lunch was served, you stayed put during the afternoon classes and you were still motionless when everyone had gone home and the lights went out for the night. this was not a good position for you, the day had felt like an eternity, no one knew where you were, even if they looked, clearly right now you looked like a piece of paper, even if the wall behind you was glass, it would do you no good. were you really going to spend a semester like this? what if after all that time you cant unstick from the paper and Stacy never recognises you? what if Mary finds another boyfriend in that time? what if no one takes the project down off the wall, you could be here for years! but the biggest concern was, what if Mary really does find another boyfriend while your on the wall? you didn't think you could accept that, what were you going to do?
13312.title: She loves it, and wants to staple it to the wal...

choices: "...the landfill."
"...the recycling plant."
133122.content:
After the first week had passed, you were beginning to think that this was destined to be the rest of your life from this point on. Hidden from sight, stapled to the wall of the classroom, and admired by oblivious students and teachers alike. Your friends and family would eventually forget about you and move on, and your entire life would be ruined.

Thankfully, a freak accident ended up saving you from this fate the next Monday. A ditzy girl who was too busy staring at her phone tripped on another student’s backpack. As she fell, her Starbucks coffee splashed out of her hand, and smacked against the wall. The coffee poured out of the cup, thoroughly soaking both you and the project you were stuck to.

The girl hastily cleaned up her mess, but the destruction she had caused did not go unnoticed by Miss Scarlet. Miss Scarlet saw the ruined project, and took it off the wall with a sigh. She carefully removed the staples, and then crumpled up the paper and tossed it into the trash can.

You were ecstatic to be freed from the horrible mess you had been in for the past week, but your current situation was not much better. As you rested in the trash can, lying atop a pile of discarded papers and candy wrappers, you didn’t waste a second willing your body to reform. You put all of your focus into breaking free from the paper and reforming, but it was all for naught.

Not yet down adding cruel twists to your life, the same ditzy girl from earlier walked over to the trash can. Her lunchbox had been soaked by the coffee too, ruining everything inside. As such, the girl dumped the entire contents of her lunch into the trash, crushing you with mounds of gross, sticky food. Lastly, she dropped the now-empty coffee cup in and walked back to her seat.

Your body was squashed and hidden from sight, buried under a soggy sandwich, a pile of wet potato chips, and a few carrots. Your chances of reforming now were gone, as the pressure on top of you was too great. No one could possibly see you now either, so there was not a thing you could do to save yourself or be saved anymore.

You spent the entire rest of the day trapped in the trash can, until the afternoon custodian came by. The custodian dumped the contents of the can, including you, into a large bag, then sealed the bag shut. She dragged the bag outside of the school, setting it beside several others. Sure enough, you heard the loud noise of the dump truck just a few minutes later.

Mentally crying out for help, the bag you were trapped in was lifted up and dumped into the back of the truck, followed by the rest of the bags of trash. The truck then headed off down the road towards the garbage disposal facility, the drivers of the truck blissfully unaware that they were carrying a helpless, living boy along with them.

Once at the facility, the truck poured every bag into a huge pile, where a few workers began to sort through each bag one by one. You strained your ears to see if you could hear anything, but most noises were muffled by the loud machines in the background.

Eventually, someone opened up your bag, and two gloved hands began rifling through the contents. The hands grabbed the gross food left behind by the ditzy girl, and then retreated.

“Hey! I just found some food, but other than that, this bag is pretty much all paper.” The person with the gloved hands said.

“Alright.” A second voice replied. “I guess we can send that bag straight to…”

How do they finish their sentence?
133122.title: From One Mess to Another

choices: Emma takes you home with her.
You manage to squeeze out before class is over.
She lets another student borrow the book you're on.
1333.content:
You struggled as hard as you could, trying desperately to get Emma to notice you, but to no avail. With all three of the girls oblivious to your predicament, all you could do was groan as the book you're stuck on was carried away. At least with Emma, you wouldn't be bothered when she noticed you... if ever. While she was rather book smart, she certainly wasn't the most attentive girl. As the girls went through their classes, you continued to be sandwiched between the heavy (to you anyway) text books and compressed even flatter as the day went on. Soon lunch period came and went, Mary still looked for you. You could hear her confront her brother, having assumed he had done something to you.

"No, sorry, sis. I haven't seen putty boy all day. Oh! Let me know when you do find him! I've got study hall later today and I could use a seat cushion", he laughed.

You could hear a noise that you assumed was Mary punching her brother. "If we get home and I find out you've done something to him you're gonna be sorry, Gary!"


If only she knew you were so close. There was at least a silver lining in all this, though: As long as you were stuck as Emma's book cover, Gary couldn't pick on you. Still, you certainly didn't want to stay like this. As lunch period came and went and Emma and Stacy went to gym class, it became clear that she wasn't going to be using your book.

"Emma, why'd you even take out your chemistry book if you don't even have that class today?", Stacy giggled as the girls got dressed, Emma unknowingly setting you along with the rest of her things in her gym locker.

"I thought for sure that it was today. Oh well, I guess I can get some studying done when I get home. Say, you didn't happen to find Mary's boyfriend, did you? She's pretty upset."

The redheaded girl shrugged as she squeezed into a pair of tight shorts. "Nope. Maybe they switched his classes around? Or he got sick or something? I hope the little guy's okay."


As they continued getting dressed, they continued to chat, gossiping about boys as you were forced to remain sandwiched like jelly between the books. "... I mean, I guess Gary's kinda cute and all, but he's way too mean for me to put up with him", Emma said.

"Me either. *sigh* I wish I could find another cute little squishy boy like Mary. She's so lucky", Stacy replied blushing a bit. "Jack might not be tall or strong, but he'll stay young and cute forever", she giggled as she put her shoes on.

Emma laughed as she finished up along with her. "With how much fun you have with Jack, we'd probably never see him unless you mooned us."

With that, they headed off to the gymnasium. The sudden silence told you that the locker room was completely empty, and would be for the next hour. This would be the perfect time to escape if you were able to. With no girls around to find you, you renewed your struggles, hoping to finally be free from your book cover prison.
1333.title: Book Cover

choices: She throws her bag in her locker, leaving you trapped until tomorrow.
She takes her bag home to wash them. Freedom or more torture?
13332.content:
Once the sound of the girl’s leaving the locker room ended, you began to wiggle and squirm like crazy, hoping to free yourself before the gym period ended. You twisted and turned underneath Emma’s heavy text books, not expecting much to happen. To your surprise, you actually began to slip out from between her text books.

The going was slow, but at least progress was being made. Every few minutes, your papery body was able to slip out about a few inches or so. You were so excited that you were escaping, that you totally lost track of time. Finally, your flat form popped free, and floated gently onto the floor of the locker room.

About ten minutes after that, your body finally popped back to normal. You were so happy that you had escaped from Emma’s books. You also knew school was killer, but that had just been crazy. You were about to turn and leave the locker room, when you heard the sound of the door opening. That sound was quickly replaced by the giggles and gossiping of twenty or so teenage girls, and you realized class had ended. That was bad.

You frantically glanced from side to side, looking for somewhere to hide. There really was nowhere to hide, except for an open gym bag lying on the floor. You knew it was probably a terrible idea, but it was better than being found by a bunch of
teenage girls. They would probably murder you if they found you.

With a sigh, you quickly crushed your own legs, crumpling them flat. You crawled your way over to the bag, and then slipped inside. Thankfully, the bag was huge, so you were easily able to slip inside. No sooner had you disappeared inside the bag did several girls start walking towards you.

You heard footsteps stomping all around you, and the voices of many different girls. Thankfully, it sounded like you had successfully managed to evade being caught. However, that feeling of happiness quickly turned to more panic.

“Hey Stacy.” You heard the voice of Emma say. “Why did you leave your gym bag out on the floor like that?”

“Did I?” Stacy replied. “I meant to put that in my locker. Whoops.” A set of footsteps approached you, the sounds getting closer and closer. Suddenly, you heard Stacy cry out in surprise, and a powerful force slammed down on top of you, instantaneously crushing you flat. The heavy weight grinded you down into a papery form immediately.

“Stacy! Are you okay?” Emma asked, concerned.

“Yeah. I’m fine.” Stacy groaned. She had slipped and fallen on her gym bag butt first. “These floors are so slippery. She stood up, but the damage had been done. You had been totally smashed, and you now made no difference in the shape of Stacy’s gym bag. There would be no way for her to tell that you were in there.

Stacy proceeded to strip out of her sweaty gym shirt and shorts, throwing them into her gym bag. The disgusting articles of clothing fell over your body, covering you in sweat and the awful stench. You would have gagged if you could.

Stacy picked up her gym bag, and then walked out of the gym. You were swung back and forhg as she walked. Since gym was her last period, she was free to go home now. Except, she didn’t know what to do with her gym clothes. She didn’t know whether to put them back in her school locker, or take them home and wash them.

What does she decide?
13332.title: A Brief Escape

choices: You manage to reform, but Dahlia wakes up and catches you before you can leave.
You aren't able to reform, and Dahlia gives you back to Emma at school.
13333.content:
You tried your hardest to reform while the girls were in their gym class, but you just couldn’t free yourself from the chemistry text book. You guessed that you had been crushed much more than you had initially thought. The class came to an end, and all of the girls reentered the locker room. Emma changed back into her normal clothes, and gathered up her books. Before she could leave, someone tapped her on the shoulder.

“Excuse me Emma.” A voice said. Emma turned around, and saw that it was her friend Dahlia. Dahlia didn’t have many friends at school, as she tended to spend most of her time reading books in her room. She was so similar to Emma that the two girls got along rather well.

“Hello Dahlia.” Emma replied. “Did you need something?”

“I saw you had your chemistry book.” Dahlia noted. “Would I be able to borrow it? I seem to have misplaced mine.” Your blood ran cold at hearing those words. You definitely didn’t want to be separated from Emma, as that meant you would be separated from Mary as well. Unfortunately, it seemed like Emma wasn’t about to be your savior.

“Sure thing. I don’t need it today anyway.” Emma handed you over to Dahlia, who eagerly grabbed you. Dahlia thanked Emma, and then stuffed you into her backpack, enclosing you in darkness. You spent the rest of the day trapped in Dahlia’s backpack. Dahlia’s backpack was also quite tight, so you were still unable to reform.

The school day drew to a close, and Dahlia rode the bus back to her house. She walked to her house, and then went up to her bedroom. She dumped the contents of her backpack out onto the floor, and then picked up the chemistry book. Her fingers pressed into your skin as she held you. Dahlia sat down on her bed, and flipped the book over until you were staring up at her face.

“What the?” Dahlia said, cocking her head to the side. She had spotted you, but you doubted she knew who you were. You had never met her before in your life. Dahlia rubbed her hands over you, touching her inch of your body. Her fingers were cold and smooth, and she methodically felt up all of you.

She eventually determined that you were just a really weird book case, which is exactly what you looked like. She opened up the book, causing you to be bent backwards. Your body was pressed down onto Dahlia’s warm soft and squishy thigh as she opened the chemistry book, and that was the position you stayed in as she studied the book for the next four hours. All in all, it certainly wasn’t an entirely unpleasant situation.

Eventually, Dahlia felt as if she had sufficiently studied for the night. She closed the book, and then placed you on her desk, thankfully face up. Dahlia stayed up a little longer, reading some more books, until she began to feel tired. She turned off the light, and then cuddled up on her bed. After about ten minutes, she had drifted off to sleep.

You began to focus all of your efforts on reforming. With Dahlia asleep, you had the perfect opportunity to be free from the book and escape her house without anyone seeing you. All you had to do was reform, which was proving to be more difficult than you had anticipated. You had spent the majority of the day being crushed, so it was certainly not easy to reform.

134.content:
As you're running through the hall, you're quickly jerked back by your arm.

"And what are you doing here, little boy?", you hear a voice ask. Once the person turns you around, you see that she's a chubby, younger looking woman. She has the school's ID badge,but you don't recognize her at all. She must be new. "Looks like someone wandered into the wrong school", she said with a tone that adults would use when speaking to a young child

You sighed as she spoke to you. You were no stranger in dealing with substitutes. "Look, I know I look a lot younger, but I'm actually fourteen. I've got a genetic disorder that makes me appear younger and smaller than average. If you'll just get another one of the teachers, I'm sure they'll..." You were suddenly interrupted as she grabbed you by the arm and dragged you back to the door.

"C'mon, kiddo. I'll take you back to your school. The elementary bell hasn't rung yet, so you might not miss class."

You immediately started struggling, hoping to get out of her grip. You can't remember a time when you were in an elementary school where it ended without incident. "No! Will you just listen to me for one minute?! I'm a teenager!"

The new teacher just rolls her eyes. "Sorry, but I'm just a little bit smarter than that, little guy."

You continue struggling and whining as she drags you toward the front door. The elementary school is directly next door to the junior high (which meant that you had to avoid both Gary and Stevie after school). Gary was bad enough, but you had the chance that Mary or Andrew would save you from him over here. If Stevie or one of his friends managed to find you, you were a goner. The thought makes you put up even more of a fight, but all your fit has done is make you look even more childish.

Just as you reach the door, you notice Gary, the bane of your existence. You weren't too thrilled about asking your girlfriend's bully of a twin brother for help, but it was better than being taken to a school full of hyperactive little kids. The bully never helped you unless you did something for him in return. You'd rather not think about what he'd force you to do in exchange for helping you, but you were left with no other choice. "Gary! This lady thinks I'm a little kid! Tell her I go to school here!", you yell at him, getting his attention. He smirks as he walks over to you, a wicked gleam in his eye.

Class was just about to start, when Miss Williams suddenly stood up from her chair. She had her cell phone in her hand.

“Excuse me children. I have to take this call. It’s very important. Please behave until I get back.” She glanced sternly at you and Stevie in particular, and then she left the room, closing the door behind her.

Before you could even process the terrible situation you were in, Stevie had snuck up behind you silently. He pushed down
on your head, easily overwhelming you. You were crushed flat like an accordion by the troublesome child, until you were but a flat sticker on your chair. He peeled you off the chair, and grinned at you.

“I’m so glad this happened today squishy!” He giggled cruelly. “I was just getting bored!” He peeled you off the chair, and carried you to the front of the class room. He unceremoniously dropped you onto Miss William’s chair, and then he pressed his hands down on you, flattening you out until you covered the chair completely. He rubbed your face in circles, until your skin had been totally messed up and mixed up. When he was finished, you just looked like a big tan circle covering Miss William’s chair. Incidentally, her chair had also been tan to begin with.

Stevie skipped happily back to his desk, while the other kids laughed at what he had done. They had all seen it happen, but none of them had stepped in to save you. They had found the situation to amusing to want to help you. You had forgotten just how cruel little kids could be.

Stevie sat down right as Miss Williams walked back into the room. She saw that her class hadn’t changed, save for you. Unfortunately, she had totally forgotten about you, so the class looked perfectly normal to her. She began to walk back to her desk to sit down.

Your face had been mixed up and swirled around, so you could no longer see anything but black. However, you were able to hear Miss Williams’s heels clicking against the floor, so you knew she was approaching the desk. When her footsteps stopped, you knew what came next. With incredible force, Miss Williams sat down in her chair, her large ass crashing down on top of you.

You hadn’t paid much attention to her butt earlier, and you hadn’t realized just how large it actually was. However, feeling it slam down on top of your body was a totally different story. The immense pressure created by her butt squashing you between the chair and herself was crazy, the heat, pain, and stench overflowing all at once.

Miss Williams hadn’t noticed a thing, and she wiggled her ass to get more comfortable. Her butt grinded against you, rubbing you painfully against her tight skirt. You hated Stevie for what he had done, and you wondered why he always seemed to be trying to torture you every chance he got.

Surprisingly, brief salvation came in the form of the children in the class. All of the kids had exploded into laughter seeing their teacher sit down on one of her own students. The laughter cued the Miss Williams in on the fact that something was not right, so she stood up quickly.

All the pressure left you at once as Miss Williams stood. You were thankful for that, at least. Miss Williams glanced down at her seat, seeing if the kids had done anything to it. Does she notice you stuck to the seat, or do you blend in too well?

“Really Tina? I didn’t mean for this to be…” Your mom tried to explain, laughing.

“No! You challenged me, so I won’t back down.” Tina declared. She chewed on your poor, battered body for a few more seconds before she began to blow. Tina continued to blow, her lips curled into a smile of satisfaction. She had managed to expand your body to a massive size, causing you to form the largest gum bubble any of the three women had ever seen. As Trish and Barbara “oohed” and “aahed”, Tina was just about to run out of air. She gave one last push to blow the bubble, and everything went to shit.

Your body, which had been pushed to its limit, couldn’t stretch any further. You popped so loud it sounded like a gun shot, and your tired, gummy body slapped against Tina. Your stretched self clung to every inch of Tina’s body, from her head down to her thighs. You became stuck to her sweat, and entangled in her hair.

Tina screamed in panic, and began furiously scratching at your body. She looked like a monster out of a horror film, with a giant glob of tan gummy adhered to her body. Trish and Barbara led her into the bathroom, where they began the laborious task of freeing Tina from her “gum”.

The two women picked and peeled at your body for thirty minutes, tearing off chunks of you and letting them wash away down the drain in the sink. Tina had started to cry, from a mix of fear, shock, and embarrassment. Trish soothed her with kind words and a gentle shoulder rub. Finally, all but one piece of gum had been plucked free from Tina’s body. Using nail clippers from her purse, your mom removed the last piece, and tossed it over her shoulder towards the sink. However, the glob of your gummy body landed on the edge of the counter, and fell to the floor. This was important, because it was that piece that contained your conscience, your very being.

After that excruciating ordeal had come to a close, the three women were eager to get back out into the water park. They left the bathroom, and headed over to the wave pool. You were in a human shape, and you were still naked. Those two aspects had been expected. However, due to so much of your mass being lost down the drain, you had only managed to reform to a measly six inches in height! You looked like a tiny naked doll, and this change would be permanent for the next several months until you could regenerate your mass!

Worse still was the fact that no one knew what had happened to you, or where you were. Eventually, what decision do you come to?

1412111121.content:
The object that your body had stuck to was lifted up into the air by a mechanical arm, and then carried across the room. You couldn’t see what was happening at all, but you knew it had to be bad. Sure enough, you were soon dropped into a large box, and crashed down into a big pile of sticky and squishy goo.

Your body quickly became entangled in the gummy-like goo, and then large chunk above you slowly pushed you underneath the surface. You sank into the depths of the goo, soon enveloped in darkness. You couldn’t move, talk, or even reform. You also had no idea what substance you were stuck to. Oddly enough, it felt a lot like…yourself?

To your horror, you realized that the recycling arm had tossed you right into a large box filled with gummy material. Your mother, with your consent, had taken some of your own DNA and had managed to create gummy material with the exact same properties has yourself. With this gummy material she had started up a factory that made gummy dolls and gummy clothing, both of which were incredibly popular.

The gummy franchise had yet to fully catch on, but it was immensely popular with the fan base that it did have. This also caused problems for you throughout your life. Because of the similar body proportions, you had often been confused for a gummy doll, and abused by little girls far too often. Also, you had been confused for gummy clothing as well, which led to some awkward and embarrassing situations. Your own mom had even gotten you mixed up for clothing and dolls before.

In order to avoid any further confusion, your mom had created the Beta4 spray. The spray instantly hardened any gummy material, and the hardening could only be dissolved through a special solvent. This plan had backfired as well, resulting in many times where you had been frozen through accidents involving Beta4. You despised the substance, and tried your best to stay away from it.

It looked like fate had other plans though, as you were know buried deep in a box of gummy material, most likely about to be shipped to your mom’s factory. Gummy material was known for being recyclable, and so local recycle centers had started sorting gummy material as a separate material. Sure enough, the box you were in was packaged up a few minutes later, and carried out to a truck.

The truck drove for what seemed like hours, until it finally arrived at the factory. The boxes were unloaded one by one, and then the contents were dumped out onto the conveyor belt. You were still enveloped in gummy material from all sides, hidden from sight and unable to reform. You felt the treads of the conveyor belt moving underneath you, and you wondered where you would end up.

You could be taken down the line and turned into a gummy doll. You would then be shipped out to a toy store, and most likely bought by some happy and smiley six year old. The image of that in your mind terrified you, but the alternative was not any better. If you were turned into gummy clothing, you could be bought any worn by some unaware girl for months, if not years. Of course, you wished for some miracle to come save you, but you knew it was unlikely. What ends up happening?

14121111211.content:
The conveyor belt started to shift to the left, and you and the gummy pile you were wedged deeply into began turning towards that direction as well. You shudder with fear, knowing that there was absolutely nothing you could do to stop the machinery from molding you into the perfect little gummy doll. All you could do was brace yourself and hope for the best. Of course, fate was never so kind.

Almost immediately, lifeless claws began picking away at globs of gummy from your pile, until finally a claw gripped you and hoisted you into the air. Before you had even a single second to struggle, several other claws and hands popped out from the tangled web of robotics, and went to work. You were gripped, crushed, stretched, and pulled in various different directions, and you mentally screamed in pain.

Finally, you resembled your normal self, although at only a foot tall. Your body's natural reforming process started to kick in, but was halted almost immediately by a gummy material dress being slammed down over your head. The dress fit on you like a vice, firmly trapping you in your current form. The dress was big, blue, and puffy, with lots of frills and lacy parts. You struggled to get free, but it was no use.

Somehow, the machine was able to detect that you were a tiny boy and not a normal gummy material glob. However, it was programmed to handle that situation, so it did the next “best” thing. The metal arms pounded your squishy dick until it was squashed flat, and pressed up against your body. The pain shot up your entire self, and you passed out from the agony, slipping into unconsciousness. Your eyes and your mouth closed.

Next, the machine slid some cute gummy pantie hose up your legs, and then topped off your feet with some gummy high heels. The mechanical arms ran shiny white ribbons and bows around your head, and stretched and pulled at your hair until it was fashioned into twin pigtails. All finished with the basic setup, the machine dropped you off onto a conveyor that led straight towards the worst place in the entire factory: The makeup room.

You bounced and tumbled into the room, and were picked up by one of the many actual factory employees. She was a pretty girl of twenty years, but she wasn't going to help you out of your situation. In fact, she was only going to make it worse. She picked up her bag full of makeup, and began getting to work.

She pursued your lips, and applied thick coats of bright red lipstick to them. She covered every visible inch of your skin with pale foundation, giving you the total appearance of nothing more than a porcelain doll. She also added some blush to your cheeks. She even painted your nails a pretty pink shade.

The eyes were the worst part. Because your eyes were closed from your unconscious state, you looked just like the faceless gummy material normally used for gummy dolls. The girl did her normal makeup job like nothing was the matter, painting the eyes onto your face by hand. She drew white circles, a bright blue iris for each eye, and black pupils as well. She then added fancy looking eyelashes. The finishing touches included darkening your eyebrows and drawing on some eye shadow and mascara.

Finally finished with her work, the girl carelessly tossed you across the room into a huge vat of liquid Beta4. The accursed chemical got to work right away, hardening your gummy body, as well as the gummy clothes and makeup covering and coating you. You were now sealed in this disguise until you came into contact with the solvent. “If” you came into contact. Until then, you were unable to move, talk, take off your clothes, or wipe off your makeup. In less than ten minutes you had become nothing more than a pretty gummy doll.

You woke up from your unconsciousness as an employee was lifting you out of the Beta4 tank. Surprisingly, you found yourself unable to open your eyes, or your mouth. That was because the Beta4 had dried the makeup and frozen your body. You were mute, and unable to see. You couldn't do a thing but mentally weep as the oblivious employee packed you away into a box, and dropped you into a truck to be shipped to a toy store.

The truck left a few hours later, and the drive took about an hour. You fell into and out of sleep, but it was hard to sleep peacefully knowing there was a fairly goo chance that life as you knew it was completely gone. Even if someone you knew found you, it wouldn't matter. You were the wrong size. You were the wrong skin color. You were the wrong gender. You were wearing ridiculous clothes, and your features were obscured by the doll makeup. You were mute, and incapable of movement. You also felt like a doll. Try as you might, you couldn't think of any way out of this hellish nightmare!

You and the rest of the dolls were unloaded from the truck and taken into the store, placed on a special display stand advertising the newest generation of gummy dolls. For three whole days you sat on the shelf, a big grin forever plastered on your frozen face. You couldn't see or hear anything, so it was difficult to discern anything going on in the outside world. You just hoped that somehow, a miracle would occur. You really, really, hoped.

A week later, someone walks up to the display stand, and their attention is drawn immediately to you. Who is the person?

14121221.content:
When Gary had smoothed your body onto whatever red surface he had placed you on, he had wanted to make sure that no one would be able to distinguish you from the surface. To do so, he had crushed you like a slinky, almost like you had been earlier on your mother’s ass. Your face was pressed first into the surface, followed by the rest of your body. This left only your swimming trunks visible, which of course still blended in because of the red coloring.

Because of this, everything around you was shrouded in darkness. Your face had been roughly smashed into the red surface, and you could barely sense anything. You heard only muffled sounds, and you couldn’t taste or see anything. You could feel that the surface was smooth-ish, but also a little bumpy. You could also smell something that was a mix between strawberries and…sweat?

Just then the ground began to shake, and you feared that there was an earthquake coming. That wasn’t the case, although it certainly felt like an earthquake to you. The earthquake you were experiencing was really just a life guard named Destiny walking towards her flip-flops, which were lying on the ground near her stand. She had left them there earlier and had come back to retrieve them, unaware of the additional passenger now plastered to the sole area on the left flip-flop.

Destiny slid her feet into the flip-flops and stepped down, enjoying the soft feeling of the shoe on her bare feet. You were experiencing a much less pleasant feeling as Destiny’s sole slammed down onto your body. If you hadn’t been crushed before, you certainly were now. Stuck on her flip-flop you felt her entire weight pressing down on you, and the pressure was almost unbearable.

Destiny took one step forward, and the true reality of your situation hit you. As soon as her foot lifted, you felt a sickening sensation rise up within you. Her foot stomped back down onto the ground, and your entire being was smashed by the force of an entire skyscraper collapsing onto you. You mentally screamed out in intense agony, but your silent pleas of course went unheard.

Destiny didn’t even feel anything different with her flip-flops, as Gary had done a good job of concealing you. She just kept walking, blissfully unaware to the torment she was putting her squishy stowaway through. With each step your body was wracked with hellish pain, and fought through the tears, praying it would end soon. It had been a long time since you had been underneath someone’s foot, and you had forgotten just how horrendous it was.

Unfortunately, Destiny still had a long way to walk. Her next shift was on the complete opposite side of the park, and so she had a nearly ten minute walk ahead of her. It was no trouble for her, but that meant you were subjected to ten full minutes of seemingly endless crushing and smashing, over and over with no end in sight. Your body was quickly caked with dirt and sweat from Destiny’s sole, and you feared with enough pressure you might stick to her sole instead of the flip-flop.

Finally Destiny reached her post, and she climbed up the ladder to her stand. She sat into her chair, and let out a sigh of relaxation. She kicked off her flip-flops, letting them fall to the ground beside her chair. She stretched out her legs and settled in for what would probably be a long and boring shift. The real question was, where did you end up?

141212211.content:
When you found yourself trapped in situations like this one, you found it helpful to look at the bright sides of the situation first. They could be hard to find, but they were always there. For example, you weren't being stepped on at the moment, and you weren't glued to this lifeguard's sole. Also, you had a fairly good chance of reforming, as long as she left her flip-flops off for a while.

Of course, there were always bad sides, and you also knew it to be good to keep these in mind as well. In this specific case, you were stuck to the shoe of a stranger who had no idea you existed, you would be unlikely to notice you and even more unlikely to see you as a person. Plus, because of how you stuck, the red trunks were all that showed; to the outside world you were just another part of this girl's flip-flops.

Man, this sucked. You came to have fun with your girlfriend, and once again Gary decides to royally screw it up. This always happened, too. It seemed predetermined that you would never have a nice, peaceful day. It was like fate, like -

"Destiny!" Above, the lifeguard shifted, slamming her feet down to either side of you. At least you had a name for her.

"Yeah? What's up?" she called back. You couldn't see the other person, but they sounded to be female, and of a similar age.

"Boss says you're needed at the wave pool. Extra crowded today, and she don't want to risk a toddler drowning."

You heard a thump as she put her full weight onto the ground. You wished you could see right now. "There's only two chairs there. What'd she want me to do, sit on the ground?"

"I dunno, pace or something. It's not my idea."

"And what about here?"

"Alice'll take care of it after her break. Listen, take this up with the boss; I've got to get back to my spot."

With a sigh, Destiny took off. She left her flip-flops, mostly out of forgetfulness, and headed barefoot over to the wave pool. Suddenly you were alone again, blessed with this opportunity to reform. But is it enough? Can you break free before the next lifeguard stomps over here?

With a sigh, you sat back down on the towels the girls left behind, and decided to simply wait for them to return. It was without a doubt the safest option available to you. Unfortunately, it was also the most boring.

You laid on your back against the towel, staring up at the hot sun. The sun was shining directly down on you, its brilliant rays burning your skin. You were glad that you had lathered up in sunscreen before coming to the park, or you would be a goopy puddle at this point.

Just then, the sun was blocked out by a shadow. The shadow completely filled your vision, until you were suddenly and forcefully pressed against the ground. You were flattened like paper under something warm and…giggling. You recognized that voice. It was Stevie!

Stevie climbed up to his feet, staring down at your flattened form. He had flopped on you, and the results had been exactly as anticipated. He stepped aside as Gary walked into your view.

“What’s up squishy?” He smirked. “Enjoying your day at the waterpark?” He bent down and picked you up, rolling you into a tiny ball. “I couldn’t resist. You’re just so much fun to play with Jack.” He and Stevie laughed.

You fumed intensely, and wished you could punch him in his smug face, but it was hopeless. He had you trapped in the palm of his hand. Literally.

“I’ve got a great idea today squishy.” He closed his fist around you, and then he and Stevie sped off across the park. They headed directly for the sauna. It was empty, so they strode inside and dropped your tiny form on the steaming bench. Within just a few seconds, your body had been melted down into a liquidy and goopy substance. Gary swept you off the bench, and you fell into a bottle that Stevie was holding below you.

Your entire goopy form splashed down into the bottle, and mixed in with some other liquidy substance. You couldn’t tell what the other substance was, only that it was cold and wet. It mixed with your body, and you felt yourself sticking to and absorbing with the liquid. You had no idea what kind of bottle you were in, but you knew it was bad news.

“How’s it going in there squishy?” Stevie laughed. “I hope you like your new prison!”

“You’re going to have tons of fun in there squishy.” Gary joined in. “Wondering what kind of bottle it is? I’ll tell you.” He leaned in close to the bottle, and whispered menacingly. “It’s tanning lotion.”

You gasped in fear, or you would have if you weren’t melted down into a liquidy form. You had no idea you were in a bottle of tanning lotion, and now that you knew, you were terrified.

“I bet you’re scared.” Gary grinned. “Afraid some hot chick will pour you all over her sexy body and you’ll get stuck there for weeks? I hope that happens. That would be hilarious!” Gary and Stevie left the sauna, with you trapped in the bottle of tanning lotion.

Unbeknownst to you was the fact that your tan and liquidy form had fused with the tanning lotion more than you thought. Your body had been entirely turned into a shade of cream, and no part of your normal self was visible. You looked exactly like normal tanning lotion, and no one would be able to tell the difference.

Gary and Stevie stepped out into a large crowd, and then looked for a suitable female to hand you off to. How do they decide to give you to?

141213211.content:
Seeing how tan her workout clothes looked, Trish smiled to herself, fully believing that her plan had been a success. She carried the clothes upstairs to her gummy work room, where she already had a large bowl set out. She wadded up her clothes and pinched them between two metallic arms. With the press of a button, the machine got to work.

The mechanical arms twisted, crunched, and smashed with incredible force, practically running your mother’s workout clothes. However, slowly but surely, your gummy body that had been absorbed into the clothing dripped out, bit by bit. In a liquid state your body was squeezed free from the clothing, and gooped together in the bowl.

All in all, it took about three hours for the arms to work every drop of your body out of the clothing and into the bowl. Trish took her now ruined clothes and tossed them into the trash, and carried your bowl into your bedroom, where she knew it would be safe. Blowing you a kiss, she left the room and continued on with her day, knowing that it would take you quite a while to reform.

Unfortunately, there was a terrible truth that Trish didn’t know, and you had no way of alerting her either. Half of your gummy body was still trapped within her flesh, absorbed in her skin. Only half of you had slipped out of her body during the workout session. Thankfully, your consciousness was contained within the bowl and not still inside Trish, but that fact didn’t do much to make your situation better.

It took you the better part of two full days to reform back to normal, but as you had expected, you reformed at a measly foot and a half tall. Since half of your body had been lost, you had only reformed to half of your original height. Naked, because none of your clothes fit you, you trekked out of your room and downstairs, where your mother was relaxing on the couch.

“Oh Jack! I’m so glad you…WHAT THE HELL???” Trish exclaimed upon seeing you. “Why…why are you so small?”

“Half of my gummy mass is still inside of you mom.” You explained, sulking.

“Jack…I’m so sorry. I’ll get right back to exercising!” Trish hopped up, but you held up a hand.

“It won’t matter. Since my consciousness no longer has a connection with the other half, it’s gone. Forever. Soon, the half of my body trapped in your flesh will fully merge with your own. It’s gone.”

“Jack…” Trish bent down and scooped you up into her arms, cradling you in a big hug. Her massive breasts squished your face, but you didn’t care. “I’m so sorry. This will take a very long time to fix, won’t it?”

“Yeph…” You mumbled, your mouth pressed against your mom’s bare flesh. You had lost parts of your gummy body before. It would take months to grow that lost half back, and return to normal size, but it would happen eventually. You would just need some time to adjust.

After a while, Trish set you down and went to look for clothes for you to wear. Unfortunately, all she could find was a dress that belonged to a large doll. The dress, which was a rather sleek design, fit you perfectly, though it made you look more like a little toddler than a teenage boy. Sadly, you weren’t in a position to complain. At least you didn’t have to be naked anymore.

Mary came over that night, and after getting over the initial shock of your new size, hugged you tightly and carried you up to your room. The two of you cuddled and chatted for hours, Mary’s warm body engulfing you in a relaxing and comfortable embrace. She swore that no matter what, she would protect you fiercely at your new size.

A rather uneventful week passed, as your mother insisted you stay at home and not go anywhere. That being said, you still ended up tagging along with your mother on her shopping trips, once crushed to her ass and twice flattened to the sole of her foot. Your new size made it even harder for your oblivious mother to notice, hear, or feel you, but she was honestly trying her hardest.

Mary came over every single day, and she was the brightest ray of sunshine in your life. Her radiant smile and passionately love kept you going, until finally you insisted to your mother that you needed to go back to school. Ensuring her that you would be safe and secure all day long, you and Mary departed for school.

By this point in time, your mom had bought a loose-fitting t-shirt and shorts for you. They were actually accessories from a doll shop, but at least you looked and felt more like a boy than before. Mary still insisted on carrying you in her arms into school, which definitely drew a lot of confused looks from the other students.

15321.content:
“Oh!” A feminine voice cried softly, as the bottom of a giant shoe stomped down onto you. Your body flattened out, and you mentally shouted in pain as your body was squashed. The female attendant, not looking at the floor, had stepped down right onto you.

She lifted her foot up off of the ground, but there was nothing where she had stepped. Glancing at the sole of her foot, she spotted a smushed tan glob. Your face was pressed into the treads of her sneaker, so all of your facial features were hidden.

“How did this get here?” The attendant giggled, scraping you off of her shoe. She carelessly rolled you into a ball as she walked to the back of the daycare area, where a young girl was playing with play dough. The attendant dropped you onto the table in front of the girl, rubbed the girl’s head playfully, then continued walking around.

You didn’t waste a second wiggling and trying to reform, but it was useless. The girl grabbed you without wasting a second, and slammed you down onto her play mat. Your face was shoved into a big pile of blue play dough, the rubbery substance adhering to your gummy body.

Oblivious to the fact that her new addition was a living, breathing, squishy teen, the six-year-old girl continued working on her masterpiece, which involved grabbing the edges of the blue play dough. Stretching the play dough out, she folded the edges over top of each other. You mentally screamed as a wall of play dough crashed down onto you, burying you underneath.

The girl then grabbed the whole glob of play dough, and squeezed and molded it between her tiny, delicate hands. Smiling innocently, the girl squashed and squeezed your body, causing your gummy self to mix in with the blue play dough. You were powerless to stop her, and could only sob in agony.

When the girl was done, she had a ball-shaped object sitting in her hand. The ball was a pretty mix of tan and blue, as your body had been thoroughly intertwined with the play dough. The girl giggled, and then dropped her play dough orb into a mold shaped like a T-Rex. Pushing the play dough to fill the mold completely, the girl played without a clue in the world as to the hell she was putting you through.

After waiting for the play dough to harden a bit, the girl slipped her creation out of the mold, and laughed triumphantly. Standing before her was a six-inch-tall play dough dinosaur, its color a myriad mix of tan and blue. For some reason, the dinosaur even smelled like strawberry cheesecake, which happened to be her favorite dessert. The girl couldn’t be happier.

Your new captor showed you off to the daycare attendant, who gushed about how pretty you were. Blushing heavily, the little girl placed you in her specially marked cubby, and went back to playing with blocks.

You tried your hardest to reform, but you couldn’t manage. Your body was too well mixed in with the play dough. The play dough packed you in so tight that you couldn’t manage so much as a simple twitch. You would need a strong force to break you out of this shell, or else you wouldn’t be reforming, potentially, ever.

You sat on the shelf for two full hours, until the little girl’s mom came to pick her up and take her home. The girl grabbed you off of the shelf and skipped out back into the mall, holding you in one hand and her mom’s hand in the other. Your vision was nothing but darkness, as your eyes were totally messed up at this point, but you could tell what was going on. This girl was going to take you home, and your life was about to take a horrible turn for the worse.

"There there Sammy. It's just mommy." The woman cooed, patting your head. You didn't know what was going on, so you struggled against her, but her grip was like steel. There was no escape, no matter how hard you struggled. The woman walked to the entrance of the day care. The day care lady from earlier saw you, and began speaking to the woman carrying you.

"I have to tell you something ma'am." The day care lady spoke up. "Your son was found running around the mall earlier. You better keep good watch on him."

The thought chilled you, but not as much as finally realizing what was going on. This woman had mistaken you for her own child, and was going to take you home! With this new thought, you renewed your efforts to escape, with no result.

The woman carried you out of the day care center and to her stroller she had parked several feet away. It was right then that the thought of speaking to her crossed your mind, but the weird pacifier she had put into your mouth wouldn't come out! It was too tight! It was like some kind of muffler!

The woman began whistling a happy tune, as she pushed the stroller out of the mall. On your way out, you passed by Mary and Gary, but neither of them took any notice of your predicament, probably because a stroller being pushed by a mother would be the last place they would look for you. The woman pushed the stroller out of the mall and to her car waiting in the parking lot. Once there, she unstrapped you, and set you down on the ground while she packed up the stroller.

You realized that this was your chance to escape. You saw three possible places to run to: back into the mall, over to Mary and Gary's mother's car (which was a few feet away), or into a large tour bus that was currently loading up. Which route do you take?

153332.content:
“Thank you for choosing us as your tour guides!” The attractive tour guide bowed politely, smiling from ear to ear. She had no idea that you had snuck onto the bus. “Soon we will be reaching Global Studios, secondary branch!” The packed bus applauded loudly, and you felt the rumble of the engines as the bus pulled out onto the road. Like it or not, you were now stuck in this situation until a chance to escape arose.

You were huddled in the very back of the bus, your back pressed against the cold metal. A passenger had sat on the seat you were under, meaning you were trapped under their seat until the bus ride was over. The seat cushion sunk down slightly from their weight, and the person’s legs dangled down in front of you. From their tight leggings and painted toenails, you surmised that it was probably a lady.

“As you are all probably aware, Global Studios is one of the largest and most prolific movie studios in the United States.” The tour guide began her lecture, and everyone listened with rapt attention. Even though most of the passengers knew this common knowledge, something about the girl’s voice was just mesmerizing. Even you found yourself zoning out to the sweet lull of her voice.

Unfortunately, you zoned out too far, and began to fall asleep. Your body slumped forward and out into the open. The woman, who had lifted up her legs to scratch at an inch, chose that moment to let her legs fall back down, and her sharp heels crushed your head and upper chest flat. She didn’t feel a thing, and continued to keep her feet pressed down on you like you were nothing more than a simple carpet.

Your hopes for a quick bus ride to save you from this torment were soon dashed, as the minutes turned into an hour. That hour soon turned into three. Finally, the bus slowed to a stop after three and a half excruciating hours of being trapped under this oblivious woman’s feet. Several times she had even absentmindedly rubbed her feet across your body, painfully grinding you against the floor.

Everyone exited the bus, including the woman who had tortured you for the past three and a half hours. You were left plastered and mangled on the floor, your clothes long since torn to shreds. After about thirty minutes you regained your shape, and you stood up and brushed yourself off. Thankfully the bus driver had left the door open, and not a single person was in sight to witness your stark naked body. You crept off of the bus, and immediately gasped in surprise.

Sure enough, you had arrived at Global Studios, secondary branch. Everywhere you looked there were massive warehouses, and crazy looking sets jutting out into the sky. Movie trailers filled entire parking lots, and rows of expensive camera equipment could be spotted in every direction. Being a rather geeky person, you were in heaven.

That is, until you realized that you were completely naked and standing out in the middle of an open parking lot. You sprinted as fast as your little legs could carry you, eventually taking shelter in an empty prop box outside one of the many warehouses. As you shivered in the dark, you realized that you had no idea where in the world you were. You were nearly four house from home, and no one was going to save you.

No one but you yourself. You were the only person who could do a thing about your current situation, and you were determined to get back to Mary if it was the last thing you did. Glancing out of the box you spotted the main office, as well as the open door of a nearby warehouse. The main office was bound to have someone who could help you, but the warehouse might have some clean clothes to wear.

Before you could reach a decision, the door right beside the box you were in swung open, giving you quite the fright. Your eyes widened as you saw the stunning visage of Iris Rashala strut right past your box. Iris was a world renowned actress and super model. Her Egyptian heritage gave her skin an irresistible tan shine, and she had curves to drive both men and women mad. Her body was only enhanced by the revealing and tight formal dress she was wearing at the moment.

You were gawking, but you couldn’t help it. Iris Rashala was easily one of the hottest women alive in the entire world. The 28-year-old beauty had come to America for the first time to film a movie beside Leonardo DiCaprio. From what you knew, she still didn’t know a single word of English. You had no idea she was going to be at this very studio! Suffice it say, you were star struck.

Iris walked across the parking lot and disappeared into her private trailer. To your utter delight, she actually left the door open! Now you were presented with three different options of how to proceed. You knew following after Iris was most likely only going to lead to disaster, but sometimes your teenage hormones were impossible to control. What do you decide to do?
153332.title: Global Studios

choices: You let your body melt, and your liquid form is absorbed.

1533321.content:
Feeling like the world’s biggest idiot, you jumped out of your hiding spot and sprinted across the hot pavement of the parking lot towards Iris’ trailer. She was a goddess among men, and there was no way that your teenage hormones would allowed you to pass up this once in a lifetime opportunity.

You crouched low and poked your head in through the door of Iris’ trailer. Her trailer was massive, easily the size of a small house. There appeared to be a mini bedroom, a small kitchen, and a tiny bathroom. All three of the separate “rooms” were connected to each other, though the bathroom did have a door, which was currently closed.

Realizing that Iris was in the bathroom, you took this chance to climb inside of her trailer. Looking around like a giddy child, you suddenly gasped and stopped what you were doing. You had no idea how to proceed from this point. Why had you even come in here in the first place? How stupid was this decision?

You turned to leave when you heard the toilet flush. You had absentmindedly strolled across the trailer, and were now on the opposite side from the door. There was no way that you would make it back to the door in time.

Panicking, you jumped into Iris’ lavishly silky bed. Working quickly, you squished bits of your body until you had squashed yourself down into half of your normal height. You grabbed one of the sheets and covered yourself in it, pressing yourself as close to the mattress as possible. Beads of sweat rolled down your face.

Iris opened the door to her bathroom, and stepped back out into her trailer. She was carrying her extravagant dress in her arms, and was wrapped in only a bath towel. The bath towel barely covered much of her voluptuous body. The Egyptian beauty strolled over to the door, closed and locked it, and then headed into the kitchen.

You had watched all of this transpire from under the sheet, poking out through an inch-sized hole. You were struggling to stop yourself from shaking with fear at how horrible this situation was becoming. Iris had now locked you inside of her trailer with her, and you had no idea what horrors would await if she found you.

Ten minutes passed, and you could hear the sounds of Iris eating from within the kitchen. As time had passed, the temperature was only continuing to rise. You had noticed that Iris’ trailer did not have any air condition, and bits of your gummy body had started to melt. You realized that since Iris had spent most of her life in Egypt, she was used to the heat. On the other hand, you were suffering more than any normal human being due to your body’s condition.

A minute later, the oblivious actress walked back over to her bed, and let her towel drop to the floor. Stark naked, Iris stretched her arms and let out a cute yawn, before sitting on the edge of her bed. As she sat, her ass crushed your legs flat, and you stifled a yelp of pain.

Iris leaned back, letting her incredibly comfortable mattress conform around her body. She closed her eyes and prepared to drift blissfully off to sleep. Meanwhile, you were unable to move, as Iris was lying right on top of you. Her butt was keeping your legs pinned, and her back was pressing down on your chest. The back of Iris’ head was squashing your head as well. Since you had been hidden under the covers, and Iris had flopped onto her bed without moving the sheets, she had no idea she was sleeping on top of you.

With Iris’ weight pressing down on you, the heat rose drastically. You could feel your body melting more and more. In moments, you knew that your entire gummy body would be reduced to nothing but liquid. If that happened, your whole situation could become a million times worse. You could be absorbed right into her mattress, or her silk sheets, or even Iris’ own flesh!

However, your only alternative would be to wiggle and squirm, in order to wake Iris up. Once she discovered you, you had no idea how she would react. Would she be nice? Mean? Playful? Sadistic? Would she help you get home, or keep you to herself? She didn’t even know how to speak a single word of English, and you sure as hell didn’t know any Egyptian. How would you communicate?

Time was running out though, and you needed to make a decision. What do you decide to do?
