154.content:
After sitting there for a while, you yell as you felt something poke you on the top of your head, twisting deep into it and causing you a great deal of discomfort. You then heard a familiar giggling as it twisted into your head.
"Hiya, Jack!" It was Stevie, Andrew's spoiled brat of a little brother, and your worst nightmare. He had been picking on you since before he could walk, chewing on you to sooth his gums when he was a baby, using you as a toy and eating you when he was a toddler, and has more recently using you as his personal punching bag. "Didn't think fast enough, gummy! Now you're all mi- OW!" You heard him yell as he took his finger out of your head.

"What did I tell you happens when I catch you being a brat?" You turned and looked. Behind you, you saw Andrew standing beside Stevie, rubbing his arm from having just been punched. In his teen years, Andrew had gotten much bigger, now almost double your height. He was also in the same sports team as Gary, though they couldn't stand each other. More than one of the your girlfriend's visits had been cut short due to the two fighting. There was also... another thing that he had gained, which you tried not to notice (though it was rather difficult when he spent the night).

"Owww... I'm telling mom you hit me, and you're gonna get it!", Stevie said to his brother.


"Not if you've got a fat lip", Andrew threatened, clenching his fist and causing Stevie to flinch. Andrew, like most teenage big brothers, often picked on his brother. You had seen him give him indian burns, wedgies, wet willies, and had even helped you into tricking him to do an atomic situp... though he tried chewing you up as soon as he realized that his face was wedged in your butt, which earned him a punch in the side from Andrew.

Andrew mainly messed with his brother to keep him in line and when he acted like a little brat (which was rather often), but you could tell he had a little too much fun sometimes. You always felt that your friend had some resentment toward his brother for being the favorite. You, however, were always on the bottom of the totem pole. Stevie picked on you, Andrew picked on him, Stevie took it out on you. By now, you had learned to steer clear of the brat.
"Hey there, little buddy", Andrew said as he tousled your hair.

"Heh, hey Andrew." He's always been sort of like a big brother to you, though he was still annoying at times, especially when you were trying to spend time with Mary. You figured he was just trying to embarrass you, but for some reason you weren't very comfortable with them being friends at school. "What are you doing here?"


"Hmm? Oh, I'm just waiting on the twins", he said.

"What? Why are you waiting for them? They didn't tell me anything", you say, a bit paranoid.

"Um, we're all going shopping for new clothes. I thought I texted you that we were tagging along. Guess not", he said.

"And I'm here to get whatever I want in the toy store", Stevie said in his rather annoying, bratty tone.

"Uh-huh... well, nobody told me anything." You hated being left out of the loop. You already felt different enough with out being excluded. Mary often made sure you were given equal treatment, but Andrew had grown used to you being an introvert and he felt like you wouldn't enjoy some of the things they did.

"That's 'cus you're weeeeeiiirrrrd", Stevie said in a teasing manner as he poked you... and was promptly given a wet willy.

"What'd I tell you, squirt?"

Stevie whined as he wiped the saliva out of his ear. "He's the squirt...", he mumbled. As much as you loved seeing the brat get what he deserved for picking on you, you still weren't happy about being not being informed.
154.title: Your best friend and worst enemy.

choices: Mary throws you into her mouth.

Mary accidentally drops you into her cleavage.
1542.content:
Before anything had a chance to get too out of hand, you spotted Mary and Gary approaching from the other side of the mall. You smiled as you saw your beautiful girlfriend draw near. She was wearing a tight t shirt and a cute miniskirt, and she looked as gorgeous as ever. She grinned when she saw you, and ran towards you.

“Jackie!” She squealed, scooping you up into her arms. She pressed you against her chest, your face squeezed between her breasts, as she gave you a big hug. Andrew laughed, while Gary rolled his eyes. You meanwhile, couldn’t complain in the slightest.

“Give it a rest Mary.” Gary sighed. “You just saw him the other day.” Mary gently lowered you back to the ground.

“Yes, but I love him.” She smiled sweetly down at you, and you blushed. “I can give my boyfriend a hug whenever I want.”

“So!” Andrew spoke up before Gary could respond. He was trying to keep everyone calm and friendly. “What are we going to do today?”

“I thought a movie would be a good idea.” Mary suggested. Everyone nodded in agreement, except for Stevie.

“I don’t want to watch a movie with you guys. It’s gonna be something dumb.” He pouted.

“I was thinking about that new superhero movie.” Mary smiled coyly. Stevie perked up.

“Oh really? In that case, awesome!” He dashed off towards the movie theater. You and everybody else followed after him.
You quickly reached the theater, and everybody handed their money to Mary. She paid for the tickets, and then Andrew and her headed into the theater to find some empty seats. That left you, Gary, and Stevie to get the popcorn for everybody.
You approached the girl running the concessions stand.

“Can I have five bags of popcorn please?” You asked politely. The girl nodded, and fixed the bags. She handed them to you, but Stevie quickly grabbed them from you.

“I can carry them.” He insisted. You were confused, but also glad that he was helping out. You began walking towards the theater with Gary and him, when Gary suddenly grabbed your arm and pulled you aside. Before you could ask what he was doing, he yanked you behind a large poster advertisement for a new movie.

Hidden behind the poster, Gary tackled you to the ground, suddenly crushing you into a flat form. He rolled you up as fast as he could, until you were but a tiny blob. The entire incident had occurred in less than twenty seconds, and even you hadn’t had enough time to react completely.

“Ha! That worked perfectly!” Gary smirked. “By the way, this was Stevie’s idea. Enjoy!” He motioned Stevie over to him, and Stevie held open one of the five bags of popcorn. Gary let you go, and you fell into the open popcorn bag.

You bounced off several of the popcorn pieces, your tiny ball shaped body rolling around. When you came to a rest, you were about halfway in the bag, buried under a layer of popcorn. You could barely see the outside world anymore. What was worse, was the fact that a lot of the butter had rubbed off onto you, caking your body. You now looked almost exactly like a piece of popcorn!

Gary and Stevie carried the bags into the theater, and found Andrew and Mary. Gary lied about you being in the bathroom, and surprisingly Mary believed him. Gary and Stevie passed out the bags of popcorn, making sure to give your bag to Mary.

You, of course, had no idea whose bag you were in. It wasn’t until you saw a pink fingernail break through the popcorn surface above you and snatch a few pieces that you realized whose bag you were in. You also realized just how big of jerks that Gary and Stevie were.

At that moment, the movie began, and everyone’s attention was brought to the film. All thoughts of you being in the bathroom passed from Mary’s mind, as her total attention was on the movie in front of her.

In only a few minutes, all of the popcorn above you had been eaten, and you had a clear view of Mary’s wonderful face. However, she still had no idea of your predicament, and she reached down and picked you up out of the bag.

She brought you up to her mouth, preparing to eat what she thought simply be another piece of popcorn. Her lips parted, and you saw the dark, wet cavern that you were heading towards.
1542.title: To The Movies

choices: "Because it cost me a lot!" (Your fate remains unknown to Mary)
"Because Jack was in it!" (Gary reveals your fate to Mary)
15421.content:
You looked at your beautiful girlfriend, her massive face filling up your entire field of vision. You tried to squirm and wiggle free, but her grip was like iron around your body. In a last desperate attempt, you tried to yell up to her, but your squished mouth couldn’t make any sounds at all. Her attention was fully on the movie, and she had no idea what she was about to do. She let go of you, and you dropped down into the dank cavern that was her mouth.

You landed with a splat on her tongue, the moistness of it already soaking your body. The temperature felt like it rose to one hundred degrees, as Mary’s hot breath rolled over you again and again. Mary’s tongue tilted, and your popcorn shaped body rolled along the slimy, fleshy surface. Your body bounced onto a hard object, which you immediately recognized as one of Mary’s threatening teeth. Without another wasted second, Mary bit down.

Her molars crashed together, pulverizing your defenseless body in between them. You were crushed flat, the sharp teeth tearing into your gummy body. Mary continued to bite and chew over and over, mashing you into an undistinguishable blob of flesh.

Mary flicked your beaten body back onto her tongue, and she began to rub up and down, feeling you up. Her wet and hot tongue rubbed all along your body, washing over you and caking you in liquidy saliva. You heard Mary let out a deep, content sigh. She had no idea that the popcorn she was enjoying so immensely was her squishy boyfriend, trapped and helpless inside of her mouth.

You had absolutely no chance of rescue at this point. Your body felt like a piece of popcorn, and you even tasted like popcorn. The butter from the popcorn had covered your body, masking your distinct strawberry scent. There was no way for Mary to know that it was actually you, and so you had given up hope. Gary and Stevie had won, as they almost always did.

Finally, Mary had sucked all of the butter off of your body, and she wanted more, fresh popcorn. She tilted her tongue back, and you rolled into her esophagus. You couldn’t even fight against her body’s will, even if you had wanted to. With a swift pulsing of her muscles, your body was carried down her throat as she swallowed, sending you to your new home for the next twenty-four hours.

You plopped into your girlfriend’s stomach, splashing down into her the lake formed by her stomach acids. Disgusting piles of chewed up and half-digested popcorn lay scattered. Your pitiful body sank deeper and deeper into the pool of stomach acid, and you didn’t even try to stop it. You had been broken. All you had wanted to do was spend a wonderful day with your girlfriend, and now you were trapped in her stomach, all because of Gary and Stevie. She was watching a movie, smiling and laughing, and you suffered.

Stomach acid would have instantly began to tear apart and dissolve your body, if it wasn’t for your special gummy body. Your body was completely resistant to the dissolving nature of stomach acid, and it was really no different from regular water to you.

***

You had discovered your body’s unique resistance to stomach acid long ago, during an incident that occurred when you were five. It was your birthday, and your mom was preparing to bake a cake for you. When she was out of the kitchen, you tried to help her out by mixing the cake batter. Suffice it to say, it didn’t go well. Your arm caught on the blender, and your entire body ended up being mixed and mashed into a liquid form, slipping right into the cake batter.

Your mom came back after the incident, and didn’t notice a thing. She kept right on making the cake, pouring the batter and you into a large mold. She slipped you into the oven, and baked you at nearly two hundred degrees. You were then served to the party guests, and the slice containing your consciousness was eaten by your mother. You slightly reformed inside of her stomach, and you were then ejected into the toilet a day later. Thankfully, your mom spotted you before she flushed.

***

Back in reality, you heard the muffled sounds of talking, and then you felt your world began to shake and tilt. You floated around in the pool of stomach acid, and you realized that the movie must have ended. You hadn’t realized so much time had passed, but you tended to zone out often while daydreaming.

“Hey sis! Did you like the movie?” You heard Gary say. He sounded so far away from within Mary’s stomach.

“Yeah. It was actually really good.” Your girlfriend replied, in her sweet and angelic voice. Her voice seemed to echo through her entire body, and the strength of her voice hurt your ears.

“Did you like your popcorn?” Gary hardly contained his laugh, knowing full well what had happened to you.

“I did. It was some of the most delicious popcorn I’ve ever eaten.” Mary patted her stomach in appreciation, and you were bounced and sloshed around.

“Good.” Gary said, but what does her say next?
15421.title: Into Mary's Stomach

choices: Stacy relieves herself all over you, and then flushes the toilet when she's done
Mary wakes up and tries to save you before it's too late.
154212.content:
“Good...” Gary began, his face slowly twisting into his iconic cruel grin. “...because Jack was in it!” As Gary finishes his words, Mary's face went wide with fear and surprise.

“What...did you just say?” Mary spoke slowly and quietly, in a manner that would have given anyone in the world nightmares. Gary didn't seem to notice.

“Yeah, I thought your popcorn could use a little extra ingredient, so I...” Before her sadistic brother could even finish, Mary lashed out and smacked Gary right in the face with a full-on punch. Gary's words caught in his throat as he collapsed backwards onto the floor. Stacy and Emma, who had already descended to the exit of the theater glanced backwards in surprise at Mary's unexpected assault.

As Stacy and Emma ran back up the stairs to see what had happened, Mary sprinted down the opposite staircase, making a mad dash to the nearest bathroom. She rushed into the closet women's restroom and jumped into an empty stall, not even bothering to close the door behind her. She sank to her knees in front of the toilet, lowered her head above the water, and closed her eyes. Lastly, she slowly stuck her hand down her throat.

Inside of Mary's stomach you had been sloshed and bounced like crazy, having no idea what in the world was going on. Suddenly everything tilted to the side and you felt your girlfriend's stomach acids begin to bubble and stir. You mentally panicked. Was Mary's digestive system already kicking into effect? Was your destiny to be dissolved and added to your pretty girlfriend's fecal matter without any hope for escape?

You were dead wrong in your assumption of what was going on, but the end result was still not going to be any less pretty. Mary was preparing to make herself throw up, and had almost succeeded in doing so. She felt her stomach begin to churn and her throat muscles contracted up and down. Soon she was able to taste the bile rising up her esophagus. She shuddered, but she would do anything to save her beloved boyfriend.

All of the contents of Mary's stomach, including you, began to rise up. The liquidy acids and mostly digested food was forced up Mary's throat, carried by the powerful contractions of her muscles. You were in complete darkness, but even you were able to tell what was going on. Your girlfriend had somehow realized she had eaten you, and was now puking you up in order to save you.

Light flooded your vision from Mary's open mouth, and you soon found yourself falling through the air and splashing down into the freezing cold water of the toilet. The toilet water was filled with Mary's puke, and more was still raining down. Finally Mary stopped, and she breathed heavily for a few moments before opening her eyes. She scanned the toilet before her eyes locked onto your squashed blob self. She started to stand up to reach you easier...

...and then her foot slipped. Some of her fluidy bile had spilled onto the floor, and she slipped forward while trying to stand. She screamed briefly before her head smacked against the hard toilet bowl with a sickening “CRACK”. Mary didn't stand a chance, and her body slumped to the floor. Her eyes fluttered briefly before eventually closing. She was out cold.

Meanwhile, you could do nothing but watch in horror at your girlfriend's accident. The sound of her head smacking the toilet bowl sent shivers up your spine. You wanted to hug and cradle her, but you couldn't do a thing while still a smushed blob floating in the the toilet. Several agonizing minutes passed before you heard two feminine voices approaching your location. It was Stacy and Emma, coming to check on Mary!

“Oh my god! Mary!” Emma cried, rushing over to check on her friend. Stacy waited for a second before peeking past Mary into the toilet. She frowned at the mess Mary had left behind.

“There must have been something in that popcorn that Mary ate.” Stacy concluded. “The poor girl couldn't handle it. She's puked into the toilet, and then I guess she passed out.”

“Should we call an ambulance?” Emma asked.

“What? No, she's just exhausted. Help her up and try to get her to swallow some water.” Stacy helped Emma move Mary out of the stall, and then Stacy grabbed the stall door. “I need to take a shit real quick.”

“EW STACY!” Emma's face scrunched up in disgust. “Why do you always have to be so vulgar? At least flush first. That vomit is disgusting.”

“Why should I flush? That would just waste water. I can still use the toilet.” Stacy shrugged her shoulders. It doesn't bother me.” Emma tried to argue, but knew this wasn't the time.

“Whatever. You're gross. Go ahead, I'll help Mary.” Stacy nodded and then closed the stall door behind her. She pulled down her leggings and then shimmed her panties down her rather impressive legs. Tina slammed the lid on the bin, sealing you in with no hope of escape. You couldn’t even hear her walk back inside the house, humming a little tune.

The hours quickly turned into days, until an agonizing four days had passed. You could only rot away in the trash bin for all that time, as there wasn’t much else to do. In fact, you were almost happy when you heard the rumbling of the garbage truck approaching the house. At least your life wasn’t going to be boring for a while. Although, a landfill was not where you wanted to spend your life.

The truck pulled to a stop, and two workers climbed out and walked over to the trash bin. They lifted the bin up and dumped its contents into the back of the truck. By some miraculous twist of fate, the trash bag containing your plastic bag, and your plastic bag were ripped apart by a jagged piece of glass. Your tan, squishy lump of a body bounced out of both bags, and rolled across a pile of garbage before coming to a painful landing on the in front of the workers.

Sadly, a pile of trash had bounced free of the truck along with you, and one of the workers took a step forward to pick the trash up. Not noticing your squashed, tiny form, her muddy boot stomped down on you, crushing you flat to her heel and making a loud “SPLAT” noise. The worker heard this, and she jumped back in surprise.

She lifted up her boot and spotted your putty-like self. She peeled you off of her boot and held you in her hand. For a minute she rolled you around her palm, squeezing you between her fingers. Her partner picked up the fallen trash and then turned to face her.

“What the hell are you playing with?” Her partner demanded.

“I reckon it’s some o’ that gummy whatchamacallit.” The girl holding you mused in a distinct, country bumpkin accent. “Do we take this stuff?”

“I don’t know!” The partner threw her hands up into the air. “Just throw it in the truck, or leave it here if it bothers you that much!” The partner stomped away and climbed back into the truck. The girl holding you looked back down at you and rubbed her chin. What does she decide to do with you?

It took quite a while but finally, you were yourself again. Mary squeezed you into a loving hug that you returned and you shared your first proper kiss in over eight months. Finally the fact you were naked became obvious to both of you and you blushed at the same time. Sadly Mary didn't have any spare clothes of yours here and Gary's wouldn't fit you at all. She glanced at the flower girl dress and giggled "That might fit you Jackie.." She said running her fingers through your long hair gently...

You decide to leave the house, and try not to bump into Tina on your way out.
1551322121111.content:
“I really don’t want to wear that flower dress Mary.” You said, making sure to phrase it as politely as possible. You didn’t want to offend her and cause an accident, especially so soon after being rescued. Thankfully, she didn’t seem so offended by your work.

“That’s fine. I’m sure we can find…” Mary’s beautiful voice trailed off as she turned from you and looked at her closet. “Actually, I have something that might work!” She crawled over to her closet, and you couldn’t help but look at her gorgeous ass swing side to side. She was a ten out of ten for sure, and you were so happy you had found someone as loving and caring as you.

“Will this work?” Mary returned with a bright red shirt and bright red pants. You grinned, but your smile diminished as you realized that those clothes would only fit a doll, and not a normal human being. On the other hand, you were far form normal…

Mary placed her hands on your shoulders and then gave you a reassuring smile. After a second of hesitation you gave her the same smile, and Mary got to work. She expertly crushed and molded your body, until you was a simple orb of gummy. She flattened out your orb and stuffed you into the pants and shirt, positioning you in just the right way. When your gummy properties kicked in, Mary’s plan came to fruition.

Your body started to reform, but your reforming process is always halted by natural obstacles that may block your way. As such, your body grew to conform to the red shirt and pants, and no further. You had reformed into a one-foot tall version of yourself, perfectly fitting the clothes Mary had picked out for you.

“Oh my god! You’re so cute!” Mary squealed, almost blowing your ears off. She scooped you up into her arms and embraced you in a tight and warm hug. Her boobs pressed against your chest, squashing it slightly. She kissed you passionately, her lips covering up almost your entire face. When she finally let you go, you had to take several deep breaths of air.

“Thanks for that Mary!” You grinned, trying to wipe her saliva off of your face. She laughed, but then grew slightly more serious.

“Now Jackie, I’m meeting up with Stacy and Emma in a minute or so. I promised them we would all go see a movie. Can you get home safely? If you want, you can just hide out in my room, and leave when I get back.”

“Uh…I don’t know Mary. Can you just…” Your words were cut off by a loud horn blaring out in the street. Mary stood up, and she placed you down onto her bed.

“That’s my ride. See you later Jackie! I love you so much!” She blew you a kiss as she ran out of her room, leaving the door slightly open in case you decided to get home on your own.

You looked down at yourself, marveling at how small and insignificant your one-foot tall body was. Would you even be able to get home at this size? Was it worth the risk? At the same time, you didn’t really want to stay at Mary’s house, or risk Gary finding an tormenting you. Tina’s oblivious nature potentially posed an even greater threat. The choice was daunting, but you had to make one.
1551322121111.title: Tough Decisions

choices: a brightly coloured summer dress, you blend in with the pattern very well.
a bright red bra, your features are faint but visible in the bra cup.
15513221211112.content:
As you sat there, you could hear Gary's bedroom TV blaring through the wall, showing you how terrifyingly close to you Gary was. If he spotted you in Mary's room while she was out, who knows what he would do to you or how long you would be trapped again. That threat was too risky, you decided that you needed to head home. Hopping down off the bed, you landed quietly on the plush carpet. sneaking quietly to the door you kept your eye on the door, ready to leap out of sight the moment you saw Gary. Thankfully, his door was shut tight and he didn't open it.

Carefully, creeping out into the hallway, you kept glancing back at his door as you made your way to the stairs. Of course, this proved to be a bad plan, you were used to being bigger than you currently were. As you stepped down to the first step, it was alot further than you expected and you lurched forwards. Tumbling down the stairs you rolled and bounced, squishing with each impact before bouncing off the wall and rolling across the varnished wooden floor of the downstairs hall. You mentally groaned, your head squished into your body in an orb like shape, one eye visible. You wriggled, trying to reform and pop back to normal shape before something bad happened.

Fate, as always, did not cut you a break. The floor vibrated suddenly as you heard approaching footsteps. Suddenly a pair of black heeled feet came into view. Glancing up with your one visible eye, you saw it was Tina, though her head was invisible, hidden behind an overflowing basket of dirty laundry. as she came closer, you realised what was going to happen mere seconds before it happened. Her shoe kicked your balled up body, sending it rolling at speed along the path and out into the laundry room. You hit the rim of the door and flicked up into the air before landing down with a slight splat infront of the washing machine.

As Tina came into the room she tripped, sending the basket of dirty laundry flying with a shriek. She hit her knees on the floor, cursing loudly as a pile of clothes landed right ontop of you, crushing your ball shape instantly flat. Tina grumbled as she got up, dusting herself off with a sigh before crouching infront of the washing machine, sorting through the pile as she tossed it in, item by item.The weight over you faded as she put the clothes into the machine. Finally she picked up whatever you were under, which you found you had stuck to, and tossed it in. You stared up at the metal barrel inside the machine and watched her hand reach in with the ball filled with detergent. You silently whimpered as you tried without success to get her attention before you heard the click of the machine door closing and the machine being started up.

The machine whirred to life and the mass of clothes began to shift as the barrel turned. You felt your world tilt as the clothes shifted and you were quickly buried under the shifting mass of fabric. The detergent soaked water seeped right through you. You could taste it as your world became a blur with flashes of light. You hated going through the wash, you always ended up fused to something because of the spinning pressure. As the spin cycle started you couldnt even tell what direction was up as it span you fast, wet fabric fibers gripping at your gummy flesh as it spun you fast.

Finally, the wash cycle finished, but the damage was done, you could feel the tight grip of fabric holding you in place fully. You didn't know what you were fused to, but you knew it was tight enough that you were trapped without outside help, it was the flower girl dress all over again. Tina's hands reached in and gathered the wet mass into the basket, sending you tumbling to the bottom of the pile again as she carried it outside. She pinned up the clothing casually, unaware she had her daughters boyfriend trapped in the wash load. Finally she got to the garment you were fused to, but glancing right over you, she didnt spot your very faint squashed features mixed into the fabric as she pegged it up, but from the shape of the shadow and the movement of the garment in the wind you saw its colour and shape, you were trapped on...
15513221211112.title: You decide to leave the house, and try not to b...

155132212111122.content:
From your squished vantage point, you could see bright red slopes encircling you completely. Two thin, long strands of fabric flapped in the wind above you, and it didn’t take a genius to figure out what had happened. You had been absorbed into the cup of a bright red bra, your human features incredibly faint but still slightly visible.

As it was right now, there really wasn’t anything you could do about your predicament. You tested out your ability to squirm or reform, but it was as impossible as you had predicted. Your body was too exhausted and battered, and the fabric of the bra had a tight grip on you at the moment. You simply had to wait this terrible punishment out, and hope a chance to escape presented itself sooner rather than later.

Tina finished pinning the clothes to the line, and then walked back inside. You could just barely see her as she disappeared into the house, leaving you all alone outside. For the next two hours you could do nothing but hang there on the line and wait for someone to come and take you down. You tried reforming a few more times, but you were still unable to escape the confines of the bra cup.

Finally, Mary herself walked out of her house and began to take down the newly cleaned clothes. She separated the clothes into a basket for her and a basket for her mother. To your horror (but not really to your surprise), Mary folded up the bra you were trapped in and placed it into her own basket. Of course, it would be Mary’s bra you were trapped in. Fate had such a twisted sense of humor that it made you sick.

Mary piled on a few more articles of clothing on top of you before carrying her bag up into her room. She placed her clothes in their proper drawers and her closet, tucking you in between a two frilly bras in a dark and cramped drawer. You sat there in total darkness for the next three days, only seeing a brief shine of light as your oblivious girlfriend opened the drawer to grab a bra for the day.

Finally, the moment you had been both dreading and looking forward to arrived, as you felt Mary’s warm, soft hands grip the bra and lift it out of the drawer. When she flipped the bra around, you saw the all-too-familiar sight of her rather sizable, bare breasts. Mary’s gaze was firmly fixed on her mirror, and so your hopes that she would spot your faint facial features in her bra cup were shattered to pieces.

Mary pressed her bra against her breasts, and her soft, squishy flesh was jammed against your body. As she tightened the straps behind her back, her jiggly skin pressed firmly into you, completely ensuring you would have no hope of escape until Mary took her bra off, and undoing any progress you had made so far.

Mary slipped on a tight blouse over top of her bra, which only added even more pressure to your already miserable situation. In seconds the temperature inside Mary’s bra cup had risen drastically, and you feared your body would soon melt down. As your beautiful girlfriend left her room and raced down the stairs, her boobs jostling up and down, you knew that today was going to be a hellish day.

Mary rode the bus to school, wondering where you were, and then headed into her first class of the day, which was the textiles class. As she slid into her seat beside Stacy and Emma, she accidentally knocked over a small bottle of gummy solvent. She didn’t notice at first, and as she bent down to open her backpack, the solvent dripped off the table and onto her blouse.

Mary let out a shriek of surprise, and tried to brush the solvent off of her, but it was too late. The chemical substance had soaked right through her lace blouse, and onto her bra. It was then that the horrible truth surrounding your entire situation was revealed, and you mentally screamed in horror.

You hadn’t noticed it at first, but Mary’s bra was actually made of gummy material frozen in Beta4. As such, the gummy bra bubbled and softened from the solvent, quickly morphing into a big glob. Your squishy body, tucked inside the bra cup, was folded and crushed as the gummy bra collapsed into a blob.

The once bra-shaped glob of gummy dropped down Mary’s blouse, and landed with a loud “SPLAT” on the table. Mary, topless, cowered behind Stacy and Emma as the teacher quickly fetched her a pre-made bra that a student had made the previous day. It was a little tight, but Mary slipped it on and the class continued like normal.

Mary looked down at the remains of what was once her bra, and she began to roll it up into the shape of a small orb. The red gummy material completely overwhelmed you, and your small, tan self was hidden deep within the red orb. Mary had no idea that her loving boyfriend was trapped deep inside the confines of the red gummy orb she was currently holding in her hand.

Your mind was racing a mile a minute, and you were doing everything you could to break free and reform, or at least alert Mary of your presence. If she remade the orb into a bra, your body would be hidden with the red gummy, without a trace of you anywhere. Mary would have no idea that you were trapped inside the layers of gummy comprising her bra.

Mary grabbed you and opened up her backpack, and started to drop you inside. Even though your world was pitch black, you knew this was your last chance. You prayed and hoped for some kind of miracle as Mary loosened her grip, and you started to fall.
155132212111122.title: Red Gummy Bra

1551322121111221.content:
Sadly, the red gummy masked your scent and your attempts at struggling, leaving your beloved Mary totally unaware of your presence in her former bra. Dropping into her bag, you came to a halt, thankfully her bag wasn't packed too tight so there wasn't anything crushing you. Unfortunatly, though this would usually mean you could reform somewhat inside her bag, the red gummy that wrapped around you as if you were a baby in the womb, had no compulsion to reform and therefore simply provided a barrier against your reformation efforts that was as strong as you were. You could feel Mary moving her bag around, likely walking somewhere but couldn't see anything inside her bag and inside the gummy, also it now muffled noise quite a bit.

You lost track of how long you had been trying to reform inside your girlfriend's bag, terrified that at any moment she would reform the gummy into a bra and seal you inside perminantly. It was unlikely she would spill solvent on the same bra twice. Eventually, you felt fingers grip at the gummy and lift you up weightlessly, though more than that, was impossible to tell.

Mary sat on her bed, crosslegged and holding the gummy glob in one hand as she pulled it out of the bag. "This had been such a comfy bra" She sighed looking it over. It seemed like it had dried off, so Beta4 would work on it again. However, during the day she had been chatting to Stacy and Emma and the talk of "toys" had been raised. Knowing she could never buy one in public, she looked at the gummy glob thinking how easy it would be to shape it into a long sausage like shape, though she blushed bright red at the thought. Maybe she should just turn it back into a bra and be done with it, if her mother ever found a "Toy" in her room, she would be grounded for a year.

She tossed the glob of gummy between her hands thoughtfully, wondering what to do before deciding...

info.brief_description: a teen with an unusual condition tries to make it through the day, will he survive?
info.description:
This story is based off the Characters created by Derpatron with his permission. it is five years after the events of his story based off one of the story threads i took a liking to the most.

You are 14 year-old Jack Harper. You were born with a squishy, putty-like body. While this makes you practically immortal, it also means you're extremely weak, constantly getting squashed and flattened by almost everything. Things really started getting bad when you started school, after which your mother pulled you out the first chance she got. You seem to be able to take an awful lot of punishment. Getting smooshed doesn't really hurt you. In fact, you could be melted into a puddle and still be fine. You still hate it nonetheless. You're kind of a geek, often studying on the internet and playing video games. You're almost exactly three feet tall, black hair, and tan skin. You like wearing funny or "awesome" shirts, even though no one usually sees them. Being sheltered most of your life, you don't really know how normal people are supposed to act and often get yourself in trouble. You seem to have stopped growing and you seem to age slower

Trish Harper - 46. Your mother. You and her are pretty close, especially after your father left. She's sort of cheap and a bit scatterbrained. She home schools you and often takes you to work with her. She's very attractive, though with a bit of extra weight in her rear. She's of average height with sandy blonde hair and lightly tanned skin.

Katrina "Kat" Harper - 18. Your tomboyish older cousin who lives in a rural area on the other side of town. You often go over to her house during the summer and help her and your aunt and uncle with their animals. You've had a pretty good relationship with her ever since you were very little. She seems to have a desire to toughen you up, often allowing you to do things that would normally make your mother freak out.

Andrew Morrison - 13. An annoying, but friendly neighbor boy. He's been your best friend since your mother pulled you out of school. His mother doesn't pay much attention to him, so your mom has taken it upon herself to make him your unofficial brother. He often teases you, but he knows where to draw the line (sometimes). He knows about your condition and tries to help your mom out, sometimes too much.

Barbara Morrison - 45. Andrew's neglectful mother and an old friend of Trish's. While she's very attractive, going through great lengths to maintain her body, she's also not very nice to you. She hasn't put you in danger herself (yet) but she goes out of her way to mock you when she find you in these situations.

Stephan "Stevie" Morrison - 9. Andrew's little brother. Stevie's kind of a brat but at least he has grown out of eating you now. While Barbara pays little attention to Andrew, she practically spoils Stevie. (The relationship between Jack, Andrew, and Stevie may change depending on the storyline.)

Ashley "Ash" Parker - 20. Andrew's cousin. You had a pretty horrible encounter with him one Halloween, but he made things right soon after. He seems pretty cool to you, but you still aren't sure of what to think of him. He often babysits his cousins.

Marilynn "Mary" Evans - 13. Jack's Girlfriend. they met at the water park five years ago when she accidentally landed on him. she thought he was cute and sweet and after hanging out she became his first girlfriend. they have been together since. she loves Jack, even though she got taller and he didn't. she loves to play with him and squish him in differant ways, but when it's Mary, Jack doesn't mind.

Garfield "Gary" Evans - 13. Mary's twin brother. he introduced Jack to Mary when he tried to bully Jack before Mary came out a water slide and hit him in the face feet first as she landed on Jack. he loves to mess with Jack, though he knows he cant do anything perminant as his Sister would kill him if he did anything really bad to Jack.

Rules:

No one sentence chapters. If it's a bridge chapter, that's understandable, but try to limit them.

Jack can't die, so don't do it.

Use proper spelling and punctuation. Make it readable.

Anything else goes.
